From various events, big and small, in everyone's day, to school, to Dad's work, to absolutely nothing; Just the three of you joking around, having fun. You really felt like you were part of a family you could get used to.

Of course, this only made you miss your true family that much more.

Aside from how much you enjoyed it, you saw a certain twinkle in Kate's eyes, a twinkle you've never before seen in her. She was happy, truly happy, having a (mostly) complete family. And, the way she looked to you ever since you changed, she looked to you as if you filled some enormous crater of a gap in her life. This was something special.

Finally, as you and Kate stood side by side, in the restroom, brushing up your teeth, she dropped all she was doing and provided a look of great surprise.

"Kat." She plainly said.

"Yeah?" You asked rinsing your mouth.

"It's 9:15! We're an hour and fifteen late for school! The bus left way back when!!!" She freaked.

"OK... OK... Calm down, we're gonna be fine." You made your best attempt to keep your composure, finding Kate's reaction to be interesting.

"How could I have let this happen?!?!" Kate bellowed. "I'm a straight-A student! A perfect record! No absences, no tardiness! Never late! Never ever!" She ran to the closet, throwing on the first outfit she found, throwing some clothes your way in the process.

"And, how are you so calm about this?!" She looked your way, accusingly.

"Me?!"

"Yeah, you!" She pointed a single finger to you. "You're so calm about this! Where's your drive?! Where's your care?! Oh yeah! I forgot! You're still a boy in there!" She uttered, running into her closet to change.

You gave her a look of surprise, raising an eyebrow, picking up the clothes she threw your way, a skirt much like the one you wore yesterday, only this time black, and a shirt donning your school's logo and your graduation year, As far as footwear went, you found a pair of ballet flats, black, and the socks that matched. Again, something particularly feminine. You changed where you stood, seeing as you were alone.

You looked to the closet, hearing the doorknob twist, surprised to see her come out, in something nowhere near as feminine. Just a pair of jeans, a duplicate of the shirt you wore, and a pair of converse.

"What's up with that?!" You uttered, going off the handle. "I get this and you get that?!" You gestured to your skirt, then her jeans.

"Oh, so, that's what gets you to lose your mind! Not being centuries late to school, but the dang clothes!" She shouted, handing you a brush for your hair, as she brushed her own, simultaneously grabbing her backpack, gesturing that you do the same.

"Come on! Let's go!"

The two of you tearing out of the house, Kate taking the lead as you followed behind, much more calmly than her. Thankfully, you and Kate lived but a few minutes (10-15 minutes) away from the school. This left you wondering why the two of you take the bus, anyway? But, this was a question for another time. The two of you arrived to the front of the school only to find emptiness... You came to a halt, your skirt flowing about the wind as you did.

"Great!" Kate fumed. "Everyone's in class, which we're totally late for!"

You simply stared at her, enjoying the spectacle.

"What do we do now! How are we supposed to get in there without anyone saying anything! It'll be so embarrassing! I've never been through such a traumatizing experience!"

"It seems to me that you're forgetting that we have magical, wish-granting candies at our disposal..."

"Sweet!" Kate gleamed. "We can use the candies to make it so that we were right on time! Nice!" She smiled.

"We could do that... Or, we could make things more interesting..." You smiled, handing her a mischievous, almost devilish look.

"... I don't follow..." Kate uttered.

"Well, I was thinking about what you said yesterday, how we have a seemingly infinite amount of possibilities to go about with these things... I was hoping we could..." You smiled, pulling out a candy, Kate looking to you in a certain fear.
1112111111221111112111212111111.title: The Very Next Day

choices: Where in the school is Katherine?
11121111112211111121112121111111.content:
"....We could pose as teachers!"

Kate quite literally gasped at your suggestion. "Us? Teachers?"

"Of course, we have the candies to do it. Besides, given your fanaticism for school work, it seems to be up your alley." You added a little laugh there for emphasis.

"Hey, I don't do it because I love it. Who knows if I'll get into a good college if I mess up."

"Once again, fanaticism." You added. "To be honest, I actually really considered taking us to the beach or something, but you'd probably freak out too much and not really have fun."

"How can you be too calm about this? School work is very important..." Kate began again.

"If you're going to say that I don't care as much because I'm a guy, my grades are very good too. I just don't hold the same fascination as you do." As you said that, you actually pulled Kate aside, seeing one of the staff members pass by. Hopefully they didn't yell you guys raising your voices. "Boy, that was too close. Since you'd probably freak out at the beach, I say we get out of this mess and just be teachers. Hopefully, that should clear our names and keep your record clean."

"But how exactly?" asked Kate. As she said that, you popped the candy into your mouth.

"Well, I say we just roll with it and see what may." You said.

"Like how you ended up my clone?" Kate said plainly. That was just ONE example of a non-specific wish. However, you just wanted to clean this situation up so your "sis" would stop freaking out. It was 9:40 now, close to the end of 1st Period. You didn't want to drag this out longer or get caught. In your haste, you made your desire.

"I wish that Kate's situation would be resolved."

Before Kate could say anything, a bright flash of light engulfed both of you, to the point where you couldn't see yourselves well. However, you felt tingling all over the place, including something lifting you up under your feet. However, one thing you felt for sure was that Kate didn't seem to be next to you anymore.

*******

Kate heard you make the wish before she could say anything. That wish wasn't exactly specific and you didn't even mention if they could keep her record clean. The very thought was frustrating, but it felt minor to the tingling feeling the wish had caused to flow over her. However, she suddenly felt herself on ground again, seeing herself on the top floor of the school now. Immediately, she noticed that you were nowhere in sight.

"Kat? Where are you?" Suddenly, you put her hands to her mouth. It sounded like her voice...yet different. Her hands looked slightly different too, and she couldn't feel her hair down her back like usual. She looked down at her body, seeing her modest cleavage in a nice dress. Were they a bit bigger too? That aside, the dress was modest enough for school, with a pair of small heels on her feet. She couldn't tell for sure, but she felt a bit taller, outside of the heels. Poking around her head, she could tell her hair was in a ponytail. To be honest, she almost looked like an older version of herself.

"Oh my gosh, did I get old?" Well obviously not too old. She didn't look that much different. However, looking to her left, she could see her 1st Period classroom right in front of her. Without even another thought, she walked right in, seeing tons of eyes focus on her immediately. However, none of them looked condescending or anything like that.

"Ah, Ms. Smith. Thank you for joining us today." Mrs. Harris, her 1st Period English teacher, welcomed her with a smile. "Please get your things settled here."

Confused, Kate walked right over and....wait, where was her backpack? All she had was a folder or two with some supplies...and a purse too?

"Now class, as I told you all last time, Ms. Smith is a student teacher and will be giving a presentation today. I expect her to give her your utmost respect."

Kate nearly gasped at those words. A student teacher?! Her?!

What did that crazy candy do this time?!
11121111112211111121112121111111.title: "... We could pose as teachers!"

111211111122111111211121211111111.content:
In a fashion not unlike that which Kate had gone through, you, too, after a momentary lapse of emptiness and darkness, felt your feet make contact with the ground after floating, seemingly in mid-air. Though, as you landed, you heard a familiar sound, the click of women's heels stabbing the ground.

"What the...?" You asked, looking around. "... I wasn't wearing anything with heels..." You sighed, also noting that the voice you spoke in was not your own. It sounded familiar, though. Having already shifted physical form before, you didn't freak out all that much. This was your idea, after all.

You looked around and found yourself, alone, in a women's restroom. You looked to your shoes, first, and, instead of the ballet flats you donned this morning, a pair of heeled sandals, black and brown in color, decorated your feet, which were perfectly pedicured, the toenails flawless and painted a dark blue color.

Wear your skirt and shirt once were was now a dress, a dress that extended a little below the mid-thigh, exposing a little bit of the smooth, more matured legs now yours. The dress, again, was sleeveless and colored in a blue that matched your toes. On your head was dark-brown colored hair that reached to about the shoulder blades, slightly curled. Your eyes were now a light, caramel colored brown.

You knew this beauty of a teacher! You knew it!

"My voice..." You began in your soft-spoken voice. "This dress, these shoes, these legs..." You knew this woman all too well, you could recognize those legs, that bosom anywhere. This teacher was the favorite among the boys of your class, for reasons obvious; She looked absolutely amazing.

"I'm Ms. Brooks!" You sung in your new, flawless, matured voice. "I'm sweet, lovely little Ms. Judith Brooks!" You smiled, hugging yourself.

You absolutely adored this teacher, Brooks. She was kind, gentle, looked amazing, and, despite these looks, quite the profound teacher, whose teaching methods really worked. Her English/writing class was one you could actually attend and learn something from, unlike too many of these futile high-school level classes, whose goal was only to prepare you for the BS procedure that was standardized testing. Nope, she was a true, dedicated, hot teacher. Writing had never been your subject, by no means were you a poet. While she didn't make you a poet, Brooks did help, ALOT, making her a godsend to you.

"WAIT!" You exclaimed. "I have to teach... What a buzz-kill..."

You dragged yourself from the restroom, to what you recognized as the staff break-room, a setting you knew due only to the fact that you, Tommy, and other associates, often snuck in here to use the soda machine in the corner.

You continued walking to your class, un-deterred by the fact that you were late to your own class. The more you thought about this, though, the more it bothered you, something completely unlike you.

"I have to speed up! My students are waiting!" You exclaimed, picking up the pace, finally arriving to your classroom.

With a quick turn of the doorknob, and a slight push forward, you walked in, your hips swaying as you did. The moment you walked in, you stood still, frozen. All eyes were on you, especially the eyes of the guys...

"I'm no teacher..." You thought in your head. Again, out of nowhere, you composed yourself quickly and proceeded to your desk, the head of the class, as if nothing was wrong.

"Good morning, Class!" You chirped instinctively.

The class looked completely dead. Half, if not, completely asleep. People were texting, some were drooling about their desks in their sleep, a few looked to you attentively which, for some reason, made you smile.

"Alright, so let's begin!" You smiled. "Now, if you recall, everyone here has presentations to present!"

The class gave a groan of discontent, which you dismissed.

"So, which brave soul is gonna go first...?"

You could actually hear the crickets chirping.

"...Or, am I gonna have to pick someone...?"

And, just like that, a brave student, a girl who sat at the front of the class, one of the smarter in your class, stood up and walked to the front of the class and began speaking about who-knows what. You only knew because, yesterday, you heard Ms. Brooks speaking of some project due today. You didn't do it, which made this little change that much more worthwhile.

"This teaching thing's going to be a cinch!" You thought to yourself, smiling contently, unknowingly kicking off your sandals and crossing your feet to rest upon your desk, a habit Ms. Brooks was famous for. You simply sat there, and listened to the girl speak.

"Thank the powers that be that I'm young and awesome looking!" You said, watching the student present, pretending to be attentively listening, as you played with your polyester dress, referring to Ms. Brooks 27 year age. At the same time, for a reason unknown to you, a part of your mind actually carefully observed the students presentation, checking off an imaginary rubric, seeing if this student's work met the criteria.

"...Wonder how that sister of mine is doing..."
111211111122111111211121211111111.title: Where in the school is Katherine?

1112111111221111112111212111111111.content:
"So who can tell me what the author is referring to?"

While you were just letting your students have their presentations, Kate seemed to be actually enjoying herself. At first, she had no idea what in the world she was supposed to be doing, until she opened up her folder. Once she did, something seemed to be coming to her, like what she was supposed to be talking about. Apparently, being an aspiring teacher in this field, she had a few views on these stories that weren't covered normally. She kept getting quite a few hands every time she asked for an answer.

"Go on." She smiled as she picked on someone.

Needless to say, Kate was actually really having fun. She was aspiring to be a teacher after all, given her record, and she was enjoying this really even more than she thought she would. In fact, she almost entertained the thought of asking you to just let it stay like this. However, she knew that couldn't happen. She didn't want to lose close to 10 years of life just like that. Anyway, after a while, her presentation was over, getting an applause from the class and some gratitude from Mrs. Harris.

"Excellent work Ms. Smith." she said to her, making Kate's face almost go red.

Meanwhile, on your side, the entire class period mostly revolved around the students giving presentations. Tommy actually had something this time, if not a bit clumsy in execution. Still, going off your mental checklist, he actually did a reasonable job.

"Okay, good job class...." You said as you got off your chair, moving on to the book for the remaining class period. To be honest, you felt like winging it, since you weren't overly sure, and sometimes the body felt like it was moving on its own. Walking around a bit in just your bare feet felt kind of odd. You began to wonder why she always did that, but guess you couldn't complain right now.

Eventually, the bell rang, allowing everyone to leave. You gave one last shout out assigned pages and wished them luck.

During the intermission, both you and Kate just stayed in your respective classrooms with your materials. You both had to do your thing one more time for the next batch of students in 2nd Period. You felt a bit apprehensive about it, while Kate seemed like she couldn't contain her excitement. One thing that was consistent in both classes: you both got good looks from many of the males, though you seemed more capable of shaking them off.

So, as it were, 2nd Period started, with Kate actually doing her presentation earlier this time, much to similar reception. She hoped that she would be able to retain this information even once you all were back to normal. For you, the procedure was the same, relaxing as the class went off and presented their topics. The overall quality was a bit higher than the previous class.

Once again, the class bell rang, signaling the first lunch period, as well as lunch break for both you and Kate.
1112111111221111112111212111111111.title: Return to Kate...

11121111112211111121112121111111111.content:
"Alright, class." You sighed, having reached your absolute capacity with these presentations. Presentation after presentation, nervous speaker after nervous speaker, the lack of volunteers, time and time again... It was truly a vicious cycle.

"Whoever didn't present today..." you started, getting to your bare feet and slipping on your sandals. "... You got lucky, for today." You finished, attaining a laugh from the class, making yourself laugh in the process.

"But, seriously, be ready to present tomorrow." You finished as the students dispersed. Within a matter of seconds, all had fled the scene, leaving you in your solitude.

You took a deep breath in, and exhaled, your eyes, closed in a certain relief.

"Thank you, it is finally over!" you claimed, clasping your hands together and looking up. "Now, I can finally get Kate and move on!"

You dusted off and smoothed out your dress, having rid of all the wrinkles. The brown, leather purse that lay on your desk, once your backpack, you made a grab for. From one of the purses pockets you pulled a set of keys, all similar looking, among them, a car key boasting the Ford logo.

"Guess I have a Ford..." you immediately brushed this off and continued out the door, turning the lights out on the way out, closing the door behind you. "Now, to lock it..." you sighed, grazing your fingers over the several keys that decorated the key chain. "So many keys... This ought to be fun..." After trying, and failing, at locking the door with the many, many keys at your disposal, one finally did the trick.

"Yes!" you celebrated, swiftly turning as to walk away from the scene.

"Alright... If I ended up becoming my first period teacher... Kate probably became hers... Let's see... If I remember correctly, she has English, AP, with... Mrs. Harris!" you continued, the heels of your sandals stabbing the ground with each step.

After what was a few seconds shy of a minute, you arrived to what you knew was her classroom, the only memory being the few times you walked her to her class, as a boy.

"Here we go... Room 574, the class of Mrs. Harris." The light to the room was still on, and, there she was, Mrs. Harris, sitting alone at her desk, looking as if she was grading papers...

You thought you'd surprise your dear old sister, now in the body of Harris. You playfully waltzed in, quietly, as not to gain her attention.

As you crept up to the middle aged, short, plump woman who must've been your sister, you finally seized the opportunity.

"HEY, SIS!!" you obnoxiously called to the woman, who jumped back on fear, almost on the verge of a heart attack.

"My word!" she gasped. "Judith, what in the world are you doing?!" the woman flipped.

But, Kate's charade wouldn't fool you. "Oh! Nice try, Kate, or should I say, Ms. Smith! You're not gonna fool me, acting like the real Harris! So, how was your first day as a teacher?" You asked, sitting on her desk, crossing your legs.

The woman you believed to be your sister stood silent. "Uhm... Judith? Are you quite alright? You are aware that I have been teaching for several, several years?"

Now you were confused. With a cock of your head, you looked to her, lost, hopelessly lost.

"Alright, Kate. Drop the act, why don't we head to get a bite to eat or something?"

"..." Harris sat speechless. "You keep calling me 'Kate' and 'Ms. Smith...' If you're referring to the new student teacher, Kate Smith, she said something about heading to the break room..."

Then it hit you. "This isn't Kate..." you thought.

With a coy giggle and a swift apology, you slowly backed out of the room.

"Well. That was immensely awkward!" As you darted towards the faculty and staff break room.

Meanwhile, there Kate sat, alone, in the break room, alone with her 25 year old self. She thought this's be a good place to rendezvous with you, seeing as, as a teen boy, you frequently spoke of how awesome this place was, with it's snack-stocked fridges, it's ice-cold, almost frosty sodas, and the eye-candy staff.

As she sat alone, she fiddled and played with her hair, awaiting your arrival, anxious to tell you of her experiences today, and just as anxious to hear of your going ones, she waited, not even noticing that you barged in the room.

At the table where she sat, you pulled up a seat in front of her and gave her a stare of relief, as you violently panted, completely worn out from that dash.

"Kate..." you panted, on the edge of breaking a sweat.

Confusedly, she looked your way. This was expected, you recognized the fact that she had no idea of where you ended up.

"Oh... ugh... Hi, Ms.... Brooks, is it?" She asked, extending her hand for a handshake.

You gave a hearty laugh, or as hearty a laugh as a woman can give, grabbed her hand and dove in for a hug.

Kate looked completely lost.

"Ms. Brooks? Are you alright?"

"C'mon, Kate! It's-a-me, Kat! Formerly Nate, your sister?" you laughed at the end.

She had no words, and, instead, simply handed you a soft smile, accompanied by an alleviated sigh.

"Good to see ya, sis..." she smiled, returning the embrace.

"Wow... You look.... good!" you added, looking her over as the two of you got to your feet.

"Thanks!" she grinned. "Same to you! I love that dress you've got there!"

"Oh! It's not bad! But, no time for chatter! I'm starving, you're probably starving, let's take Brooks' car and go for a bite!"

Kate offered a twinkle of a smile and a snicker, no words, and followed you as you moved along to the parking lot.

The only Ford car in the lot, you assumed had to be Ms. Brooks'. What beheld both you and Kate as you walked along was a black Ford Focus, plain, nothing special, quite the opposite of Brooks' personality.

You scanned the car from back to front, top to bottom, wheel to wheel.

"Not bad!" you gave as you hit the unlock button on the keys, effectively unlocking the doors. "I'd imagine Ms. Brooks to have a sportier car, something nicer, more fun."

"Well, teaches don't exactly make a lot... I guess we get what we can." She said as she situated herself in the passengers seat.

"Good point." you concurred. "Now, where should we eat?"

"I could do anything, really." Kate answered. "But, I guess I have been craving a burger, something simple!"

You looked to her. "Great minds think alike, sweet sister o'mine! I know this great burger joint down the road, only a few minutes away!"

You turned the clutch where it need be and pulled out of the parking lot. It was the little things that made this whole thing great, like this; driving without your mother in the passenger's seat getting on your case, or having your own job.

The conversation would have commenced on the car, but, you two arrived at your destination much faster than anticipated.

"So, how's you like being a student-teacher, or, whatever it is you did?" you inquired.

"Yeah, I was a student-teacher, helping Mrs. Harris teach the class and all. And, I enjoyed it. ALOT."

"Oh, yeah?" you asked as you held the door open for her.

"Yeah! I loved it, actually! Gave me an awesome chance at some first-hand experience in my dream job! After today, I realized that this is it, this is what I want to do, after college and all. I even considered asking to stay like this..."

You frowned, disapprovingly, at this, taking a seat waiting to be served...

"Of course I decided against it!" she blushed. "I really didn't want to lose 10 years of my life like that! But, enough about me, how was your day?" she curiously asked.

"I've seen better days... Seen better days... When you do become a teacher, beware of presentations! Man, was that some boring stuff! And so monotonous, too! It seemed like it was the same stuff over and over. It got old really, really fast, is what I'm saying."

Kate simply laughed at this, and, the conversation continued like this for some time. The conversation had its laughs, its hysterical laughs, its smiles... it just kept going as time flew by.

"But, the weirdest thing... The guys in the class staring me down!"

"I know, right! Little pervs... They think they're being so discrete!"

"Exactly! Looking all over my legs and skirt... It's weird!"

Just then out of the blue, without warning, you heard a male voice emanate from behind you, catching both you and Kate completely by surprise. You turned around, to see the man. Who beheld you was a tall man, who looked to be just an inch or two shy of 6'. He donned a head of short, clean-cut black hair and a clean-shaven face, not a trace of hair or flaw in sight, looking to be about 27 or 28, more or less the same age as Ms. Brooks. Clothes-wise, nothing but a flannel shirt, a pair of jeans and a black pair of boots.

"Dang teen boys..." he laughed, his voice smooth and charming. "Don't they know they can't stare at their teacher like that..." he laughed, walking up to your table.

He smiled, almost in a creepy kind of way. Both you and Kate looked to this mystery man in a certain awe, waiting for him to continue.

"... Only I can." he said, looking straight at...
11121111112211111121112121111111111.title: Out for Lunch

choices: "... See what Kate and Paul are up to."
"... Head back to school, for now... Kate'll be back, eventually."
111211111122111111211121211111111112.content:
"Only I can..." He smiled, walking over to Kate, looking her straight in the eyes.

You looked to Kate and she looked red as a tomato, with that violent blush.

"Oh my!" She claimed, holding a single hand to her chest.

All you could help but do was roll your eyes. Something about this guy didn't set right with you, at all. Maybe it was the way he spoke, perhaps it was that super-high-esteem he held over himself, but, whatever the reason, it could be said that you didn't approve of the man, immediately. You never did like the jocky, 'I'm-better-than-you' type. This guy reeked of such personality.

You considered yourself to be a good friend of Kates, and, if anything, becoming her sister only made you a closer friend to her. Having said this, as you looked over Kate, you knew she had fallen for this guy, maybe almost as instantly as you came to dread him. Her blush was violent, the way she spoke to him was spaced out, almost stuttered, as if caught in some sort of trance over this mystery man.

He was under her skin. This much you knew was true.

"So, Katie..." He said, his voice smooth and coffee-like, who's your friend over here, he said gesturing to you.

"Oh... That's just a friend of mine, Judith. Judith... Brooks."

You rolled your eyes, on the edge of gagging in disgust. There Kate goes, with her airy way of speaking, her stuttered, spaced speech. You knew love, these were the signs you displayed around her when you were not her sister, nor her co-worker teacher. No, these signs were familiar when you were nothing more than that friend who wanted to be something more than friends.

You immediately stabbed in the conversation, nearly cutting Kate off in her introduction of you.

"Well, Mr. guy, who are you?" You coldly asked. You attained a disapproving look from Kate when you spoke like this. Something wicked this way comes.

"Oh! Well, I'm Paul, last name, Lewis." He said, not even so kind as to extend his hand for a hand-shake. Heck, when he introduced himself, he just sat there, handing you only an empty look with those eyes of his, cuddling up with Kate.

"And, how do you know my friend Kate, here?" You inquired, Kate looked to Paul as you asked him this, too, probably curious about his role in this life of hers.

Paul handed Kate a warm smile and a peck on the cheek, causing Kate to go deeper into feelings for him. At this point, despite her lack of words, you could tell she was all over him.

Paul continued looking into Kate's eyes and rubbing the side of her arm, almost as if petting her. He then shifted his look your way.

"Well, Judith." he began, matter-of-factly. "Katie and I have been going steady since about High-School, junior year of High-School. I found that love for teaching and learning she had so cute!"

Kate, much to your lack of surprise, batter her eyes and continued falling, the violent blush speaking for itself.

"...And, ever since then, I've been crazy about her." He handed her another peck about the cheek. Much to your surprise, .she returned the kiss, causing the pair to take each other into embrace.

This behavior was so unlike her. Never before had you seen Kate fall in love with someone, anyone, especially someone she's just met that fast. Never had you seen her swept of her feet, figuratively speaking, of course, in such a short amount of time.

",,,Or maybe I'm just jealous..." you thought to yourself, watching the two ogle each other to no end.

"Hey, Katie..." He said, playing with her hair.

"Yes, Paul?" She inquired, looking passionately into the man's eyes.

"I like burgers and fries as much as the next guy... But, I can see no one's taken your order or anything..." He gesture to the empty table before the three of you.

"Tell you what... I know this nice little Italian place down the street, really nice place. Would you care to dine with me?" He said, grabbing her hand, kissing it.

She continued to redden like a tomato. Without a second thought, she peeped.

"Of course, Paul!"

She looked to you, noticing the dissatisfaction you had about you.

"Well, Judith..." She coldly said. "I'll see you at work later, OK?"

You were about to stand in protest, provide an answer of some sort. But, by the time you got to your feet, the two had already made their way out the door and into Paul's black and blue '09 Mustang, a real beauty, a car you envied, as a boy, even now. Sure beat the heck out of that Focus now your own...

The car wasted no time in peeling out, boasting the power of those sweet little wheels of his.

And, just like that, within a matter of seconds, you plopped yourself down on the seat, speechless.

"Stood up... By my own sister..." You sighed, tapping your fingers anxiously among the tables surface.

"That guy was a total jerk, I could see it in him... And there she went, falling for him like a giddy little school girl..." You sighed to yourself.

As if on cue, though a bit late, a young man, who looked around the college age, perhaps 19 or 20 walked up to you.

With a sniffle, he lazily asked. "May I take your order."

"Oh! Now you're here!" You cursed, at the absolute top of your lungs, getting up, pushing him aside and walking out to your car. You unlocked the car, and sat on the driver's side...

"I only did this whole thing for Kate... And, just like that, she ditched... For some a-hole..." You referred to her knight-in--shining-armor, Paul.

"I can't just let her take off like that! She was already talking about staying in that body... Paul might be the last nail in the figurative coffin... Then what will I do?"

You sat in your seat, contemplating it all. From becoming Kate's twin, to induction into her home, to being late for school, to teaching, to now... It had all happened so fast, now it all seemed like one big blur...

"Well, I guess I have no choice..." You slide the key into the ignition, and set the car to 'Drive.'

"...Guess I'd better..."
111211111122111111211121211111111112.title: Kate.

choices: "I wish you'd realize that we're just friends!"
11121111112211112.content: Kate continued to suck on the surprisingly flavorful candy and blurted...
11121111112211112.title: Other

111211111122111121.content:
"I wish you'd realize that we're just friends!"

Over the loud noises of the bus, no one else heard that thankfully. However, that was more than enough for you to hear, which made you jump back a bit in surprise. Did she really mean that? Was the direct approach not working?

"R-Really?" you asked a bit, to which Kate sighed, while trying to maintain a smile.

"You're really nice Nate, but I'd us to just stay friends. I don't think eiher of us is really for that kind of thing. So....please understand." She kind of looked away after that, like she didn't want to say more about it. You were still a bit surprised. On one hand, you were happy that Kate did consider you both to be friends. Still, the glass felt half-empty, so you were a bit deflated none the less.

After a bit, you shifted back over to your own seat, hoping to put that out of your head. You had no idea that one of the candies had slipped out of your pockets, and you still thought that they were secure. Going on that, you had no idea what Kate had just did, or what her wish would end up doing. You didn't see anything wrong with how she worded what she said, despite her saying "I wish".

"Weird how she happened to phrase it that way." you muttered to yourself.

Eventually, the bus arrived at the parking lot, allowing everyone to get off. You walked off alone, seeing Kate walk away from you. You could see her try to flash a smile at you, but she didn't say a word. That was one of the reasons why you liked her. Despite obviously making her uncomfortable, she didn't hold grudges, and she likely already put that outburst behind her and wanted to stay friends. The thought made you smile; she was such a great person. At least you still had that in your pocket. Well, guess it was time for school. Luckily, no one thought you having breasts would be weird at all. Perhaps in the future, you could try talking to Kate on simpler matters than dating.

Still, it wasn't like you had any idea what was going to come, even as Tommy came over and gave you a friendly pat on the back for a greeting. You shared a few words with him before he had to take off to his own class. You walked straight to your locker, getting the books you needed out of it. After getting said books, it was time to head off to class.
111211111122111121.title: "I wish you'd realize that we're ju...

1112111111221112.content: As the candy was in Kate's mouth and she began to talk, what was she thinking about besides you?
1112111111221112.title: Other Choice

choices: "I just wish I was already on a vacation!" Judith exclaims.
"No, you don't understand. I wish you could see for yourself!
111211111122112.content:
As the bus rolled on forward, you sat in your seat, next to Tommy, attempting to muster up the courage to talk to her, Kate, that is, the woman of your dreams.

Tommy, just like your mother this morning, paid no mind to the breasts you now so casually donned. Instead, Tommy treated you as he normally would, attempting to motivate you to finally talk to Kate.

“Come on, Man!” He exclaimed, patting your shoulder with one hand in an attempt to (literally) push you to talk to the dark-haired beauty. “You’ve been sitting here, talking about talking to her, but, not actually talking to her! You could’ve had her already, Man!” He continued.

Meanwhile, you sat there, lost in her shining dark hair, sitting alone.

“I don’t know, Tom… I just don’t feel ready. Anywhere near it, actually.” You stated, looking your friend in the eyes, which he rolled in a sort of frustration.

“I guess, Nate. I’m just saying, she could be yours, whenever you want, you’ve just got to go for her!” Tommy claimed, as the bus came to a halt that screeched as it sowed down, nearing the school. The to the bus opened wide as all the kids you were surrounded by spilled from the bus, including Kate.

“See! This is what I’m talking about, she’s gone! One more day passed, one more day she could’ve been in your arms!” He said before rushing out the door.

Surprised to see him in such a hurry to class, you couldn’t help but wonder where he was off to. You’ve known Tommy for quite the number of years. Knowing him as well as you did, you knew he never went to class until the absolute last-minute; The very definition of procrastination.

“Tom! Where you going?!” You asked as he neared the door.

“Test, first period! Forgot to study!” He claimed, before finally darting from the bus, leaving you alone.

You laughed. “Classic Tommy… Well, I guess I’d better get to class, too.”

After a few moments of walking about the halls of the school, going up these stairs, through these halls, turning left and right and left again, you finally arrived to your classroom; Room 554, the classroom of Ms. Judith Brooks.

Nate walked into the classroom, and looked around. All the seats were empty, completely empty, just you and Ms. Brooks, who sat at her desk, her heels kicked off to the side somewhere. She had her bare feet, her perfectly pedicured and painted toenails, kicked upon her desk. She seemed to be on the phone, in the midst of a seemingly heated conversation.

“Rob…” She said, closing her eyes, putting her hand to her cheek. “No, Rob! That’s enough! Not another word! You and I are through! You hear me, through! What? There is no more to talk about, I have a student here!” She shouted into her phone, gesturing to you, leaving you with quite the awkward feeling. “Goodbye.” She sternly said into the phone, hanging up, throwing the phone in her purse.

“Hi, Nate.” She said, trying to keep her cool, tying her strawberry blonde hair into a ponytail, her feet still upon the desk.

“Ugh… Hi, Ms. Brooks.” You nervously said.

“Listen, Nate…” She began, straightening out the skirt she wore. “Don’t you mind that conversation I just had… Some guys are just complete jerks.” She vented.

“Ugh… I guess I understand.”

She laughed, subtly. “Thanks for trying, Nate, but there’s no way you understand…”

“What do you mean?” You asked, confused.

“Well, it’s just… Nevermind.” She said, crossing her legs on the desk before her.

She then looked to your backpack, and saw the bag of candies you kept tucked in there.

“Ooh!” She chirped. “Nate, could you be a dear and give me one of those candies? I could really use one right now, what with this ugly breakup and all…”

You heart stopped right then and there. “Ugh… Sure?” You said, reaching into the bag of candies, pulling one out, getting up from your seat and going over to her desk to hand it to her.

“Yay!” She giggled, quickly unwrapping it and throwing it in her mouth. “Mmm! That is one good candy!” She exclaimed, sucking on it. Each second hat passed made you more and more nervous for what she could do with it.

“Where’d you get these, Nate?” She asked.

“Ugh… Yesterday was my birthday, and, someone, I’m not sure who, gave them to me.”

“Really? Well, happy belated birthday!” She exclaimed.

“Thanks, Ms. Brooks!” You smiled, attempting to be polite.

She continued to suck on the candy, unknowing of it’s power, or the breasts on your chest.

“I don’t have a gift, or anything like that… But, I have always liked you. Now, I’m gonna give you some advice, Nate.”

“What would that be, Ms. Brooks?”

“Please, call me Judith.”

“Okay, Judith?” You confusedly continued, unknowing of where all this was going.

“Now, my advice to you is this: Don’t become a teacher. The pay is mediocre, the students disrespect you, not taking you seriously, and, since I’m a woman, the males tend to ogle me to no end! I know, being a boy, you don’t have to worry about that, but, still. Teaching; Don’t do it.”

“Ugh… Thanks?”

“No problem!” Ms. Brooks, or Judith responded. You had liked her, not in the crush kind of way, but you liked her as a teacher, and she did seem to be a nice person and all, but, she was a bit strange. There was just something about Judith that had always struck you as odd.

“I’m serious, teaching, don’t do it. This is my second year, and, already it feels like it’s been eternities.”

“I understand.” You agreed.

She gave you a strange look and continued to suck on her candy.

You gave a gulp and looked back at her.
111211111122112.title: There's Something about Judtih

1112111111221121.content:
"Honestly, I just wish I was already on vacation!"

You gasped a bit as you heard that. Did you really just hear that? This could not end well considering what she was sucking on. You noticed that Ms. Brooks gave you a bit of an odd look, which was likely because you had a strange look on your own face. She looked like she was about to say something. However, before any words could be spoken, you immediately saw a bright flash of light, causing you to cover your eyes. It lasted a couple seconds, and by the time you looked again, Ms. Brooks was nowhere to be found.

"Oh no, you gotta be kidding!"

You were a bit freaked out right now. Your teacher just bailed and went on a vacation as the wish implied. So now what were you to do? Did this mean class would be canceled? Did anyone know about it? After all, no one noticed your own breasts, or it might be more accurate to say that nobody saw anything odd about them. You didn't really have much a way to know how this would turn out. With Ms. Brooks on vacation, obviously someone had to take her place, but how would that happen?

Suddenly, you saw some students beginning to file into the classroom, as there was about 10 minutes or so left before class was to begin. You and Ms. Brooks were the only ones in the classroom up to this point. What were you to do? Immediately, you got out the second candy that you had in your pocket and began sucking, trying to think of any solution. Soon, your lips began moving off their own accord.

"I wish our teacher situation was resolved."

You had no idea what exactly that meant. What kind of vague wish was that? You could do better than that. Still, you felt a small jolt, as if something had changed. Out of the corner of your eye, you began seeing some students leave. Confused, you walked over to Eric, someone you knew.

"Hey Eric, what's going on?" You asked.

"Didn't you hear?" Eric replied as if it was normal. "We're getting a new teacher tomorrow apparently. Guess we don't have this period today, not that I have a problem with that."

With that, Eric left along with the others, leaving you really confused. Did your wish just cancel class? Boy, was this confusing. Perhaps it was best to just go along with it for now. You had wished for the situation to be "resolved" but who knew what that entailed. Anyway, you picked up your backpack and looked over Ms. Brook's desk, or at least what was her desk a few moments ago. Her things were still there, and a couple of things stood out to you. Her teacher glasses were still sitting on the desk, neatly folded, and the other was a hair tie.

Which interested you more?
1112111111221121.title: "I just wish I was already on a vacation!...

11121111112211211.content:
Looking at Ms. Brooks' desk, you saw a pair of glasses there. They weren't anything special, just normal black in color. They were pretty simple as you saw most of the time. Her long, mane of blonde hair regressed until they barely reached the tips of the ears, also, changing from blonde to brown, in the process. The soft face features grew more manly, even adding some facial hair above the lips, which lost their feminine mass. An Adam's apple then erupted from the throat area. Lastly, you saw a bulge erupt from the now incredibly tight bikini bottoms. She was a man, a handsome, fit, 25 year old man.

Finally were the clothes. On the former boy's, now woman's ring finger, a beautiful silver plated ring appeared.

"A ring?!" You thought. "Are they... Married?!"

The boy's trunks that the woman wore shifted and contorted, changing material as well, into a blue pair of bikini bottoms. The boy's plain white tee shirt that the woman wore contorted and twisted into a matching bikini top. The bikini there formed was perfect for showing off the beautiful body she now could call hers.

The girls one piece swimsuit the man wore changed from pink to black, and shrank down, to the point that they were only shorts. This left him shirtless. These newly formed shorts then elongated stretching below his knees, leaving much of his new, brawn legs covered. A matching ring, similar, very similar, to that which the woman formed then surrounded his ring finger.

"Yeah, they're married..." You sighed aloud.

The newly created woman spoke up. "Yes, we are married, just a few days ago, actually." She spoke in her soft, sing-song voice, looking at you. She then turned her attention to the man, who wasted no time in taking her into his strong, secure embrace.

The woman continued. "And I couldn't be happier..." She sighed, warmly, clinging to his secure, manly chest. He made her feel safe.

The woman then looked up at the man, who looked down at her, into each other's eyes.

The newly created man spoke. "I love you so much, Honey." He softly assured in his booming, strong voice.

"I love you, too!" She giggled, leaning in for a kiss. Then, the newlyweds did just that. Kissed and loved every moment of it.

"Oooo-kay... Awkward..." You whispered under your breath, slowly getting back to your towel as to lay down.

"I can't believe I just did that... I turned a little boy into a woman, and a little girl into a man..." you looked back at the couple, who were now holding hands and walking along the beach. "And there they go, just walking about as if nothing happened!" You still couldn't get over the sound of your voice.

"Where was I... Ugh... Well, it'll come to me eventually. For now, I'll just lay here and enjoy some sun." You said, digging your feet in the sand and laying on your back. Unknowingly, you reached into your beach bag, grabbed another candy, and placed it in your mouth.

Uh-oh.
11121111112212111211211.title: Wishing again

111211111122121112112111.content:
You had placed another candy right in your mouth after your odd wish. It was probably more out of anxiety than anything else. Before, you just saw a couple of kids arguing with each other. Then, next thing you know it, they're a married couple that just ran off happily along the beach. On one hand it was sweet, and on another, it was just so dang weird. As weird as you and your Dad frolicking around the beach as women.

"This...is so weird." You sighed again, laying down on the towel. The sun felt nice enough, although it didn't make you feel much better. However, after a few minutes, you saw a shadow loom over you. You only needed to see a certain smile before knowing who it was.

"Hey girlfriend, what'cha doing?" To say your Dad was in total character right now would be an understatement.

"...Not much." You sighed again. Carrie casted a knowing smile at you.

"I see that you didn't waste much time making a wish. Turning those little kids into newlyweds? Pretty creative I must say." She smiled again at you.

"I guess so, but I'm not proud of it."

"Oh, no one's the wiser right now. As far as anyone knows, those two have always been this way. They're nice and happy, so you should also be happy." Carrie gave you a wink, hoping you would lighten up. Right as that happened, she ran off again. She said something about wanting to get involved in a beach volleyball game a ways down the beach. There apparently were guys in it too, so she was going to use her body to her advantage. Your former Dad had clearly figured this all out.

Once again, you were by yourself, still sucking on the candy, although you had kind of forgotten at this point. You were thinking about your body. To be honest, you were really good looking. Part of you wanted to show it off somehow, and you weren't going to do it sitting around. Still, how were you going to go about doing it? You slowly got up, wish still in your mouth. You felt like doing something, although you weren't sure what. You were really indecisive right now.

Still, something ended up getting your mind off of it.

"Um, excuse me?"

Who is it?
111211111122121112112111.title: Carrie returns...

1112111111221211121121111.content:
“Uhm… Excuse me?” A small voice squeaked from behind. The small, mouse-like voice immediately tugged you away from your thoughts. You looked behind you, from where the voice emanated from, and saw nothing. Nothing but a skinny, smooth pair of legs, standing there. You looked up to see, exactly, who was standing there. As your sight moved upwards, the person whom was there became clearer and clearer.

Above the bare knees was a small pair of boys’ trunks, colored in shades of blacks and dark blues. Above the trunks was nothing but a completely dry plain white tee-shirt, which appeared to be rather loose fitting on this person. Finallym your vision moved up to behold a young face, a little boys’ face. The boy donned a pair of blue eyes and, on his head was a head of short, blonde hair.

You lay there, on your towel, in fear. In fear of what would become of him. You just turned two kids into a married couple. The fate that beheld this boy was beyond you, but, whatever it would be, this life would not be on your hands, so, in that, you swallowed your wish, the hard-candy dragging down your throat as your struggled to swallow. Finally, it was gone. You weren’t going to have anything done to this boy by your hand.

The boy spoke again, shyly, looking from his feet to your eyes, back and forth. “Excuse me? Miss?” He asked again, squeaking.

You decided now was the time to snap put of it. You got to your feet, dusted yourself off and knelt down as to better communicate with the boy.

“Yes?” You asked, trying to impersonate the sweet tone of a mother to the best of your ability. You sure sounded convincing.

“Uhm… Can you… Uhm…” The boy was clearly incredibly shy, much like you were at that age, up until middle school, actually.

“Yes? Can I what?” You asked, keeping your mom-impersonation going.

“Can you help me find my Mama and Dad? I… I went to the bathroom, and, when I cam back… They were gone.” He claimed, his voice shaking and trembling as if on the verge of tears.

You gave a soft smile and put a hand on his little shoulder. “Hey…” You softly whispered. “It’ll be alright. I promise, we’ll find your parents.” You smiled as you rose to your feet, his eyes following yours as you rose.

The boy simply sniffled and smiled in return. “Okay.”

You extended your hand and he latched onto it, gently, still cautious as he was talking to a ‘stranger.’ And, just like that, the two of you went on your way.

“So,” you began, happily. “What’s your name?” You asked as you moved on.

“Me? I’m… I’m Nicholas. Nicholas Gibson. What’s yours?”

You offered a beaming grin as he asked, looking to you. “Natalie. Natalie Marie Wilson. But, you can just call me Nat. That’s what friends call me. Would you mind if I just called you Nick?”

“No, it’s okay. That’s what my parents and friends call me.” He said. The two of you laughed as you continued.

The two of you walked along the beach, as guys continued to stare at your body. You felt the eyes upon you as you swayed to and from. A few occasional whistles your way sent your eyes rolling. “Jerks…” You thought.

The boy looked up to you as you walked along. “Why are those men whistling at you?” He asked.

“No reason… They’re just… Rude.”

“Oh. I hate it when people are rude like that.” The boy grimaced.

This made you laugh. “Yeah, me too!”

Nick then shifted his vision to your other hand, where you held the bag of candies. He grinned widely.

“Hey! Is that candy! Can I have one?” He asked. This scared the living daylights out of you. You knew this would lead to no good.

“Ugh… I don’t know…” You stopped walking, scratching your head as he stood in front of you, a twinkle in his eyes. “Wow… He really wants one.” You thought.

“Please, please, please, PLEASE?!?! I’ll have just one! Just one!” Nick whimpered.

“No…” You thought to yourself. “I can’t. If I do, who knows what’ll happen… But, he really wants one, and he’s lost, and it’s the least I can do, I guess.” You continued in thought. “But, he doesn’t know they’re magic! He probably won’t wish at all! Everything will be fine.”

“Okay, Nick… Here you go.” You sighed, reaching into your bag and handing him a piece of candy.

“Yay!” He chirped, unwrapping it and placing it in his mouth faster than you’d ever seen. He really likes candy.

“You know…” He started “You’re really nice, and pretty too…” He said, looking you in the eyes.

“Aww…” You blushed. “Thank you, Nick!”

“Yeah… I wish that we could hang out more often!” He wished as he sucked on his candy.

Your eyes dilated in fear. Your heart stopped, your jaw dropped. Fear seemed to have consumed you whole.

“Oh no…” You thought.

“Anyway…” He started. “We should keep looking for my parents…” He said, extending his hand, reaching for yours. Without a word, you grabbed his extended hand and walked along.
1112111111221211121121111.title: A Little Boy

11121111112212111211211112.content:
You weren't sure what to make of this. From what you could tell, these wishes could do anything, and Nick's wish was hardly specific. Wanting to hang out more often? That was as vague as you can get. It also didn't help that you could see Carrie approaching, another bright smile on her face.

"Hey, what's up?" She flashed at you, getting just a shrug from you. She looked down to see who was with you. "Oh, and who's this?"

There were some brief introductions between the group, with Carrie welcoming Nick with a handshake. After a little bit, Carrie figured out that a wish had been used, so you had to explain what was going on. Nick obviously didn't have much a clue as to what the "adults" were saying, but Carrie was intrigued by what could happen. Still, she wasn't going to stick around. There was more fun to be made around the beach, so she quickly left, although she winked at Nick, knowing that he was going to perhaps be beautiful by the time this was over.

"Who was she?" asked Nick.

"A friend of mine." You replied. You definitely didn't want to say anything about the wishes. Nick would hardly understand anyway.

"She's quite pretty." You raised an eyebrow at those words. Didn't sound like something a little kid would say. You looked down at Nick, gasping as you did. Nick was suddenly sprouting up in height, probably surpassing 4 feet at this point. He was looking more like a 10 year old now. You put a hand right to your head; another child was becoming older because of these wishes. How in the world was this going to be explained to the parents? The parents of those kids you turned into a married couple must be wondering by now as well.

"Nat? What's wrong?" asked Nick, putting a concerning hand on Nat. You appreciated the gesture, smiling back at him.

"Oh, it's nothing. How do you feel?" you asked.

"Actually, I feel great since you gave me that candy." smiled Nick. "So, my parents shouldn't be too far. Let's go find them."

You and Nick held hands again, but this time it felt a little bit different. Nick wasn't quite as enthusiastic as before, acting a tiny bit more reserved than normal. Slowly, you saw him grow up more, going past 4'6 and getting even closer to your own height. However, what made you worry was not just that. Certain...parts of Nick were beginning to get a bit bigger, like his hips and butt over everything else.

"Oh no, he's becoming a woman too." You sighed again. Guess the candies loved this or something. It was a bit of a pain watching this over and over again.

"Nat, are you okay? Are you coming down with something?" To you, Nick almost sounded like a mother trying to talk to a kid. As ironic as it was, it was charming in a certain way. You looked down at Nick again. He was still at 4'6, looking more like a teen. However, he had no semblance of male puberty. His body was still hair-free, and you could see his waist staying relatively thin.

Honestly, you wished you could get your mind off it, but you had no candy in your mouth so that was a moot point. Nick kept holding onto your hand, as if he thought you enjoyed it or something. It felt nice in a way, but you weren't sure if you really liked it that much.

"Hey Nat."

"Yes Nick?" You replied.
11121111112212111211211112.title: With Nat and Nick...

111211111122121112112111122.content:
“What are we doing here, again? It seems I’ve completely forgotten…” He sighed, looking up to you as his height raised up to 4’9”.

This caught you completely by surprise. You had no idea what to say, clearly, something was happening to Nick, probably what had happened to you, your Dad, those kids who you turned into a married couple… You provided an answer anyway.

You tried your best to put on a soft smile. “Nick, we were looking for your parents, remember? Your mom and dad?”

Nick slightly cocked his head at you, confusedly. “Uhm… Natalie, I came here with just you and Carrie, wherever that woman is.” He said blankly, as his hips and butt continued to mature. His legs also grew womanly fat about the thighs and calves, providing his legs with great shape and curvature. He looked to be a teenage… Girl? The bulge from his trunks shrank, with time, and his voice even seemed to be growing higher.

“Uhm… Excuse me, Nick?” You asked in a concerned tone, squatting down as to attempt to match his height. With that, Nick rolled his eyes.

“You can get back to your feet, Natalie. You don’t have to be treating me like I’m a child! You can stop holding my hand and patronizing me in general!” Nick fumed.

“Okay.” You said, defeated. “I’m sorry, I guess…” You apologized, scratching the back of your head, releasing his hand from your grasp, which he immediately retracted to grasp his hip, in a womanly manner.

“Thank you.” He said plainly, his height jumping up to 5’. His hips, butt, and legs gaining even more maturity. His hair began to elongate, reaching the lobes of his ears. All and all, he looked to be around 14, maybe 15. The color of the hair seemed peculiar to you, too, as now it appeared to be a mixture between blonde and brunette, almost a mustard-like color. “Eew…” You thought to yourself, grimacing at the sight of the change.

“Now,” he started again, his voice continuing to raise in pitch, his ‘man-parts’ continuing to fade. “We’d better find… Carrie, yeah, I think it was her whom we were on the search for.” He said, leading the way, as his trunks began to shrink, changing from the dark blue color to black, all at once. The shrinking trunks left more leg exposed, garnering the attention of males, much to your disgust. His shirt also faded to black as it, too, shrank, revealing more of his belly area.

“I guess…” You sighed, defeated, following his lead. “Oh, the irony… Now he’s leading me to find my dad…”

The two of you continued scouting the beach, now, in search of Carrie. The idea of Nick’s parents finding you, and Nick, first still scared the living daylight out of you. The parents would behold their son, and… Who knows how they’d react.

As you and Nick strolled the sands of the beach, Nick’s increasingly feminine looks caught the attention of men all about the place. While amongst the strange things of this scenario was that men were ogling a young boy, what managed to ‘take the cake,’ so to speak, was that the young boy seemed to enjoy it, even tossing some of the suitors winks, generally, flaunting his body.

Nick managed to catch you staring queerly at him. He turned your way, with a concerned look about him.

“Nat?” He asked, in a soft, motherly voice. Nick extended his hand and delicately grasped your shoulder. “Is everything alright? You’ve been acting a bit strange the whole time we’ve been here. I’m just concerned, is all.” He said. You weren’t quite sure of how to describe this, the touch he offered felt warm, nice, very comforting altogether.

"Ugh..." You got out of your mouth, in the lack of words. You stood still, speechless.
111211111122121112112111122.title: "What are we doing here again?"

1112111111221211121121111221.content:
"C'mon, Nat, Hon. You know you can talk to me about anything, don't you?" He spoke, compassionately, his voice continuing to raise in pitch, at the same time, maturing. His hair lengthened again, extending down slightly below the shoulders, the blonde hair continued to transition into a darker shade of brunette.

You simply nodded your head.

He definitely sounded like a woman, at this point. Traces of his boyhood, childhood were all fading from existence. The 'manhood' that should have been underneath his shrinking trunks was practically gone. Speaking of his clothes, his trunks were practically short shorts, and, his shirt was a few inches away from a bra. And, was something happening to his chest? The breast area began to swell and balloon in growth. He now stood at 5'3 tall. You shook it off as he, almost she, continued.

"Good!" He chirped, as his legs continued to develop a womanly fat about the thighs and legs, continuing to become more defined and shapely. Little details made themselves known, too. The nails on his toes and now slender fingers had painted themselves in a dark shade of green, matching his now changing eye color.

"Now, what's on your mind, sweetie?" He inquired, his voice getting warmer, almost sultry.

"He's talking to me like he's known me for awhile... A long while." You thought in the back of your head, weirded out to the highest degree. You weren't quite sure what came over you at that moment, but, you thought back to earlier in the day, when you first met Nick. You recalled a problem you were facing, a dilemma, of sorts. Subconsciously, you answered.

"Actually..." You shyly started, clasping your hands together in front of you, blushing a bit. "I'm not sure how to put this... Uhm... I see women all around the beach, like Carrie, showing off their bodies and just, y'know, having fun. Look at me, I know I'm attractive, but, I'm just not sure how to show myself off, put myself out there. Does that make sense?" You asked, genuine concern present in your speech.

"Perfect sense." He smiled, his voice continuing to mature and distort into that of a woman. His height gave one final push to 5'6," where he managed to perfectly match your height. The hair on his head continued to drop down, this time, stopping at the shoulder blades. His eyes grew bigger and had fully changed into a darker shade of green, his eyelashes gracefully growing out to a modest length.

"You see..." He continued, his voice continuing to transition. As he spoke, his lips puffed out to a perfect size, luscious in looks and glittering from the sunlight. His shirt, and trunks, finalized on becoming a black, smooth-looking bikini that looked to be made of a spandex-like material. His fair skin color darkened a few shades, becoming darker, but not to the point where it looked burnt by the violent sun. His dark brunette hair gave one final push as it settled at his mid-back. The bulge between his legs had faded altogether as, all at once, his, now her, breasts puffed out, appearing to be a pair of D-cup sized breasts. He appeared to be right around 30 years of age, slightly older than yourself.

And, there she stood, the woman formerly a boy named Nick. As she stood, smiling to Nat as if nothing had happened, her flawless hair and skin glistened and shone in the sun. She closed her eyes and ran her fingers through her proud mane of hair and smiled softly. As a few men passed her by, whom made no attempt to mask their ogling the new woman, she turned to them, opened her eyes and tossed them a wink, sending the men off into excitement. You noted her subtlety. "You see, sometimes you just have to improvise." She advised to you, in her almost seductive new voice.

If you were shocked before, you were paralyzed now. Just like that, Nick was gone, replaced by this bombshell of a woman, apparently another companion of yours.

"You make it look so easy!" You chirped, unknowingly, almost as if she had always been like this. On the inside, though, you found yourself a bit envious of her, her beautiful figure, her shape, her breasts, everything she seemed to beat you in, and you were younger! "What a show-off..." You thought to yourself. Immediately, you shook it off. "What was I just thinking???? I must be losing it..." You sighed.

"Well, Nick..." You started, "I guess we should find Carrie."

"Please, I'd much rather you call me Nicole, Nat." She said looking you in the eyes.

"Hey, gang!" A familiar female voice chirped from behind you and Nicole. Nicole grinned. "Speak of the devil!" She laughed, looking to Carrie who then approached.

"Oh... Hi, Carrie!" You smiled, looking her way as well.

"Hey, you guys!" Carrie chirped, placing her hands behind her back, holding in a laugh, as if she was in on some sort of secret. Carrie looked to Nicole, then to you and gave a wink. She knew.

"What've you been up to anyway, Carrie?" Nicole asked.

"Oh, y'know, just the usual..." She smiled, digging her toes in the sand below, coyly. "I was just playing around in a volleyball game some group was having. There were a lot of guys, a lot of cute single guys!" Carrie laughed.

"Oh, really?" Nicole asked, as if she was up to something. Nicole and Carrie looked to each other, offered each other a smile and, simultaneously, in perfect synchronization, looked to you.

Nicole began to speak. "Hey, Nat..." She smiled, again, as if hiding some sort of top secret.

"Ugh... Yeah?"

"Didn't you mention something about wanting to show off your body?" Nicole asked.

"Uhm... Yes?" You asked, not at all liking where this was heading.

Carrie grinned, mischievously. "Oh! Did you really say that?" Carrie snickered. She then looked to Nicole and beamed from ear to ear.

"Hey, Nicole?"

"Yes, Carrie?"

Something strange was going on...

"Are you thinking what I'm thinking?" Carrie asked.

"I think so!" Nicole peeped.

"Uh-oh," were the only words you got out before the two of them, Carrie and Nicole, grabbed you by your hands and dragged you off to your doom.

You gave a gulp and wondered where things went so wrong. You just closed your eyes and awaited the torturous acts these two surely had in mind.

"And... We're here!" Carrie exclaimed, clapping her hands in an excited fashion.

You hesitantly opened your eyes and found that the three of you were at...
1112111111221211121121111221.title: You answer.

11121111112212111211211112211.content:
Your head kind of felt like it was going around in circles right now. First, your Dad was now a hot woman called Carrie. Secondly, you turned a couple of bratty kids into a married couple. Now, a lost little boy you met was now a motherly figure towards you. What the heck were you supposed to think?

"Ah, here we are." said Carrie.

You looked over to see the full game set up, and some people already playing. You could make out the married couple that you turned the kids into, and they blended in perfectly with the other adults. It was both weird and interesting to see how they went from building sand castles to beach volleyball.

"Hey Melanie, good serve!" called Carrie to the woman, apparently named Melanie. The lady smiled in return, after she just made a serve. Truth be told, it wasn't much of a match. The guys were too busy looking at the women in swimsuits to care all that much, which didn't surprise you one bit. After a while, they took a bit of a break, with Carrie talking with Melanie.

"So how are things with Peter?" Apparently that was the husband now. Melanie just gushed at the name.

"Very good. We'll be in town for today before he takes me out to dinner. He's such a gentleman." she smiled, which gave your stomach knots. This was supposed to be a little boy, yet she was a perfect adult right now. Nicole even went and talked with her for a bit, and the three ladies went and had a lovely chat. You weren't up to it however, so you just left to walk around a bit. It seemed like another game would start soon, but you weren't interested.

"Excuse me?" You heard a lady come up to you.

"Yes?" You asked.

"Have you seen my son? His name is Nick." she said. That gave your stomach more knots. These were Nick's parents? How were you supposed to explain that their son was now older and certainly sexier than you were now. Simple, you couldn't.

"I'm sorry, but I'm not sure. I'll keep an eye out if you'd like." you offered.

"Thank you. My husband and I will be around this area if you hear anything." said the mother. You just smiled sadly as she left to go back to her husband. You just sighed. You had no idea how to handle this. You were so anxious right now that you didn't even notice yourself putting in another candy. You just wanted to feel better in some way. Any way to make the anxiety go away. Maybe if you actually had someone to talk to....

"I wish I had more company."

Just as you wished that, and the light went off in your head that you used a candy, you saw something off to the side, a bit behind the beach bar. You slowly walked over, wondering what it was. You gasped a bit when you saw. There were two kids there; one boy and a girl. Not ordinary ones though. No, this was Trevor and Nicole (not the other Nicole) who were your little siblings. Well, used to be anyway.

"Huh? Nicole, how did we get here?" asked the 7-year old Trevor.

"I don't know." said Nicole, who was only 5-years old.

What were you to do?
11121111112212111211211112211.title: A game of beach volleyball...

111211111122121112112111122111.content:
You weren't really fond of leaving the kids by themselves, even though they likely had no idea who you were. They weren't there when Carrie turned you into Natalie, so how could they? Still, you had to do something.

"Hello, are you lost?" You asked them, deciding not to try to convince them who you were. Besides, what reason did they have to believe you?

"Who are you?" asked Trevor bluntly. He was always like that; not really minding how he sounded to others. Kind of like other boys his age.

"I'm Natalie, and you both seem lost." you tried to say in a sweet voice as you put your hands on your knees and leaned down to their level. You weren't sure how to react with kids as an adult. Heck, you tried that with Nick, and look what became of him. Well, not much you could do about it now.

"We just appeared here. I don't know why." spoke Nicole, who seemed a bit scared. She was always that way too; naive, sweet, and easily confused. Your parents loved her dearly.

"Well, I'm not sure, but perhaps we can help you find your parents. Do you have anyone you know here?" you asked.

"Big brother Nate just vanished an hour ago. I wanted to ask him something, but he wasn't around. Then, Nicole and I just found ourselves here." said Trevor, not bad an explanation for a kid his age. You nodded, trying to show that you understood. You smiled and held your hand out.

"Let's go and try to see if your brother and parents are here." Trevor eagerly took the hands.

"Thanks, lady. I'm Trevor and this is Nicole by the way." You sadly smiled at that. Trevor was not subtle with his choice of words. It got him into trouble at times, and he got grounded for it a lot. He wasn't naturally mean, but he never understood his words fully. You sighed at those memories, as you still chewed around the candy you had from the previous wish. It was still there, waiting for another wish as you hadn't swallowed yet.

Still, you walked with Trevor and Nicole away from the back of the car. You didn't think the bar was a good place for children. Who would? So, you tried luring them away from it. As you did, you ended up coming across Nick's old mother from before. She gave you a nice hello, so which you responded. Neither of you had found "Nick" yet, so that conversation didn't go anywhere. Trevor laughed a bit once the mother had left.

"Who was that lady? She was huge and all crying!" You sighed again. There he goes with his language again. The kid needed to learn better language. Thank goodness that the mother didn't hear him. You didn't want to explain things to her.

"Trevor, that was not nice of you. What if she heard you?" you asked.

"But really, she was really big!" Apparently, Trevor didn't have much of a grasp on the word. The woman wasn't fat at all; she was normal for her age. Then again, Trevor thought that with their Mom too. He didn't mean anything, but he had yet to learn how rude it was.

Sighing, you muttered to yourself. "Perhaps you need to learn. I wish you could feel what it was like to be as "big" as her."

You immediately slapped your hands on your mouth. Oh no! Not again!

Carrie had an idea of where she wanted to go with the wish, and you didn't feel good about it.

"I wish......"

“wait” you exclaim but too late, your body begins to change according her wish:

You decide to...

Putting aside the remarks from the women, you looked at the towel. As there was no one there, perhaps you could take a break there to clear your mind. Things had been hectic after all. Not just from your Dad's role in this, but from school and all of that as well.

"Well, I guess I could rest. I hope no one shows up to claim the towel. That would be awkward." you spoke to yourself.

With that said, you walked over to the towel, smoothing it down a little bit more so it was straighter. With that done, you positioned yourself on the towel and leaned back, feeling the sun on you.

"Wow, I never figured the sun could be this hot." you said to yourself. "Then again, it doesn't feel bad at all."

The fact that you had no sunglasses was a bit of an inconvenience. What pair you had was still at home after all, and you couldn't wish for them to come to you. Still, laying back on the maroon towel felt....really nice. You allowed yourself to smile as you put your hands behind your head and just took in the sun. No one came and looked at you weirdly for your odd state of dress. Thankfully, your shirt was white, so it didn't make things hotter.

"I guess Dad can wait for now. This is actually nice." you smiled.

You didn't even think about the fact that you were only 5'4 now. Still, that sun was doing wonders for your skin, unknowingly to you. While you weren't exactly tanning much, any blemishes and unwanted hair was started to fade away, leaving clear smooth skin in its place. Everywhere the sun touched did this to you, including your arms. Your legs, which were now a bit longer to compensate for your shorter height, looked long and smooth now. In addition, you felt another small itch on your hands behind your leg, although you didn't pay much mind to it. Your hair was still growing, another inch or so longer than before.

After a few minutes, your eyes opened again, feeling pretty good about yourself despite how odd everything was.

"Nat-" You were about top say 'Nate,' but managed to catch yourself. "I'm Natalie!"

"That's a pretty name..." She complimented. Unknowingly, you blushed with the compliment.

You pulled your longer, lighter hair behind your ears before proceeding. "So, will you please tell me how you got here?"

"Well... It all started at my house. I was walking around, looking for my big brother, Nate, it was his birthday today."

Unknowingly, you asked, "Really? How old is your brother turning?"

"15!" She chirped. "He's old!"

You simply giggled as she continued. "Anyway, I went to my Daddy and asked him where he was..."

"What did your daddy say?" You asked.

"Nothing. He just, put a piece of candy in his mouth, looked at me, and said 'I wish you would join your brother!' And, all of a sudden, I was here!"

You took a sigh. "Of course it was Dad..." You echoed in your head.

"Well..." You sighed, scratching the back of your head. "I've got an idea!" You exclaimed, getting up to your feet. "Why don't you and me go and walk around here and look for your brother? He has to be here, somewhere."

"Yeah! I think I like that idea!" She exclaimed, with hope in her voice.

You looked to her confusedly. You could have sworn that you saw Nicole bounce in height two or three inches. Her hair also seemed to elongate about another two inches, as well. You didn't feel good about this, you knew Dad was behind all of this.

"Come on, let's go!" You warmly urged, extending a hand to Nicole's. You may have been in a different body, a woman's body, but she was still your sister. And you know that your sister, in these larger, more open areas, like the beach, she liked to have a hand to hold as not to get lost.

Nicole looked to your hand as if insulted. "Uhm... I like that you're helping me and all, lady, but I don't need to hold anyone's hand." She snapped, walking ahead of you.

"That was odd... Nicole always needs a hand to hold, otherwise, she'll surely be left horrified! Plus, the way she spoke to me... I know that five year olds don't speak like that... Something doesn't seem right..."

You followed after Nicole, not quite sure of what to expect.

"So, Nicole..." You began. "Where should we start to look? Any ideas as to where your brother would be?"

Nicole put a finger to her chin as she grew taller still, another inch. Nicole was in thought, a deep thought. This was also an odd sight to you. Whenever the Nicole that you knew was in thought, she would always stop, sit down, and suck her thumb, lightly. Finally, her face brightened with a smile.

"Yeah, I think I might know where he is..." She smiled, laughing a little. You noted this, the language she used was further changing.

"Where?" You asked.

"Nate would be..."
11121111112212111222121111111.title: Brother and Sister

111211111122121112221211111111.content:
...somewhere on the beach, looking for girls!"

You were surprised to see what was happening to her. She was a little under 4 feet to start, but now she was clearly at least 4'1 tall. Not to mention, the way she talked, it was far from the usual way she spoke. It was almost like how a teenager would talk, which was weird given her appearance. Based on her height, you would think she was about 10 years old or so, and her "Hello Kitty" t-shirt was showing her belly button to the world. Her shorts seemed a bit tighter, not really covering much of her legs at all. Her feet were bare, as she was obviously inside whenever she was wished here. In addition, her hair was originally pretty short, around ear-length or so, but now it was beginning to reach her neck.

"Excuse me?" You asked her. You wanted to be sure you were hearing right.

"Nate would definitely be checking out girls on the beach. I mean, what kind of guy would he be if he didn't?" Nicole just smiled, as if it was so obvious.

"Well....I guess that's true." You really didn't know what to say. This little sister of yours was beginning to speak like a teenager, and you weren't sure about that. Was your Dad making changes to her like you? What was Nicole becoming? You honestly felt like saying something, and yet, something in you wanted to calm down and keep going normally. You valued Nicole like a sister, although something strange seemed to be going on. Nicole was your sister....right? Oh, this was so confusing.

"Come on, let's go!" Nicole started going forward towards the main area of the beach, away from the secluded spot you both were before. For now, you felt like going along with Nicole, searching for her "brother" along the girl-filled beach.

Nicole stopped and turned to you again, still smiling. You held your gasp as you slowly saw her grow more, close to 4'3 so far, almost like a 12-year old. Her hair was barely touching her shoulders now, and her face was losing baby fat quickly. Her shirt and shorts were even more tight, although she didn't seem to mind.
