"You're right about that." You put your hands on your mouth, although they didn't stay there. Part of you thought that it didn't sound that bad. Heck, you had a nice rack and butt yourself. What guy wouldn't like them? This was getting a bit weird.

"Of course. Well enough standing around, I should start looking." said Nicole as she started scratching her chest. Her "Hello Kitty" shirt was really tight, to the point where her sleeves were barely covering her arms, and the hem was barely covering the itchy part of her chest. To your surprise, you saw parts of her shirt and shorts beginning to gain spots of red.

Nicole started running along the beach, looking for "Nate", while you followed behind. You weren't sure what you were doing, although you started to enjoy just being around Nicole. She was a valuable friend of course....Wait, what? Nicole was a friend? Of course, you had known her for so long, even though she was older than you. You shook your head after that. Where did that come from?

"Dang, where is he?!"

You turned your attention back to Nicole, jaw dropping again. She sprouted up more in height, reaching 4'6 and looking like a 17-year old. Her hips and ass were beginning stretch her shorts, which were turning more red by the minute. Her t-shirt was barely holding on, almost as red. Her hair was now a bit past her shoulders, looking more silky and smooth. Her baby fat was mostly gone, showing real womanly beauty.

"What is she now?" You asked yourself.

choices: You decide to stay at the beach for a while...
You decide that you're (finally) tired of the beach...
1112111111221211122212111111111.content:
You watched with mixed feelings as Nicole continued her search about the beach, going from group of guys to group of guys searching for this "Nate," person, whoever he was. "Wait, what's going on? Why would I think that? That's me... But... I'm... Natalie, now... I WAS Nate."

You looked to the ever maturing Nicole in a certain sense of surprise. It seemed like, the longer this search went on, the more motivation and morale Nicole lost to finding "Nate." The sense of urgency Nicole had at the beginning of searching for this guy was gone. Instead, Nicole seemed much more lax as she searched on. But, at this point, Nicole seemed to be 'browsing' the guys at the beaching rather than 'searching.'

Finally, Nicole, with the sways of her widening, and maturing, hips, walked up to you, seemingly done with her little search. At this point, the changes you saw in her hardly bothered you. If anything, the elongating of her shining, brunette hair almost to her mid-back was familiar, though, you still couldn't exactly recall how this was familiar. "Weird..." You thought.

Nicole shot up some more in height, you estimated, more or less, she was about 4'10". The features about her had matured, no doubt. The aforementioned baby fat was completely gone, replaced by that matured, womanly fat, especially about the legs. You were always so jealous of Nicole, for that reason, all this, and she still looked to be about 22. Anyway, regardless of your envy of your friends... No... Sisters...? Anyway, despite your subtle envy of Nicole's looks, she spoke up.

"Hey, Nat? I think I've had my fun here... I actually forgot what I was doing out there, all that running around, in the first place. Do you have any idea?" Nicole inquired, her age shooting up to 24 right along with her height, right to 5'2". Her hair finalized at the mid-back as it stretched there, leaving a mane any woman would take pride in, and any guy would love to have in his hands.

"Ugh... Actually, Nikki... I also have no idea what you've been doing... As weird as that sounds." You shrugged, scratching the back of your head.

"Well... That's weird. Come to think of it... I can't remember any of the last few hours for some reason... Everything is a blur!" Nicole stated, her voice becoming more honey-like and sultry by the second. "Well, whatever the reason, I could use a beverage. But, I have no money..." Nicole looked to you as her age continued progressing to 27, older than you, her height extending to 5'5". As she spoke, her lips became fuller and her clothes continued contorting. The shorts she once donned had a certain bikini shape about them, and now looked more like bikini bottoms than shorts... Even the material from which the shorts were made had now looked more like a red, almost maroon, nylon. Same for the shirt, which lost the cotton-like texture about it, and almost looked to be a bikini top, but, still, it looked more like a really small shirt.

"Hello? Nat? Earth to Nat? You there, girl?" Nicole waved and snapped in front of your face.

"What?" You asked, confusedly.

"Nat? I was just saying how I don't have any money and really want a drink!" Nicole reiterated.

"And...? I don't have any cash either..." You said.

"That's not what I'm talking about! Look at all those guys at the bar!" Nicole then proceeded to grab you by the shoulders and turn you to face the bar she spoke of. It was true. Earlier, when you yourself sat there, the place was empty. Now, it was completely infested by men.

"Nat, look at us. We're pretty dang gorgeous! And you know guys'll do anything, anything," Nicole emphasized, "... To get with women like us. Even buy us a few drinks!" Nicole chirped, her new, more mature, womanly voice, still made a part of you cringe. But... then again, why would you cringe, she's always had one hell of a voice.

"Oh! I get it! Sounds fun!" You smiled, without even recognizing it.

"Geez, Nat, I thought you were the smart one! Let's go!" She laughed, swaying her hips and walking, slowly, towards the little shack ahead,

"Whoa..." You thought to yourself... "That was weird... Since when did my own sister start calling me Nat... And since when did I start calling her Nikki... Sister? We're not related... I... I guess we're as close as sisters... But... Those names... Oh, yeah! We gave each other those nicknames when we first started hanging out in High School! Good times. We met when she tried to flirt her way out of a failing grade with a guy teacher. She bombed that thing! Good times!" You smiled, walking towards the bar. "Wait... What was I just...? Never mind..."

By the time you walked in, Nicole was beginning to work her 'magic' with some guy, who looked to be a little older than you, around Nicole's age... You rolled your eyes and laughed. "Typical." You sighed, contently as you took a seat next to her.

Nicole crossed her legs, really close to this guy, to the point where her legs were rubbing this guy about, clearly an attempt to make contact. Nicole coughed a few times. As she coughed, her bikini completed itself as the sleeves of her former shirt faded all together. The collar once there dipped down to her cleavage in a V-neck shape. She now donned a beautiful, maroon colored bikini that very well complimented her fair, if only slightly tanned, skin.

Nicole finally managed to get the guy's attention. He turned to her and the two smiled.

"Hey," Nicole smiled as her age and height rose again, her age finalizing at 30, her height, 5'7".

"Hey." The guy smiled as he scanned Nicole from her head to her toes. He was interested, clearly. Even you could tell. As he checked her out, features finalized. Her arms and legs became even more slender and shapely, defined in maturity. Fingers and toes slender. Lips were full and kissable. Her eyes were certainly bigger. Even her breasts enlarged, inflating like balloons all the way to a mild D-cup, leaving your modest C-cups in the dust.

"Hi, I'm Nicole... Nicole Williams... What's your name, cutie?"

The guy blushed a little. You found him totally cute as you watched him fall for Nicole. Alas, he'd only be in for disappointment, seeing as Nicole was a total flirt.

"Uhm... They call me, Michael, Michael Hayes."

"Well, Michael, mind buying me a drink? I'm all out of cash, and this girl would really appreciate it." She said, leaning in on him as she did.

"Ugh... Sure! Yeah, sure! What do you want?" He asked.

"Just whatever you're having, and, make it to go, why don't you and I walk a little, my friend here can take care of herself..." Nicole then turned to you, looking at you with a smile, winking. "Sorry, Nat! You can take care of yourself, can't you?"

You smiled, giving a small giggle as you did. "Of course."

Michael paid for Nicole's beverage, got up from his seat, and took her by her hand. "Shall we?" He asked.

"Ooh! A gentleman!" Nicole laughed, blushing, taking his hand and walking off, farther and farther from Natalie's sight.

"Oh, Nikki... You've always been one hell of a flirt." You walked in the opposite direction, back to the towel where you lay, the place where this all started. You sat there, laying down, looking at your legs, wiggling your toes, clearly bored. You looked back to the direction in which Nicole and Michael had gone off to. They were long gone, out of sight. As you realized Nicole was gone, you felt like something was missing, off. Like someone, more than a friend, almost a sister, had fled. Something was definitely wrong, you couldn't quite put your little finger on it. But, whatever it was, you knew your dearest friend... Best friend, Nicole Williams, would return, eventually.

You took a sigh of contentment, smiled, and rose to your feet.

"What to do now..."
1112111111221211122212111111111.title: They Grow up so Fast...

11121111112212111222121111111112.content:
Things had done so topsy-turvy here at the beach. You were now a mature and hot woman. Your friend was older than you and running off with a man to do who knows what by now. And yet, there was still contentment, as if this was nothing new. Nicole was always like that. You laughed a bit at how you would see her act around guys since High School. She had tried giving you tips even, although it kind of contrasted with your personality.

"You know, perhaps it's time to leave for now. I think we've all enjoyed ourselves here." You giggled a bit as you got up, grabbing the towel as you did. No one came to claim it, so you naturally began to think of it as your own. No one would likely miss it after all. You folded the towel in your arms in to a neat square, tucking it underneath your arms. Looking up at the sky, you could tell that it was probably around mid-day right now, so you had been here for a good amount of time. Of course, the next time you saw Nicole, she'd probably want to come back.

Smiling to yourself as you thought that, you began walking past the beach, getting a few more looks here and there as you did. Your hand slightly adjusted your bikini subconsciously. You had some good C-cups, while paled compared to Nicole's "melons", which she would sometimes call them. To think that she was once an innocent child. Now she was definitely a woman who knew her body. Then again, you did to, as you noticed a couple of other guys looking. Still, you were done for the day here, so it was time to leave. Anyway, you walked a bit of a ways out, heading back into the building next to the beach, which housed locker rooms to change in and out. Without hesitation, you entered the Women's locker. There weren't any people in there right now, so it gave you some privacy as you just walked towards a locker, pulling out a sports bag. At the same time, the bag was both familiar and unfamiliar, but you knew it was yours anyway.

You got yourself a little stall and stripped off your newly purchased bikini, letting your breasts hang for a bit. You actually looked at them for a second. This was the first time you had seen them naked since becoming a full woman. And wow, it felt really nice. They went along well with your nice and bigger butt, especially as you took your bottoms off. Admiring aside though, you opened the bag up, revealing a set of clothes with some footwear. The clothes consisted of a nice sky blue sundress, and some nice sandals for daily use. You immediately thought they were cute as you put a clean bra on and the rest of the clothes.

You smiled as you liked how nice the dress felt. It flowed around your legs nicely, and felt nice when it showed a bit of cleavage. You also found a purse, which was expected, and slung it over your shoulders.

"Well, time to go."

You packed the bag up with your wet clothes and walked out of the locker building, heading towards a nice Dodge Charger, your own car.
11121111112212111222121111111112.title: You decide that you're (finally) tired of t...

111211111122121112221211111111121.content:
The radio of your car softly played some pop song, that, under normal circumstances, you know you'd never listen to. The teenage boy mind you once possessed would never allow you to keep this wretched song from continuing! But, as the wind coming into your car from your rolled down windows made your cotton dress flow about your soft, smooth legs, you knew these were far from normal circumstances. You even found yourself humming along, cheerfully.

"Sounding better and better by the minute!" You laughed, continuing to press your foot against the gas pedal, raising the volume.

Still, in the midst of this newfound sense of freedom, joy, something felt off. You looked in the rearview mirror and saw the beach, getting smaller and smaller as you rode on. Finally, all together, the beach was gone from your sight. You looked ahead, still feeling as if you've just left something more than your crazy ol' friend, Nicole, behind.

"Nowhere to go but forward, I guess." You sighed, as you pressed the break at the red light you beheld.

"But..." You thought again, "...Where is 'ahead?'" This was all a mystery to you. How were you to know where to go from here? The uncertainty was unbearable. You had no idea who you were, other than your name and the high-school you attended. Other than those things, and a single friend, your origins were a mystery.

"Where do I live? Who's my family? Who am I?" You asked yourself aloud, the questions running through your panicked mind like a fever.

You had to kill time and find answers, this much was certain. "But, still, where to go?"

As you sat at yet another red light, you leaned against the window, woman or boy, the treacherous red light felt like an eternity.

"... Still would've rather driven for the first time as a boy..." You sighed. Speaking of which, you had never driven before! You got behind the wheel once, when you were 13 or 14, but, that lasted only a few seconds. The car wasn't on either, you were only looking to gain a feel for it, for when you'd be blessed with the sweet, sweet coming of age.

You looked down to your dress. "Is this the only article of clothing I have? I can't just keep wearing this. It's nice and all..." You said, rubbing the dress on your thigh as you drove on. "... But, I can't keep using this one dress for everything!"

Your eyes widened. "Idea!" You sang, in your high-pitched voice.

"I should hit the mall! Clothes, food. Maybe I'll even find answers!"

You had no idea why, of all places, the mall was your first thought. But, it was the closest thing to an idea you'd had since the beach. So, why not?

"Ahh!" You peeped, smiling. "Right on cue!"

There, on the horizon, awaited your destination. None other than the Grant Memorial Mall, the entertainment hub of your town. A ton of places to eat, a movie theatre, ice rink, tons of stores, and, for some reason, one thing that caught your attention were all the really nice clothing stores; The works.

As you pulled up to the mall, it was the usual, busy day here at the mall. All that beheld you was a sea of cars.

"Dang!" You exclaimed. "Where am I supposed to park now?!"

As if your prayers had been answered, you looked out your window, to your left, ahead of you; A single, lone parking space.

"Life is good!" You smiled, pulling your car in.
111211111122121112221211111111121.title: Normal Circumstances

1112111111221211122212111111111211.content:
You pulled your car into the empty space, thanking the fact that you could find a space at all. Must have been sheer luck, but that wouldn't stop you. You slowly came to a stop, parking the car and turning it off. You got your keys out and stepped out, putting your sandaled feet on the concrete. It was nice to see somewhere other than the beach, making you smile. Perhaps you could have some fun here, and maybe even some lunch. The wind whipped around you, playing with your skirt a bit, which made you hold it down a bit.

"Silly wind." You said with almost a ditzy voice. It was more you just joking around though. You felt really free right now, kind of like how the skirt allowed your legs more freedom than those old jeans. There was a weird thought.

Anyway, the mall was your destination, so you began walking there immediately. There weren't many people in the parking lot itself, leaving you to believe that everyone was likely in the mall. At least it gave you some quiet time to yourself, in contrast to that noisy beach. Still, your thoughts centered on the things that had happened. You were no longer some scrawny teenager who didn't know how to drive yet. No, you were a nice woman who....actually you had idea what you were doing. What kind of person were you now? You didn't know the answer.

Not to mention the weird effects with Nicole, or Nikki or whoever. Was she always so forward with people? You had an image of her being sweet and innocent, but not so much now. Really, really weird.

"I wonder if it could get much weirder." You said to yourself as you approached the mall.

Suddenly, you felt as if there was a small flash of light to your right side, although you mistook it for a flash of light from a windshield. You didn't pay it much attention, if any at all. However, what definitely got your attention was the feeling of something running into your leg, almost knocking you to the ground.

"Ouch!" Both you and whatever ran into you yelled. You turned down after checking your leg, seeing a little boy there. He appeared around 7 years old, and didn't look like someone who would be outside right now. He was wearing socks as if he was just inside a minute ago, and his shirt was something you'd expect from a boy his age, along with tiny shorts.

However, a name suddenly came to you, making you remember.

"Trevor! What are you doing here?" You asked the boy. Trevor looked at you oddly.

"Hey lady, how do you know me? And where am I?" Trevor's vocabulary was a little more developed than Nicole's was at that age, and he could use it well, even though he certainly wasn't versed in the words of teens and adults. Still, you wanted to ask how he got here. Was this Dad's work again?

"Um, well I don't know. I just saw my Dad a minute ago, and I just appeared here. And it's kind of cold." He shivered a bit from the wind. This was certainly no place for a kid right now, especially so ill-prepared for outside weather.

"Here, come with me." With that, you rushed him inside the mall, getting you both out of the wind.
1112111111221211122212111111111211.title: Through the parking lot...

11121111112212111222121111111112111.content:
"It's getting really cold out here!" Trevor whined as you hurriedly dragged him by the hand, at the same time, you held your dress down as to avoid... Exposure of what was under your dress.

"Don't worry, Trevor!" You assured, looking your younger brother in his eyes. "We're almost there!"

Finally, as you were barreling towards the door, a man saw you coming and held the door open. "Thanks!" You said, passing him, leaving him in the dust.

Alas, both you and Trevor were inside the mall, in this case, some cheap department store. The place wreaked of a plethora of scents and fragrances, filled with the chatter of passers by and that monotonous elevator music could be heard in the background. You were short of breath, what from the rush. You had to take a seat.

"Whoo!" You tiredly cried. "Trevor..." You breathed. "How are you holding up?"

"I'm great now! It's nice and warm in here!" He proceeded to take the seat next to you, his feet far from the ground. His stomach immediately let out a violent growl.

"Uh oh..." He sighed, holding his belly. You looked to him, giggling a bit.

"Uh-oh indeed!" You laughed. "I take it you're hungry?"

"Yeah..."

"You want to get something to eat with me?" You offered.

"Sure! Thanks, Lady!"

"Please, you can call me Natalie."

"Alright, Natalie!" He exclaimed. You then extended your hand, which he grabbed tightly as the two of you headed for the food court. Fortunately for the two of you, the food court was the farthest thing from a long walk, right outside the store you two were at, actually. Because you knew your brother so well, you knew to head to the pizza joint across from the Burger King.

The line, as per usual, was pretty lengthy, and, the feeling of men staring at you and whistling to you as they walked along didn't help either.

"In front of my little brother..." You thought to yourself. "Jerks."

Looks like you two had time to kill, given the line.

"So..." You began. "You never really finished telling me how you got here? You said something about your Dad and a wish he made, or something?" You inquired, bending down a bit as to match his height.

Before he could even answer, you shot him a peculiar look. Right before your eyes, his height had increased just the slightest bit, from his normal 4'2" to about 4'4." A couple of inches. The dark brown hair on his head also grew a shade lighter as it, too, elongated a couple of inches. His legs and arms also developed a bit more. But, despite the changes, he answered as if nothing happened. Now, he looked to be around... 8 or 9.

"Yeah, it was weird!" He exclaimed. "First, I walked into his office, and, I saw him sitting on his chair, holding this jar of candies really close to him. He was mumbling something about my older brother, Nate and my little sister, Nicole. I was going to ask him where they were, 'cause, I hadn't seen them all day. He didn't even answer! The moment he saw me, POOF! I was here, with you."

"Yeah, that does sound... Weird." You agreed.

"Yeah..." He agreed, his height growing to 4'6," his body changing around to be proportionate. His hair, too, lightened in color, now resembling a light brown, and lengthened another couple of inches. He looked to be about 10 years old. But, something about his frame... It didn't look like a boy's body...

You closed your eyes in disbelief, taking a deep breath in and out as you did so. "Not Trevor, too!" But, you kept this to yourself.

"But, I'm glad he did..." He said, looking into your eyes, his voice not deepening, but, keeping that higher pitch it had.

"Come again?" You asked. You were utterly shocked. Glad? He didn't even know who you were!

"I said I'm glad he did! I've always enjoyed spending any extra time I had with you, Natalie!" He smiled.

"Ugh..." Speechless. You stood there speechless until your attention was caught. And, was it just you, or were Trevor's speaking skills becoming really, really good?

"Next!" The man at the register of the pizza place called to you and Trevor. "The line's already passed?" You thought. "I guess time does fly when you're having fun..."

"Yay!" Trevor laughed. "Come on, we're finally up!" he then rushed over to order. You followed along, not as rushed.

"So, what'll you two ladies be having today?" The man inquired.

"DID HE SAY 'LADIES?'" You panicked, in thought.

"Yeah! Natalie, you're up first!" Trevor looked to you.

"Ugh... I'll just have a salad. Just a regular Caesar Salad with a water..."

Trevor chimed in. "Yeah, I'll have the same!"

Trevor hated salad.

"Alright... Your total will be... 10$ flat." The man sighed, hitting various keys on his register.

"Okay..." You said, reaching into your purse, pulling out a 20$ bill, handing it to the man, your mind, still a jumble. Something was... Off.

The man wasted no time in handing you your change, a receipt and your order. Silently, you handed Trevor's salad to him.

"Oh, finally! I'm starved!" Trevor chirped, very much in a feminine manner, as he contently walked over to an empty table.

"What is going on...?" You followed.
11121111112212111222121111111112111.title: Trevor's Story

111211111122121112221211111111121111.content:
On a scale of 1 to 10, this was just plain weird. You already knew about the whole Nicole situation, but this was even weirder. Trevor possibly becoming a woman too? You couldn't really say anything about it. Who would believe you? Besides, your Dad had your candies, so you could really do nothing but wait it out. But what kind of woman could little Trevor become?

"Natalie, over here!"

You heard Trevor call you over, and you slowly began walking to him. He looked so weird in his tight clothes and socks, which somehow stayed on. Apparently, no one else found it weird to see a boy like him. His shirt was beginning to show a little waist, including his bellybutton. His shorts looked pretty tight, especially with those tiny female curves coming in. His socks were especially tight on those growing feet. Still, you sat down opposite on him and gave him his own salad.

"This looks good."

"But I thought you hated salad." Trevor raised an eyebrow. As he did, you almost gasped as you saw him sprout up a couple more inches, going up to 4'10. He almost looked 11 or 12 years old right now. Just how far would it go?

"What do you mean? I've always liked it." He reasoned.

"Huh?" you said to yourself. Was he becoming some kind of model? Who else would say that? Still, there seemed to be a certain shyness to Trevor's words, making him blush a bit. Somehow, it was both cute and attractive. You also noticed as he ate that his hair continued to lengthen, becoming a bit lighter as it reached his shoulders. It now was getting a lovely sheen to it.

"You know, your hair looks very nice." You smiled.

"Oh really? Thank you." blushed Trevor. "I've tried to look more like you. A lot of people don't think I'm anything like you."

"You're better than that. You know that." You replied. Trevor beamed a smile at you as you did.

The conversation seemed a bit better after that. Trevor made occasional comments about random things, while you mostly smiled and nodded. It seemed nice to have a pleasant conversation like this. The old Trevor was too hyper to stay still for anything, but now he seemed a bit more mellow with his emotions. It wasn't a bad thing, although it was still weird.

"I'm just glad I get to see you more often since we moved closer to you." Trevor said.

"What?" you ended up asking.

1112111111221211122212111111111211111.content:
You looked to Trevor and smiled, despite the peculiar situation at hand. He wiped his face with a napkin before he grabbed all the trash from the table, placed it on a tray and smiled.

"That sure was good." He laughed, walking towards a trashcan. "Just like old times, huh?" He looked to you, walking away from the food court, you followed his lead, he seemed to have more of a clue than you.

"What? Old times?" You asked. You didn't know what to say other than that. You were completely stumped, clueless. "What are you talking about?"

"Wow, are you alright there, cousin Natalie?" Trevor looked to you confused, as his height hopped up to a solid 5' tall. His hair gave one last push as it grew a few inches past his shoulders, leaving his hair a pleasant shade of brunette versus the darker brown hair once his own. His legs also looked abnormally shapely and curved, for a boy his age. Clearly, he wasn't a child anymore, he was maturing, but not into a man... Those legs were way too soft looking. The stares that teen boys gave Trevor's legs scared you, but noting could drill fear into you more than the fading bulge between his legs. Trevor looked to be a 13 year old... Well, you weren't quite sure of a 13 year old 'what,' he was.

"Uhm... What?" You inquired again, regaining your focus. "And, did he just call me 'Cousin?'"

Trevor looked lost. "I was asking if you're alright. So... Are you? You've been acting... Not yourself the whole time. You didn't even remember what I was talking about when I said 'Just like old times.'"

"I still don't know what you're talking about!" You argued.

Now Trevor looked stunned. "Come with me..." He sighed, gesturing for you to follow his lead.

Curiously, you followed right behind. As you looked ahead of you, where Trevor was walking, you noticed his hips, but and legs were definitely more defined. Boys' hips did not sway like that. That had to be a girls' butt on him, too... "Strange..." You thought.

Much to your surprise, Trevor led you not to the toy store of his choice, but, rather, a locally owned bookshop.

"Books?!" You thought to yourself. "Books are the last thing that'd be on Trevor's mind!"

But, whether it was Trevor in that body or not, he walked right in. You were in pursuit. As you walked in, Trevor seemed to know his way around, well. Like he'd been here all the time. Even the staff seemed to know him, greeting him by a foreign name, completely new to you.

"Hey, Claire!" A man at the register called, waving Trevor's way. "Weird..." You thought, looking at the man as if he were crazy.

"Hi, Mr. Schriver!" Trevor responded, joyously. "Weirder... Why would Trevor respond to 'Claire?'" Well, whatever was happening, you thought it best to move right along.

"Uhm... Claire? Why would you respond to Claire, Trevor?" You asked, as Trevor stopped to examine some books, his height picking up to 5'2," as his chest expanded to small bumps, what you were sure would, in no time, be breasts. You looked to his crotch, and, nothing was there. He was a she. The shorts, at this point, were hardly pants at all, resembling a skirt, black in color and composed of cotton. The skirt was loose, and began to lengthen rather rapidly, quickly reaching an inch or two under mid thigh. Her socks had all together faded into what looked to be socks for ballet flats, leaving his smooth legs exposed.

Finally, Trevor closed the book, slipped it under her arm and looked to you. "I don't know, cousin Natalie, maybe I responded to Claire because that's my name? There you go being weird again!!" She freaked out, in her new, unfamiliar to you, feminine, soft voice. "I'll explain in due time, let me just get a few more books before you act all weird again..." She said, walking through the halls of bookshelves, examining texts of all sorts. Romance novels, drama novels, books that told of things of fantasy; Books of all sorts. Before you knew it, her arms were full of books.

"Alright, let's head to the usual spot." Trevor said, arms full of books, her height finalizing at 5'5," her age jumping to 15. On her chest was a moderate pair of young female breasts. It was nearly done.

You had to ask. "Where's the usual spot?"

You heard her sigh. "Just follow me..."

She then proceeded to lead you to small table for two in the coffee shop that was in the center of the bookstore. There, she placed all of her books on the table before throwing herself onto one of the chairs before sighing a content sigh.

"Ahh! I love this place sooo much!" She chirped.

"So... You wanna fill me in here?" You asked, concerned. "You haven't been making sense all day! First, you talked about moving here, then, you called me 'cousin!'" And, in lunch, you were talking about having moved here from some other place, who knows where! Then, you sounded as if we've been doing this whole bookstore and mall thing all of our lives! I think you should update me, 'cause, I'm lost!" You finished your speech, leaning on the table as you did. Your lean caused one of the books to fall to the floor.

"Could you get that, cousin?" She asked. You sighed as you bent below the table to reach for the book. As you were down there, you noticed the magic was working fast, really fast. You saw that, on her feet were a black pair of ballet flats, which, she wore really well with that skirt, actually. And, under her skirt was a pair of... Pink panties. You groaned in disturbance as you got back up, placing the book on the table.

"Thank you." She said. And, right there, as you were obtaining her book, she now wore a V-neck, maroon, sleeveless blouse. Gone was the Marvel superhero decorated shirt. Her change was hopeless. Trevor was gone. Dad had done it again.

"Dad..." You sighed in your mind as Claire continued... That name would take some getting used to.

"Clearly you're lost!" Claire began. "So, if you must know, here's our history, in short..." She said, placing a bookmark into one of her books then placing it down on the table.

"You're my cousin, Natalie. I'm your cousin, Claire Michaels. 15 years old and a high-school student. I really like to read, you started taking me to the mall ever since I was in elementary school and you were going to the local college here, studying to be an English teacher. You were 21 at that time. We'd come here, and we'd read, in this very spot." She explained, slowly, as if you were a moron.

"Go on..." You urged.

"... I said 'just like old times,' earlier, in reference to those times. I said I moved here, because, up until last year, we lived farther up North, and, I'd only come to visit you and your family. We moved because my Dad, Richard Michaels, got a job here at the Middle School you teach at. When the school you work at started looking for math teachers, you put in a good word for my Dad, and, he was hired, so we moved here. It was great!"

As strange as it may have sounded, it was beginning to ring a bell. You were beginning to remember it, all of it. You remember being a college English student at the local university. You even recall taking a much younger Claire to the bookstores coffee shop, so you can study while she read and ate. She like it so much, it got to the point where it was her favorite hobby, of sorts, you recall Claire calling it a passion, saying she also wanted to be like you and become a teacher in English.

You even remember putting in a good word for her Dad, your Uncle Richard, who was a total math geek, who you also knew secretly wanted Claire to be a math student in college, like him. Obviously, he knew that wasn't going to happen. When he got hired at your school, you recall Claire calling you, and, the two of you speaking about all the fun you'd have. Just like old times.

You massaged your head softly, as if getting over some violent headache.

"Oh... Now I remember everything, Claire!" You exclaimed, looking her in the eyes. She smiled a soft smile, her brunette hair shining in the soft lights of the book store. "I'm... I'm so, so sorry. I have no idea what got into me! It was almost like I was... Someone else. It was weird!"

"Yeah, it was weird!" She laughed. "Now, why don't you grab a few books, come back here and I'll get us some coffees."

"I'd like that." You smiled.

"Just remember, I've got to be home in an hour! My parents said so, and, you know how they get!"

As you walked off, you looked to Claire reading her books and smiled, proud of the young woman she's become. She always wanted to be like you, and, you're just glad she was coming to be her own woman.

At the same time, you were totally aware that that girl had just been Trevor. You dreaded what would become of your Mom, your younger sister, Erin. And all at the hands of your father. But, even though you had just watch your younger brother fade from reality, you smiled in content, seeing he had transitioned into a happy young lady.
1112111111221211122212111111111211111.title: Seems like old times

Although, some things Claire said stuck with you a bit. She mentioned you teaching at the local Middle School, although that part seemed kind of vague. You remembered all the things Claire mentioned, although the whole "school" thing still seemed hazy. Was that another large part of your life? "Well cousin Natalie, it's time to go! Don't want Mom and Dad to be cross, right?"

"Oh, er, right." You agreed.

Pushing those thoughts aside for now, you and Claire began leaving. She did end up buying a couple of the books that she found really interesting. You could tell that she had a bright future as a teacher, and that made you smile. You both walked out of the mall, with the weather still a bit nippy from earlier. Both of you were in skirts, so you both had to pull them down, which kind of made you two laugh a bit playfully. After a minute, you both reached your car, and were on the way to Claire's house, which wasn't too far away from your house.

"Thanks for the books, cousin Natalie!" Claire beamed.

"You're very welcome. It's a nice reward for the good grades you've been getting too."

"Thanks." Claire blushed a bit at the praise. She could be so confident one second and then shy the next. You imagined she probably had some fans somewhere.

Anyway, you did remember the address of Claire's home. It was 3987 Bristle Dr., and it was about 10 minutes or so away from where you at least used to live. Boy, was that confusing to think. You pulled into the neighborhood, seeing not many cars around. Seeing the correct address, you pulled in, allowing Claire to get out. She looked around, not seeing her parents' car around.

"Hey cousin! Would you like to come in? My parents don't seem to be home yet."

When she pulled it out, she saw it was one of her old X-Men comic books. Erin took a glance and saw Jean Grey on the cover. That's when it hit her.

"A phoenix!" Erin exclaimed. Not the superhero, but the actual mythical animal. Erin was fascinated by the concept of rebirth, renewal, and being able to rise after defeat. To her, the phoenix represented strength, resiliency, and autonomy. With her mind imagining all of the possibilities this wish could bring, Erin took a candy out of the bag and made the wish.

"I wish I had the beauty, grace, and power of the phoenix, physically and mentally. I wish I was a phoenix incarnate."

Erin slapped herself on the head after making the wish, because she realized her wish was again subjective. Erin quickly thought of ways she could properly phrase her wish when she started to feel the room getting warmer.

"Oh man, Nate must have turned the heat up or something," Erin thought. She went to the thermostat in the kitchen and was quite surprised when it said 62 degrees Fahrenheit. She lowered the thermostat ten degrees, but nothing changed. In fact, her body started getting warmer. At the same time, Erin felt a weird rumbling in her stomach. Little did she know, her entire DNA structure was being rewritten.

Erin started to feel weary. Her body wasn't getting any cooler; in fact, it had already reached temperatures that would kill an average human being. To make matters worse, the rumbling in her stomach had spread throughout her entire body. Erin could see something moving under her skin. That's when lightning sparks started coming from the body.

"Oh my god. Is this the wish coming to fruition?" Erin said. She couldn't think long because her body had already become unbearably hot. Erin ran as fast as she could to her kitchen, took out the ice water pitcher and poured it all over herself. It gave her no comfort.

"What the hell is happening to me?!?!?!?" Erin said, panicking. Her skin had started to roast and Erin could see smoke coming from her fingertips. The energy in her body was only growing as well. At that moment, Erin thought she was going to die.

Erin quickly ran upstairs to her room. She put a candy in her mouth and started thinking. Erin was horrified to taste ashes in her mouth.

With the bag of candy in her hands, Erin made her wish. "I wish I was somewhere where I could be alone, unseen and not hurt or destroy anyone/anything."

Erin was quickly transplanted to a long, grassy field. She estimated she was fifty miles from home. In the trip, Erin failed to notice that her arms had started to turn black, with the rest of her body following. With no other options at the moment, all Erin could do was sit down and cry.

"Stupid wishes from a stupid child." Erin mumbled through her tears. "OH GOD, IT HURTS SO MUCH."

The energy surging throughout her body reached it's tipping point. With Erin barely containing herself, and with her body being literal ashes, she decided the best thing to do was face her imminent death with as much courage as she imagined she had.

Erin stood up. She thought of the family she was leaving behind. Then, she decided to stop resisting and let the energy rip her body apart. Erin screamed as loudly as she could as her body exploded in a combination of flame and light, reducing her to dust. The outpouring of energy lasted for nearly 10 minutes before it stopped.

------------

Erin woke up in a daze. She looked around. The field around her had been blackened to a crisp, standing out in stark contrast to the bright dusk sky above her. At that point, Erin realized that she was alive. "I'm not dead? I'm not dead!" Erin started to scream. "I''m not dead!!! But how?"

Erin staggered to her feet and examined herself. Unbelievably, her skin had not been damaged at all, save for two small scars, one under each arm. Her clothing had not been as fortunate, as there wasn't even a shred of it left. As a whole, Erin felt different, but from what she could see, she looked as human as ever. Erin looked out onto the horizon and came to a terrible realization.

"The candies! Oh god, they must have burnt up in the flames. How the hell am I going to get home?"

As Erin started pacing around, a funny thought came to her head. If the wish had made her a phoenix, could she...nah. No way. Not even possible. Still, with everything else that just happened, why not?"

Erin looked at her arms again, and thought to herself "If I can fly, show me how." Suddenly, her arms started tingling, and something started to sprout from them. At first Erin couldn't tell what it was, and then she realized...they were feathers. In a matter of moments, Erin's arms had turned to long, feathery wings."Holy fucking shit." Erin exclaimed. She started flapping her arms, but nothing happened. "Don't tell me I'm like a penguin." Erin grumbled. Suddenly, Erin eyes started to glow. Waves of radiant red and gold light started cascading from her wings. Erin could feel her feet leaving the ground. As she flapped her wings harder and harder, she started to rise higher and higher. With each flap, Erin's ascent started getting faster. Eventually, Erin found herself in the sky, maneuvering without constant flaps.

"This can't be real, right? I'm not actually flying....AHHH, I'M ACTUALLY FREAKING FLYING, THIS IS AMAZING." For 20 minutes, Erin felt nothing but euphoria. Erin had broken the glass ceiling of human evolution and was soaring way, way above it. Life felt so much more rich for her, the possibilities were endless. First however, she needed to go home and reassess things. Erin, suddenly recognizing exactly where her house was, headed that way.

From now on, my name is Aeryn (A-E-R-Y-N). Aeryn Wilson" Immediately, Erin's ID card changed to reflect that she was now Aeryn. For all intents and purposes, Erin Wilson was dead and gone.

11122211.title: wish gone wrong.....

111222112.content:
As Nicole put the candy in her mouth, Kate opened the door, a look of pure shock on her face, she seemed ready to outburst..... Nicole wished, "I wish that Kate would let me join tonight so we can have fun." with that the candy dissipated and Nicole looked up at Kate.

Kate's eyes kind of glazed over for a moment. "yeah. you should join me tonight." she then closed the door behind her. Kate looked back at Nicole. "who, who are you again? you look familiar."

Nicole stood up proudly, leaving the candies free. "it's me Nicole! The wishing candies made me this way!"

Kate looked a little wide eyed. "Strange, i don't think i would normally want to share this evening with you here, but you changed my mind?"

You quickly grab a candy and wish aloud, "i Wish that the last two wishes were undone."

Nicole whined, "Nooo! Nate!" but it was too late, Kate's eyes glossed over and she looked at Nicole and the at you. "yuck. thanks for fixing that. i didnt know magic was real." you both watch as Niclole and her clothing transform back to normal. Kate grabbed a candy and looked at you, "so i just eat one and make a wish?" you nod with a little worry. "i with Nicole forgot about all of this and was in bed asleep along with everyone else here besides Nate and I." oh, a good wish you thought. "Nicole made a blank face as she quietly exited the room and went to her bed.

"Well then," Kate said, "that was very odd. however. i believe now we can enjoy ourselves, and possibly even more," as she looks to the candies.

"Ummm. Yeah what is tonight all about?" you fake.

"You will see," Kate grins as she closes and locked your door.

Kate reached for a candy, "may I?" she grinned. You nod. she laughs and pops it into her mouth.

Nate starts to think about using the candies to help his friends out and he thinks of one of his friend's named Brandon who's a couple of years younger than him but they still hang out since they live close by. Recently Brandon's mother had passed away and they were going through some rough times and he was starting to drift away from his dad.

"I wish that Brandon and his dad could be closer." he says as he sucks on a candie.

Little did he know that his wish was going to gradually transform his friend into a 38 year-old woman who was going to be married to her former father and they would even have at least one child together. But what was the new woman going to look like when it's all said and done?

He was your step-dad. He married your mother a little after you were born and he adopted you after he had another child (Erin) with your mom (Lynda). That is when you got his last name (Wilson). But all this happened long before you were even potty trained so to you Mike Wilson had always been your dad. You did 'something nice' for your friend, Brandon now you think you should do 'something nice' for your dad.
111231.title: Option 1

1112312.content:
The candies had such power and your greedy fifteen year old self didn't consider who sent them or why. You thought you was doing good by helping your friend. And when you put another candy in your mouth you was going to help your dad too. This is what you wanted to do. Later you would start to think about making your life better, but that didn't occur to you.

There was a reason for that. The candies weren't sent by a friend or someone who wanted to do you a favor. It was sent by someone who truly hated someone in your family. They could have dealt with that person themselves, but with this immense power that they had it was much more fun to make someone else do it for them. Now that you had taken at least two pieces of candies, you didn't possess the candies, the candies possessed you. They were going to corrupt you and lead you down the path that meant destruction. For the people in your family life would change radically and even though no one was killed or put in extreme pain their old life would be over and a new life would begun. Who was the target of this evil is hard to say. It might be you who is made to screw around with the lives of your family. Or it might be your sister who will see the changes, but not be able to do anything about it. Or it might be your dad whose life will change radically and not even know anything is wrong. Or it could be your mom who won't have any changes made to her directly she will blissfully go long as if nothing has happened even though what was her husband isn't really one anymore.

You meant to wish 'something nice' for your dad, but instead you start your wish with "I wish that no matter what happened everyone except Erin will think everything is normal and the way it has always been."
1112312.title: Corrupted by the Candies/A wish for dad

11123121.content:
You had always loved your dad. He treated you like his own son since you was a baby. But the candies had already started to corrupt you. You didn't remember it as it really was, you remembered that Erin had been dad's favorite. That dad thought of her as his real child and you was just his wife's boy. Resentment grew in you, not just for your dad, but also for Erin. You now thought of Erin not as your little sister, but now you thought of her as "the little princess who stole you dad's love." You didn't mean princess in a good way. This is why you wanted her to know what is happening but not be able to do anything about it. That reminded you since you still had a candy in your mouth. "I wish that Erin couldn't let anyone know that something is happening here." You was going to make it so that no one would believe her if she told anyone, but it's better this way. There is a certain horror in when something is happening and you can't do anything about it. Not even confide in a friend.

Now that Erin is handled, the next thing is to get this 'revenge' on the road for dad. You wanted something slow. Something that you could watch and that would build, just like your imagined anger which had been building since you was two years old and Erin had stolen all your father's affection from you. But no one can steal one's affection. It's your affection to give and in your mind dad had chosen not to give it so he should be the one. Even if he wouldn't notice anything was wrong. So you made a wish. It was a small wish. It was a subtle wish, but it would start the ball rolling.

"I wish that dad would lose all of his enjoyment for sports and replace it with an enjoyment of woman's fashions, especially teen fashions."
11123121.title: Dad gets new interests

111231211.content:
You looked for how your wish would manifest itself. You wanted it to take its time and you couldn't be with your dad all the time to see what was happening. But after a couple days you noticed your first inkling of something happening. Your dad had brought home a "17 Magazine" for Erin. It was supposed to be a new magazine but you could tell it had been opened and read. You had assumed by your dad.

When you saw the magazine you heard your dad say when he gave it to Erin that he had bought a subscription for her. He also wanted to know what other magazines that Erin would want. He had gotten a list and subscribed to only those that were specifically for teen girls. He knew that those always had lots of information about fashion. His fashion interest started slowly as it was supposed to. At the beginning he was only interested in clothes. But as his interest grew more aspects of fashion invaded his conscience. Apparel was obviously first, but then accessories to go with them like shoes, purses and scarves. Next he became interested in jewelry and finally makeup tips. He always preferred fashions for teens, but he also broadened his interest in fashion for young adults and then fashions for women his own age and older.

His enjoyment of sports was going in reverse. In the beginning the lesser sports was abandoned. He list interest in bowling which he never played but was on TV on the weekends and so he watched it. He stopped buying, 'Sports Illustrated" weekly. He stopped reading the back pages of the newspaper. Soon he wouldn't even look up the standings. He would find excuses to watch other programs on TV which actually pleased Lynda, who didn't mind that Mike was starting to read her Cosmo. Mike would steer conversations with his friends away from sports or just walk away when he could. His friends didn't like when Mike talked about fashions, but because of the first wish didn't think it was strange that Mike wanted to talk about that instead.

Soon it was time to make another wish.

1112312111.content:
Your first wish is going very well. You know what to look for and so you see it. You see your dad finding time to read the magazines. You noticed your dad's ears prick up when something on the news relating to fashion would come on. You noticed that shows like "Say Yes To The Dress" and "Bridezilla" being recorded on the DVR. These were all subtle things but you noticed them. You also noticed what wasn't being recorded and how little time your dad would spend in the sport section of the paper.

You brought up going to a game which was a really great matchup and your dad finding an excuse not to go. The excuse was plausible, but you didn't think it was true. So the first wish had been working fine, now it was time for the second wish. You couldn't really see if this worked but you assumed it would. "I wish," you said after popping a candy into your mouth, "that dad would always pee sitting down." No one would notice this, but it was definitely a change in your dad's life. Your dad actually liked this wish, it gave him more time to read the fashion magazines that he now truly loved.

Then you thought about it. Maybe Erin shouldn't be just a bystander. She should change a bit too. So before the candy was gone you said, "I wish that Erin would throw out her panties after using them instead of putting them into the hamper." It'll take a few weeks before she ran out of underwear, you would make another wish for her before that happened.

11123121111.content:
Mike had to pee. It was a normal thing that happens every day. In fact he had to pee badly. He rushed to the bathroom and pulled down his zipper. He reached into his pants to get his penis and there was his briefs in the way. Her had to pee so badly that he unbuttoned his jeans and then quickly pulled down his pants. Then since his pants were down he turned around (out of reflex) and sat down. He didn't touch his penis, gravity pointed it towards the floor for him. The problem was that the seat wasn't down. He didn't fall in. When he was done with his business he decided on two things. One that trying to pull his penis through his briefs wasn't worth the effort. That it was easier to simply pull it all down and sit. He would never stand to pee again. He also decided that Lynda was right and he always made sure the seat was down on the toilet. There wasn't any reason for Lynda (or anyone else) to notice that Mike never stood to pee again. But Lynda did appreciate that the seat was always down in the bathroom. At least it was always down after Mike used it, you not so much.

Lynda and Mike were also spending more time together. Mike's viewing habits had changes and without watching so much sport's programming there was more things that Mike and Lynda could watch together. Not just fashion programs, but other stuff that they both liked such as dramas. Also, Mike volunteered to go shopping with Lynda when she was clothes shopping. It was nice for Mike to see the stuff he read about in the stores. Lynda enjoyed the time together and didn't wonder why Mike was so interested in woman's fashions. She took it in stride like she took his fascination with baseball which had bored her. At least fashion had some practicality to it. Besides, Mike's new insights on clothing were getting quite helpful.

After a few days for the wish to sink in you made another wish. The first one was easy, you knew you had to make it. "I wish that mom would buy pull-up diapers in Erin's size and start putting them into Erin's panty drawer." This had to be done, soon Erin would run out of panties. But even with all that, at this time you didn't make her wear the diapers, you just gave her something to wear when she ran out of panties.

The next wish was harder. You could have simply 'forced' Mike into buying and wearing girl's clothing. He would have thought it was his decision, but it would have been the wish. You would do that eventually, but not yet. But it was too soon for that. You decide to do something even more shocking. Well maybe shocking isn't the right word, disturbing is better although with the first wish no one will have a problem with it. With the last of the candy dissolving in your mouth you said, "I wish dad would slowly drop all of his men friends and develop lasting friendships with girls around fifteen-years-old." There wasn't anything sexual about it. Dad would have no more sexual attraction to his new friends than he did to the old ones. But if anyone thought about it for a while (and no one would because of the first wish. That first wish was key to everything) people would be worried about it and the authorities would probably be called.
11123121111.title: No more standing to pee for dad.  Another wish.

111231211111.content:
Mike was sitting in the den reading a Y&M magazine. Well he wasn't reading, he was skimming through it. He had read it before and now he was looking through it for some makeup tips that he had previously seen in this magazine. He didn't wear women's clothes or makeup but the topic interested him greatly. To Mike you didn't have to wear makeup to enjoy reading about it any more than you needed to play baseball to read the daily sports columns. None of whom he had read for quite a while now.

Regardless, Mike was learning the beginnings of how to put on eye makeup. Well this wasn't makeup 101, but was more advanced than that. The article was on how to blend two (or sometimes three) shades of eyeshadow to get a certain look. There were also tips on how to use eyeliner and eyebrow pencil. It was all very intricate. For a second Mike wondered how girls pull this type of thing off and still can't do simple algebra or write a readable essay. But that didn't matter.

There was a ring at the door, it was Heather one of your friends. She said that she and Nate had something planned. But you wasn't home or so Mike thought. You had planned to get Heather here to see what would happen with your wish. You knew that dad didn't hang out with his friends as much anymore. Without sports they didn't have as much in common. But Mike hadn't made any friends with 'young' girls. You realized that Mike just wasn't exposed to girls in his life or his work so he hadn't had a chance to become friendly so you set this up.

"I'm sorry," Mike said at the door, "but Nate isn't home."

"I was sure he said to meet him here now," Heather reassured Mike, "Can I wait for him?"

"OK." After offering Heather a drink, Mike returned to what he was doing. Heather noticed what Mike was reading. Without the wishes this would have shocked her, but it didn't in this case. She was actually intrigued at what he was studying. One thing led to another and a conversation was started. Heather was an 'expert' on teen makeup. Well as compared with Mike anyway. Soon, they went to the bathroom to try some of the techniques that were demonstrated in the magazine. It was only a matter of time before a friendship was struck with the simple remark, "Hey, if you need anymore help, this is my phone number." Mike did need a lot of help and called her within two days. Several of Heather's friends also became Mike's friends.

No one thought anything wrong with this. Mike not only called Heather all the time, but he also started to visit her house and the houses of some of her friends too. A couple of his new friends had parents who used to be Mike's old friends but they didn't mind either. In a relatively short time, Mike hadn't any male friends. All of his friends were teen girls. The only exception were Mike's friends at work. They really weren't friends, they were coworkers that you had to maintain a pleasant relationship with. But other than that, when not at home, Mike spent his free time with 'the girls.'
111231211111.title: Mike makes a new friend

Mike started spending more and more time with his new friends. But the problem was that except for fashion and helping them with their homework on occasion he didn't have much in common with Heather and his new friends. You had this all planned out and so you took a candy and said, "I wish dad would develop some of the interests of his friends." Then slowly but surely Mike found new appreciations for several things. Babysitting was one of them.

It all started innocently at first. Heather phones Mike.

"Mike," Heather said with worry in her voice, "you have to help me."

"Sure what is it?"

"I was supposed to babysit for the Johnson's four year old, but I just can't"

The reason wasn't what Mike thought was a good enough reason to shirk one's responsibility, but Heather was his friend and he didn't mind helping her out. So he called the Johnson's to confirm that he would be babysitting instead of Heather..

Once he got there, Mike found that he loved babies. Mike had always been a great dad, despite what you think, but with his new change in interests he found he loved being around babies like teen girls (and women did.) He enjoyed playing with children who were not his own and he thought they were so cute and sweet like girls did. Between his own experience with his kids and his new interest in babies Mike started babysitting in his off times. The money didn't mean much he was an adult with a full time job. But the babies were so cute and he loved to take care of them. Soon what started as a favor for Heather became a job that he loved to do.

Mike also developed other interests such as his interest in "Hello Kitty" or his love of being on the social networks. Soon he was tweeting everything he did or so it seemed. He had joined Pinterest and was pinning all sorts of things to his boards, such as the stuff he found on the web about "Hello Kitty." His tastes in television had changed too. He was spending more time watching the Disney channel or Nickelodeon.

With his new interests, he started spending less and less time with Lynda who he also found that he had less and less in common with. He preferred to look at fashions with his new friends than with Lynda and he was more interested in dramas that took place in a high school than between adults. Lynda didn't mind the changes.

Mike and his friends were getting along great and were getting closer and closer. Heather and Mike were now BFFs. But because Mike was a man there were places that Mike couldn't go. Mike could go to all of his friends houses, but when it came to certain things Mike just couldn't go. It was embarrassing for Mike that his friends could go to the bathroom together (as girls often do) and he would have to wait at the table.

You make another wish. This wish seems to help Mike out a lot but in the end it really didn't. "I wish that dad could go all the places his friends could go, but had all their restrictions too."

Now when it was time to go to the ladies room, Mike could go with all his friends. He could even do his business their. He was always sitting down anyway. He could also go into the dressing rooms at stores with his friends to see them trying on the clothes instead of waiting for them to return. This wish had the side benefit of making Mike comfortable in seeing his friends in various stages of dress. Mike wasn't a pervert and so it didn't matter if he saw them naked or not.

But the restrictions part made it so that Mike couldn't use the mens room even if he wanted to. He couldn't go into a bar or buy a beer at the local 7-11. He couldn't get into an 'R' rated movie without another adult being present. All these things were a pain to Mike as they would be to any teenager, but that was the way it was.

You enjoyed dad's new found freedoms and his new found restrictions very funny. Mike couldn't even drive anymore. His license had been reduced to a learners permit like yours. In your state, a fifteen year old (boy or girl) can get a learners permit, but not a license until he/she was sixteen. Mike found that the easiest way to get places was to walk. If the places weren't close he would have to ask Lynda or go with the parents of his friends. Things were progressing nicely with dad, but it was time for another wish.

111231211111111.content:
It had been months since you made your first wish. In that time your dad's life had change but not in many significant ways. It was true that your dad could no longer drive alone (although he did always drive when he and mom went somewhere). It was also true that all his friends had been replaced with girls. But, he was still Mike Wilson a father and a husband and despite not being able to see 'R' rated movies alone he was still head of the household. This would continue for a while.

But now it was time for a new wish and so you wished one that you had been waiting for since all this began. You took out a candy and said, "I wish that dad would replace all his clothes with the teen girl fashions that he likes so much. I also wish that dad would start wearing his new fashions more and more." You could have used the candy to just change all of dad's clothes to girlie ones. But you preferred this. It would take longer and it would be all of dad's own decisions. Every time you saw your dad bring in a new purchase or put on a new outfit you would just laugh to yourself. You knew that he deserved this punishment. You knew that the joke was on him since he didn't notice anything wrong, but you found the revenge delicious.

It all happened just as you expected. Dad was at a sleepover at Heather's. Since the last wish dad attended these sleepovers with his friends just like all his friends. Before the wish it simply wasn't appropriate no matter how good friends that Heather and Mike were for Mike to spend the night in the girl's room. Were there enough girls at the sleepover to call it a slumber party was just a matter of semantics. They were doing makeovers and Mike had been making over the faces of the other girls. Mike knew more about makeup than all the other girls combined. One of the girls suggested that they do his face and for the first time makeup was put on Mike's face. Mike actually dictated as best he could how to put on the makeup to get the proper look. Mike is still a man and so to get the look of a teenaged girl on his manly face required more skill than the girls had. This didn't open the floodgates, Mike didn't from that point on wear makeup everywhere, but it was a start. It would take a while before Mike bought his first tube of lipstick.

One day dad was with Heather and another friend and they were clothes shopping. Mike was again helping them pick out clothes that were in fashion. Mike had an eye for teen fashions. All his studying paid off and the girls respected his opinion. This was especially true now that Mike could go into the dressing rooms with his friends. One thing led to another on this particular trip and Heather suggested that Mike try on a pretty blouse. Mike liked the blouse and he in fact purchased it. When he got home later that day, Mike put the blouse into the closet with the rest of his shirts. He didn't wear the blouse immediately, but put it on when it was appropriate. It was a small start but it was a start.

As his wardrobe grew, he started to throw out his older (less stylish and masculine) clothes. Neither he nor Lynda bought him any male clothes again.

About the time that Mike was trying on makeup for the first time, you decided it was time for another wish for Erin. She had been wearing diapers for some time now. You made a wish that didn't cause immediate change, but would have a long term effect. "I wish," you said while sucking on another candy, "that Erin would find that the diaper's she wore would seem more comfortable the more they were like actually diapers worn by babies."
111231211111111.title: Mike tries on the fashions he had been studying

1112312111111111.content:
Erin arrived home from school to find a queen sized bed in her room replacing the twin bed she normally had. She liked the extra room and the softness of the new bed. New sheets and other bed linen were bought for the bed which fit right in with her new bedroom decor. She thanked her parents for the new stuff. A couple days later a new chest of drawers was added to her room. She thought that this would give her extra clothing space, but when she looked into the drawers they were already filled. She recognized the clothes at once, they were the new outfits that her dad was now wearing. There were training bras (Mike always wore a bra even though he didn't have any boobs to speak of so they were always training bras or small padded bras.) panties, socks, tights, hose, leggings, tops and bottoms. In her closet were dresses and the dress suits that Mike wore to work. All of the clothes were bought from the girls, juniors or women's departments at stores. The last of Mike's male clothing had been thrown out. Mike had been wearing female apparel exclusively for some time now. Even at work he was dressed in girl's clothes although these clothes were the type of clothing a teen would wear if she had a responsible job in an office. The clothing that Mike now wore wasn't overly feminine, but they were all in style. The same for his makeup. On casual days of just going to the mall, he didn't make up his face like a Christmas tree, his makeup would be appropriate and understated for the event. Sometimes just some lip gloss and pale blush.

When she saw the stuff, Erin went to ask what was happening. (She didn't know that you had made this wish. "I wish that dad and Erin would share her room and sleep together.")

"Erin," Lynda started, "dad has had a lot of sleepovers at his friends houses. He thought it was only fair that they come to our house for one too."

"Yeah, so???"

"Well I didn't want a bunch of girls in my room with me and daddy, so we decided that it would be best to have the sleepover in your room."

"My room?"

"Yes, the girls would like your room better than my room. So dad and I got to talking and it was decided that maybe he should move into your room." The older wish that Mike would develop the interests of the girls didn't make him want to date boys, but it did put a damper on his own love life. He didn't want to be intimate with Lynda anymore than the other girls wanted to be intimate with their mothers.

Lynda continued, "We think that it would be best if you and dad could stay in the same room. You have lots of mutual interests and it would work out fine." This was true, Mike's interest were very similar to Erin's in many ways. They had gotten a queen sized bed instead of another twin because the room wasn't big enough to handle two twin beds and all of the other things that was needed if Mike was to move into Erin's room. Plus the wish that Dad could go anywhere that a girl could go made sleeping with Erin seem perfectly natural. It was only Erin who could see that this was wrong, but she couldn't say anything about it.

That night Mike slept in the same bed as his daughter and didn't think anything was wrong with it at all. They even talked about mutual interests before going to sleep. Mike tried to help Erin in her wardrobe choices, but Erin didn't want to take Mike's advice. Although if she did she would look much prettier.

Soon the weekend came and Mike's friends came over for their sleep over. The queen sized bed had as many girls on it as would fit. The overflow slept on a comforter on the floor.

Mike and the girls were totally comfortable changing in front of each other. The only one who had a problem was Erin, she didn't want anyone to know she was wearing pull-ups. She kept it hidden as best she could. She didn't have to bother, everyone already knew and didn't care. No one except for Erin ever cared about any of the wishes that you made.

You made another wish during the sleepover. "I wish," you said with the usual candy in your mouth, "that mom would stop buying pull-ups for Erin and start buying diapers with tabs."
1112312111111111.title: Mike's sleepover

11123121111111111.content:
With Mike now sleeping in her bed, Erin could truly grasp all that had happened to her dad. It wasn't just the clothes it was everything. Mike's day started early, before Erin got up. He would start off with a shower. In Erin's bathroom (the bathroom that was attached to her room) Mike's stuff had taken over. He now had more makeup than Erin had ever seen in one place. But it wasn't just that it was the perfumes, creams and lotions too. Mike used depilatory daily. Not just to remove the hair on his face, but all over his body. He also has moisturizers and several other creams that even Erin didn't know what they did. But Mike had read about them in one of his magazines (although the magazines came to the house addressed to Erin.) After the shower, Mike would spend time doing his makeup while his hair dried. Once finished he would dry and style his hair and then make touch-ups to his makeup if it was messed up in some way. This took at least an hour. Fortunately (or is it unfortunately) Mike never bothered to close the door regardless of his attire. He would parade around Erin in just panties or totally nude, he didn't care. Regardless, even though Erin was uncomfortable with it she sometimes had to use the bathroom herself so she would reluctantly enter the bathroom while Mike was inside showering or putting on his makeup or whatever.

If it was a work day, Mike would wear a suit that he bought from the woman's department. If it had pants then it wasn't too different than a men's suit. He never wore a tie anymore but he always wore a blouse instead of a dress shirt. He had four suits, but he could stretch the look by rotating the blouse or the shoes and purse that he wore with the suit. Sometimes he would add a scarf. His daily makeup was always professional looking and he wore a variety of jewelry. Some times he wore a broach, sometimes a necklace, but regardless he always wore earrings. His ears had never not had earrings in them since the day he first got them pierced.

Before work he would contact his friends through social media. There were tweets to read (and post) the same with facebook and a bunch of other social networks. If something was important he would call his friends. During work, Mike couldn't be reached by his friends except during lunch and breaks. He had to take the bus to and from work now since he didn't have a valid license, except for his learners permit. After work, he spend most of his time back on the social networks or chatting with his friends. Through them he knew everything that was going on at their school. His television habits had been reduced to mostly shows that teens liked. He also liked competitive reality shows like Survivor and American Idol. He was much more like a sister to Erin than her father anymore with one exception. Mike could still ground her, although he was more understanding about her point of view.

Erin was constantly horrified at what had happened to her dad. She wanted to tell someone but she couldn't. Maybe if she could get what she was feeling all out she could learn to accept what had happened, but she had it all bottled up. She had to act like everything was normal. She wondered if everyone else was just acting. Everyone else didn't seem to notice any difference.

But all this could wait she had other problems. Erin didn't know that you made another wish to torment her. This time the wish went. "I wish that Erin could only use the words a toddler uses when she talks about her diaper or anything in it." She noticed this change one day when she thought to herself that she "Had to go sheesmee." This was the word that she had used when she was a baby to tell her mom she had to take a piss. That paused her for a moment, but it really hit home when she thought she had to take off her dypee to do it. She couldn't even think of the right words anymore. She wondered what would become of her. If dad was becoming a teenager, does this mean she is becoming a baby. She still didn't go 'sheesmee in her dypee" maybe she wouldn't become a baby. Erin was now wearing diapers with tabs like a baby. What was really funny was the words she used now. The first time you heard her say she had to go kaka when she meant she had to go to the bathroom was just hilarious. She used all sorts of phrases, she said she 'needed to geesh' once. Which you suppose was another way of saying, 'I need to tinkle' which was easier to understand but still very juvenile.

I wish that everyone would treat dad like a very pretty girl in the tenth grade."

This would get dad a lot of attention you thought and it did. At home nothing changed, but any time dad would be around high school boys or young adult men they would flirt with them. It could be a suggestive tone in his voice, or a quick glance, a flick of the hair, a casual touch of the shoulders. There were hundreds or even thousands of ways to flirt and dad used them all. Most of the boys would respond since they all treated him like a pretty girl in the tenth grade. Of course each boy had a different conception of pretty and for each boy dad was considered pretty. Erin thought that her humiliation couldn't get any worse until you made one final wish regarding her. "I wish that Erin would be treated as if she had all the modesty of an infant." If you wanted to know the latest eye shadow color you could ask dad and he would tell you. If you wanted to know which boys kissed best you could ask dad. But everything important dad didn't care about.

Without an interest in working anymore, dad lost his job which put a strain on the whole family including you. You had to get a job to help support the family. By the time you realized this all the candies had disappeared. You didn't know if you ate them all or they were just missing. Dad didn't care about any of this, as far as everyone was concerned he was just a young pretty girl who spent most of his time flirting with boys and talking about American Idol and Survivor. But at least due to one of the earlier wishes he did make some money babysitting. He had to do something to keep him properly dressed in the latest fashions. He could tell you who came in fifth place on American idol from five years ago. In the end he became just a silly little girl. If he knew what had happened to him he would be horrified.

The embarrassment was driving Erin nuts. She couldn't control herself anymore and she couldn't change herself when she did have an accident. When she did she needed to be changed as soon as possible and so if she was alone she would have to ask strangers for help. She would have to ask them in such a ridiculous babyish way. The strangers usually would be happy to help, this was a side result of one of the wishes. But they also recognized Erin's 'lack of modesty' and would commonly change her at the nearest bench. Erin would be exposed as the diaper was removed and baby wipes used for everyone to see.

Several days later, the corruption of your thoughts had been lifted and who remembered how your family really was. How you dad used to treat you as if he was your real dad. You remembered what a manly, thoughtful, intelligent man he used to be. You remembered the closeness you used to have with your little sister. How you used to protect her from all dangers and she adored her big brother. But now you see the harm you have done. How you made your dad behave like a silly little air-headed girl. What you did to your sister and how you knew she hated you for it. How your mother had lost the real love of her life and had to go to work in some unsavory ways to support her family. You knew that even though you had been corrupted that the types of punishments were your idea. You blamed yourself.
