"Honey," your mom said to Erin, "I have been thinking. Now that dad is dating he is coming home late and that wakes you up. I don't think that is fair to you." Mom was justifying to herself. What she said really made no sense. Mom continued, "So I have gotten you your own bed and put it in my room so your dad won't disturb you anymore."

Erin thought this was a good idea. She preferred to have her own room but sleeping in mom's room instead of with her cross dressing dad was much better or so she thought. She followed her mom to the master bedroom and inside she saw a large crib. Immediately her thumb flew into her mouth. This made her feel better, but she was still in shock.

"You can sleep her with me, like you did when you was younger." mom said. It was true that for the first few months of her life, Erin did sleep in the same bedroom with mom and dad in a crib, but she was a baby then, she's a teen now. But she wasn't allowed to complain. Sucking her thumb was the only thing that made her feel better at all.

Then she got her first good look into the crib, it wasn't your standard crib. It was big enough for a teen, but there were other things, the bed sheets looked like the bedsheets that used to be on Erin's twin bed only they were reshaped for the crib. Also inside the crib instead of baby toys there was some of her stuff such as an ipad and the remote for the television. There was a mobile over the crib, but it contained pictures of her favorite movie and television stars. It was truly a crib for a teenager. She really couldn't decide if it was worse to see her dad totally naked or to see him with his penis sticking out of thong panties.

1112312111111112.content:
Now that Erin had been wearing pull-ups for a while she started to think about them. They really weren't that bad. In fact they seemed even more comfortable than wearing her old panties. She couldn't quite remember why her old panties were uncomfortable but she knew that this felt much better, especially when she was having her period.

There was one problem though, with all the extra material the pull-ups did make her sweat more than usual. She decided to remedy it (although she never knew that it was the wish that had compelled her) by doing what mothers did for their babies in this situation she started spreading baby powder into her pull-ups before wearing them. This did the trick. With the new powder in her pull-ups they felt even better than before. (It felt even better than it normally would since there was the extra kick in feeling because pull-ups with baby powder in there was more babyish than pull-ups without them.)

This worked so well, that Erin decided to try putting baby oil into her pull-ups too. She enjoyed the feeling and never wore her pull-ups again without having baby powder and baby oil liberally applied to the inside of the pull-up and her own sensitive body.
1112312111111112.title: Erin starts to use baby powder

111231211111112.content:
* Note: I'm going to switch this to third person point of view. Feel free to stay with that or not.

Erin was so annoyed. She'd planned to meet up with her friend at the mall today and see a movie. Mom was out running errands so she'd asked dad to drive her. At first, she couldn't even get his attention, as it was fixed on the Disney channel.

When she finally did, he'd announced that he was no longer allowed to drive on his own.

It sounded like a stupid excuse to Erin, but when she'd insisted, her dad had handed her the learner's permit. The funny thing was, Erin could vaguely remember him earning it. He'd been so proud, both him and mom. But she also remembered him driving her places before on his own, like school. It was all kind of confusing to her.

In the end, she was able to get a lift to the mall with Heather's mom, who had arrived to pick up her dad. Erin sat in the front passenger seat in the minivan while Heather, her dad, and two other girls talked, gossiped, and giggled. The really weird thing was how in to it her dad was. He seemed to really care who was wearing what or who was dating whom; more than that, the girls seemed to take his opinions seriously.

When they arrived at the mall, the girls and her dad filed out. Erin hung back, gawking at the sight of her dad walking beside, and towering over, three other girls. They were still going on and on and not one of them seemed to even notice that Erin was still there until they were almost to the theater.

"Hey, Erin!"

She glanced up. By the theater, her friend Patty was coming over, but it was her dad who had called her name.

"Yeah?"

Her dad stood with his hand on his hip. "Why don't we all see a movie together?" He gestured to Heather and his other friends. "My treat, of course. For both you and Patty."

It was a tempting offer. Erin's allowance was small, and because her dad still had his adult job, he could easily afford to pay for movie tickets for two other people besides himself. At the same time, she knew from previous conversation that the fifteen and sixteen year old girls (and her father) planned to see the latest romantic comedy, and not the Disney cartoon she'd been planning on seeing. Plus, it was awkward being around her dad and the other girls.
111231211111112.title: Mike's loss of privilege affects Erin

choices: Mike and Jake meet up after the movie.
1112312111111121.content:
Erin decided to accept her dad's offer. She wanted to save her own money and let her dad pay for it. If she didn't like the movie she could always sneak out and into the movie she liked anyway, it was a multiplex. But that wasn't a problem since the movie chosen was Maleficent a movie that appealed to everyone old and young.

Erin took a seat with her friends with Mike next and Heather and the rest of Mike's friends on the other side of Mike. Mike asked if Erin wanted some popcorn and a soda and she readily agreed. Mike went to get the treats. When Mike came back a young man named Jake was with him. Mike introduced Jake to everyone. He introduced Erin not as his daughter but by name alone along with the rest of his friends.

Jake greeted everyone and then was about to leave to be with his own friends. But before Jake left, Mike gave him his phone number and told him to call him. Jake took the number and went to be with his own friends.

"Well??" Heather inquired.

"Well what?" Mike said knowing what she meant.

"Well fess up."

"OK OK, he was waiting on line for popcorn when I got there. We started talking....I don't have to tell you what a hottie he is." Mike said while trying not to smile too much. Erin was speechless.

"Do you think he'll call you?"

"He'd better. Although I did tell him a little white lie."

"What?"

"I told him that I am going to your school. I didn't want him to think I was too old for him."

"What if he shows up there?"

"I told him, I have this work/study thing going on. So if you see him there, COVER FOR ME!"

"Will do, girlfriend," Heather said conspiratorially.

Erin heard all of this and she wanted to say, "But what about mom?" But she didn't want to do it in front of everyone. She decided to get Mike, er her dad alone later and ask him about it.

Throughout the movie Mike would look back to where Jake was and Jake returned the favor
1112312111111121.title: Erin accepts

choices: Dad's going to school, despite the divorce
Dad doesn't want to get a divorce
11123121111111211.content:
After the movie, Mike and his friends hung around the outside of the mall, waiting for parents to arrive to pick them up. Soon, only Mike, Heather, and Erin were left. Mike and Heather kept talking about how great the movie had been, while Erin stewed in silence, desperate for Heather to be gone so she could confront her dad about what had happened in the theater.

Finally, Heather's mom arrived in the minivan. "Hey, don't forget to cover for me with Jake!"

Heather grinned, stepping into the van. "I won't. And don't forget you promised we'd get mani-pedis sometime this week. Your treat."

Finally, Erin was alone with her dad. She wasn't sure how they were getting home, considering he couldn't drive anymore.

"Mom'll be here soon," he explained when she asked.

"Okay..."

"You look upset, sweetie."

"I AM upset, dad. Why were you flirting with that boy in there? What about mom?"

"What do you mean, what about mom?"

Erin frowned. "You're basically cheating on her!"

"It's not like that. Mom... she said it was okay."

"What?" Erin picked her jaw up. This was the last thing she expected to hear. "She... she did?"

Her dad sighed. "We went over all this. Don't you remember? Mom and I agreed we could see other people. We even told you and Nate and both of you seemed fine with it."

At that moment, Lynda pulled up to the mall with Nate in the passenger seat. Her dad got into the back behind him, which looked awkward because his legs were so long. Still stunned from the conversation, Erin almost fell into the other seat. As they drove off, her mom asked how the movie was. Mike said it was "awesome", and remarked on how pretty Kristen Stewart's outfits had been.

Suddenly, Erin's ears perked up.

"I met this boy." Her dad lowered his voice. "His name is Jake."

As he related his encounter to her mom, her dad shot Erin a couple of looks that said "I told you so." Seemingly thrilled, Lynda asked all kinds of questions, and Mike breathlessly filled her in with all the details. When he described how cute he was, Nate made fake vomiting noises in the front seat.

Erin couldn't believe it. Even if her parents had agreed to see other people -- itself hard for her to imagine -- didn't it bother her mom that her dad had been flirting with a teenage boy?

"There's only one problem." Her dad crinkled up his face. "He goes to Nate's school. I had to lie and tell him I went there, too."

Lynda nodded, pulling into the driveway of their house. "We talked about this already, honey. The school won't let you attend unless I adopt you... and you'd have to give up your job."

Her dad snorted. "I hate my job. Besides, you make enough money now for us to get by."

"That's not the only issue." Her mom let them all in. "We'd have to get a divorce. I couldn't very well be married to my daughter, could I?"
11123121111111211.title: Erin confronts Mike

choices: Give him a few physical changes.
111231211111112111.content:
Nate couldn't believe how well things were going.

Like Erin, he was eavesdropping on his parents' conversation. Unlike Erin, he could do it from the privacy of his own room. Just a few days ago, he'd made a wish to be able to spy on his dad no matter what he was doing.

The weird thing was, that was one of the only wishes he'd made lately. His dad had flirted with the boy Jake all on his own. The only encouragement had come from his new friends. Nate wondered if one of the "restrictions" he now had was an increased susceptibility to peer pressure. If that were so, he wouldn't have to do much of anything to get his dad farther down the path he was on, except put him in more and more contact with his peers -- fifteen year old girls.

He suspected his mom was comfortable with what was going on for similar reasons. The only wish he had made tonight, in the car after picking up dad and Erin, was that there be a legal way for his dad to go back to school. Nate didn't particularly care how that was accomplished, but he was certainly pleased with the result. It amused him that his dad would soon be his sister as well.

Mom was reluctant, but mostly because she feared losing dad's extra income (a quick wish took care of that). Dad's begging eventually changed her mind. Tomorrow, she'd see the lawyer about getting a divorce, and dad would quit his job.

"Thank you, honey."

"Thank you, what?" His mom smirked.

"I mean... thank you... 'mom.'"

"Good. I haven't adopted you yet, but you need the practice. Speaking of which... it's your bedtime in an hour."

"Aww, mom!" The tone of his voice was perfect.

"No buts. You can sleep in the master bedroom tonight, and tomorrow we'll move you into Erin's room."

Nate, hearing his sister gasp, chuckled. It would serve her right.

"We need to get you measured for a school uniform, too."

Dad smiled, starting for the stairs. "That all sounds great, mom."

The idea of his dad in one of the girls' uniforms amused Nate greatly, but it also raised a dilemma. His dad was over six feet tall. He'd look ridiculously out of place towering over the other students in the halls. And that might be really funny. On the other hand, what if he wished for his dad to have more appropriate physical features for his new role? Nothing drastic, of course, but maybe just a reduction in height and muscle mass.

Nate considered.
111231211111112111.title: Dad's going to school, despite the divorce

1112312111111121111.content:
Nate decided that making physical changes wouldn't be as funny as to let things go on the way they are. If Mike, er Dad, looked like a girl and went to school wearing a girl's uniform then everything would be just too ordinary. But if Dad wanted to return to school Nate would let him. But it shouldn't be perfectly easy for him.

Nate decided to make Mike's school life a little bit tougher this time and he also wanted to include Erin too. Nate decided his next wish would be perfect for both of them. "I wish," Nate began, "that even though neither would change physically that Mike would return to school as the single mother of his baby daughter Erin."

The wish changed the household dynamics radically. Mike and Erin now slept in the same room with Mike sleeping on what was Erin's bed and Erin sleeping in a crib. Mike now had the primary responsibility for Erin. Well technically he always did, but now he had to change Erin when needed. He was in charge of clothing her and feeding her and had to keep Erin safe just like you would with a baby not a teenager.

On school days, Mike would take Erin with him to school, but she would go to her own classes once there and then Mike would be responsible for bringing her home. Being a student with a baby was tough. Mike loved children especially babies, but he did need some time of his own. Being a student with a baby who wants to have a social life was tough. Mike found this out when Jake finally phoned and asked him on a date. Mike agreed but then had to ask Lynda to watch Erin while he went on his date with Jake.
1112312111111121111.title: Leave dad's body alone.

1112312111111121112.content:
It would be funny to see his dad lumbering through the halls of the school in a girl's uniform. At the same time, with the wishes he'd already made, it was likely everyone would simply accept him that way. Not much of a punishment, Nate thought.

That was also the problem with simply wishing physical changes on his dad. It almost felt like cheating, and besides, Nate wanted the changes to come slowly, with the magic of the candies only starting them while his dad did the rest.

There was also Erin to consider. It was hilarious that she would soon be sharing a room with dad. Wouldn't it be better if she could share more of her life with him?

Thoughtful, Nate sucked on a candy. He knew what he needed to do, but the wish had to be worded very carefully. Eventually, he wrote down what he wanted to say on his computer. Some of the terms he had to look up in his sex ed textbook to be sure he had them right.

"I wish," he read, "that all of dad's male secondary sex characteristics -- his height, his voice, his muscles, his body hair, and so on -- will go back to the way they were before he started puberty. Instead, from now on, he will develop female secondary sex characteristics, in parallel with Erin. Furthermore, I wish for his body to produce sex hormones of the same type and of the same quantity as Erin. Finally, I wish that everyone except dad, myself, and Erin will believe that these physical changes are normal, and no one will do anything to stop or reverse them."

Mom had slept on the couch that night. When Mike screamed from the bedroom, she rushed up the stairs. By that time, Erin was already at the door, while Nate stayed in his room, spying with his wish-created ability.

Dad had gone to sleep in his boxers, as always. When he'd sprang from the bed, they'd slipped over his hips and down to his ankles. When he noticed his two family members at the door, he tried to cover his privates.

"What's wrong with me!?" He slapped a hand over his mouth. His voice was higher pitched than his wife's.

Lynda immediately rushed to his side to comfort him. He only came up to her chest now.

"Ssh, we talked about this," she insisted, stroking his hair. "The law wouldn't let you go back to school the way you looked. It would have been too disruptive for the other students."

Mike was sobbing. "I just wanted to be with my friends!"

"And you will be. Not only that, but now you'll be able to shop in the same stores."

That seemed to comfort him quite a bit. He let Lynda cover him up with one of her robes, then sat on the bed, still sniffling slightly. Nate laughed his ass off at how comically oversized the robe was. It hung like a sheet from his narrow shoulders.

"Erin," his mom called out. "Can you find your dad something to wear?"

Erin groaned. "Seriously, mom?"

"Just do it, dear. He needs a shirt, some jeans, a pair of panties... oh, and a bra."

A few minutes later, Erin came back with a bundle of clothing. With no regard for his privacy, Lynda helped him step into the plain cotton panties. The bra came next, and Nate noticed that his dad's now hairless chest sported a pair of fleshy cones, just like his sister's did. After getting it on, his dad tugged at the garment's unfamiliar straps.

When he finished dressing, dad looked much like Erin, except that his face and hair were still his own.

Lynda remarked on the similarity. "You two could almost be twins!"

In the bedroom, Nate laughed and laughed.
1112312111111121112.title: Give him a few physical changes.

111231211111112112.content:
After they got home, Mike found a place to be alone and started to text Heather. He wanted to talk about Jake. Mike didn't have time to tell Heather everything about Jake in the movie. The movie was about to start and Erin was there. Mike could tell that something was bothering her, but he couldn't figure out what. It seemed perfectly natural for him to be flirting with hot guys why should she have a problem with that. He chalked it up that she was still young and hadn't discovered boys yet but in a few years she'll know what it felt like to flirt with cute guys.

While Mike was texting Heather, telling her about how cute Jake is, how is crooked smile was adorable, how he was so funny and all the other things some totally imagined that Mike thought of him there was a ring on the house phone.

Lynda called out, "Mike it's for you." It was Jake on the line, Mike had given Jake his house phone on instinct. Mike's cell phone was only for business, family and of course Heather.

Mike got on the phone and quickly texted to Heather, "He's on the phone, I have to go." Mike didn't wait for Heather's reply.

Jake started nervously, "Uh, Mike, I thought it was really great meeting you at the movie." Jake was still a boy and not very confident when it came to talking to 'girls'. Especially hot girls as he thought Mike was. He talked to her easily on the line because he wasn't thinking about it. But it took all his courage to call her. Jake didn't know the three day rule when it came to talking/phoning girls.

"Yes, it was allot of fun, you made the line move really fast. It was also so sweet of you to wait for me to finish and walk me back to my seat."

"Awe, that was nothing. You are really great to talk to. Will I see you in school tomorrow?"

"No, I have to work, they keep me really busy. It's an intensive work/study thing. But I am thinking of quitting. It's starting to become too much," Mike lied.

Jake wanted to encourage Mike. If Mike quit he would be at school more often and he could see him. But Jake liked Mike enough (even though they just met) that Jake didn't want Mike to give up the opportunity that work/study meant for high school students. "Well if its too tough...but these things are really important to your future."

Noticing how Jake was concerned for him made Mike fall for him even more. They continued their conversation for some time. But finally it became time for Jake to ask Mike out. Mike accepted immediately. Then Jake found an excuse to get off the phone. Jake was now to excited to talk and he didn't want to seem like a dork by rambling on now that he had made a date. Jake had just hung up the phone when Mike said "love you." and hung up after him. Mike didn't want to scare Jake off by letting him hear those words so soon after meeting but it was how he felt.

Mike didn't want to get a divorce, but he had to find a way to return to school. If he was gone all the time, Jake might think that Mike was too advanced for him and that wasn't true. Mike didn't want to lose Jake and would do anything to be with him. Maybe he could have Lynda threaten to sue the school to let him return. Mike didn't know how, but he was determined to become a full time student of the high school and he wouldn't let anything get into his way.

"Lynda we have to talk," Mike said. Lynda was watching TV and turned it off when she saw how serious Mike was at that moment.
111231211111112112.title: Dad doesn't want to get a divorce

1112312111111121121.content:
"Lynda we have to talk," Mike said. Lynda was watching TV and turned it off when she saw how serious Mike was at that moment.

"Yes Honey."

"I just have to go to high school. All my friends are there."

"But we discussed it."

"I know but I know you can do something. You know that woman who works for the school board."

"What is this really all about?"

"All my friends go to that school. I feel so left out that I can't go."

"Is that all," Lynda said skeptically.

"Well.."

"It's about that boy."

"Well he is so hot. If you met him you would know what I mean."

Lynda knew how boys could effect fifteen year olds but this was a drastic step. Mike would have to leave his job and go to high school like everyone else. This was a big step and there was no going back if it didn't work. "I don't know."

"I'll do anything," Mike begged.

"Anything?"

"Yes, anything."

"Well you will be coming home earlier than me so you'll have to make dinner."

"I'll do that."

"You will also have to straighten up the house."

"I'll do that."

"You'll have to keep your grades up too." This was a strange request since Mike in actuality was an adult who had graduated high school (and college for that matter) some time before. But in the context of the conversation it seemed reasonable.

"I promise all As."

Lynda had also decided to let him go, but she didn't want to let him off so easily. "I don't know. You'll do all the cooking and straighten up around here?"

"Yes, I promise."

"You won't be able to go out on school nights."

"I promise."

"OH OK, I'll call my friend and see what I can do. But I can't promise you'll be in the same class as this boy or even with Heather."

"That doesn't matter."

"I'm not sure what grade either."

"It doesn't matter as long as I'm a student at the school," Mike said hopefully.

Lynda did indeed make a few calls. There was a great many people to talk to. But she did it. "I have some news," Linda told Mike with a smile.

Mike knew immediately and asked excitedly, "WHAT!?!"

"Well you are now a student ad Fortham High." Mike threw himself into Lynda's arms and covered her face with chaste kisses.

"Thank You...Thank You...Thank You."

"There is one more thing though."

"What?"

"Well you are a student, but you are a new student, you aren't in Heather's class, you will be entering as a freshman."

"I'll be two years behind Heather?"

"It's the best I could do under the circumstances."

Mike thought it was better than not going and so he didn't complain. He found a private area of the house to call Heather and tell her about the news.
1112312111111121121.title: Mike finds a way to return to high school

choices: Mike asks Lynda if she wants to double date with him
Mike chickens out, skips the date but sees Jake Monday morning at school.
11123121111111211211.content:
In order to attend school on Monday Mike had to get himself the school uniform. Lynda of course went with him since he couldn't drive there himself and it was just the thing to do. Lynda had already bought the uniform for Erin so she knew what to get. Mike needed everything. They started off with five blouses which contained the school emblem. He couldn't wear the same one day after day. Then they picked up three skirts and over a dozen pairs of tights. They needed two pairs of shoes to complete the basics. Everything they needed had to be in Mike's size. This wasn't too much of a problem since they got the stuff from the recommended store and not the run of the mill Target store. But there was more, they needed the school gym uniform for girls which was basically a t-shirt and shorts. Lynda also suggested they get a leotard in case Mike wanted to take dance or gymnastics. They also picked up a sweater in the school's colors and a vest for the colder weather. No jewelry was allowed so there didn't need any accessories except for a bag to hold Mike's books in. This was the one area that a student can show some originality in if they wanted to but it was decided to use the one recommended by the school instead of a more elaborate one.

During the shopping trip Mike started to get nervous. It was finally hitting him what a big step this was. He was going to go to school on Monday morning just like Heather and all of the other high schoolers. Lynda picked up on this and tried to comfort Mike. Mike seemed to calm but it was still very big for him.

When they got home there was a message to phone Jake. Mike did so and after talking to him for a while got off the phone and was a bit bummed. Nate asked him what was wrong. With a little prodding it came out. Jake had this friend who he needed to get a date for. It was some long convoluted story but the upshot was that if Jake couldn't get a date for his friend then Jake couldn't go out with Mike. Mike knew that Heather was already seeing someone so she couldn't go out with him. Mike didn't know who else to ask. Nate suggested that he ask mom.

"I can't ask her, she is too old for him."

"Mom is younger than you and she isn't seeing anyone." This statement was completely true regardless of the absurdity of it.

"I don't know I don't think she likes boys so young."

"Ask her, what do you have to lose."

Mike was desperate and decided to ask. But before he could ask Nate popped a candy into his mouth and said, "I wish mom loves dating teenaged boys and that she is an EXPERT at flirting with them." Nate emphasized the word 'EXPERT' when he made his wish. Then before the mint was fully gone Nate added, "and that no one saw anything wrong with Mom dating teenaged boys." Nate was glad he remembered to add that or his mom could get into allot of trouble.
11123121111111211211.title: Mike buys the school uniform

111231211111112112111.content:
Friday afternoon, Lynda took some time off work and drove Mike to the mall. While she had already purchased his uniform, there were a few additional items she knew a girl might need to fit in. Mike wouldn't be allowed to wear earrings, but she had his ears pierced anyway, for when he socialized with his friends outside school. She also bought him some makeup, although nothing too elaborate, along with a "Hello Kitty" purse and wallet.

Later on that afternoon, Mike fidgeted in front of the mirror in the girls' bathroom. He licked his lips, pleased with the taste of his cherry lip gloss. If not for Nate's wishes, he would have made a very odd sight, as aside from his purse, his earrings, and a bit of makeup, his attire was still completely male. He would wear the same school uniform as all his friends, but had no other girl clothing to wear. While this troubled him, he hadn't worked up the courage yet to ask Lynda for additional clothing beyond his school stuff, which had been quite expensive.

He'd decided that he'd only ask if Lynda agreed to the double date, and he was still wondering whether to even ask her about that. But if she agreed, surely she'd spring for a new outfit for him. He wanted to impress Jake sooooo badly.

He was in the bathroom now trying to figure out how to ask her, but was just getting more and more nervous. Maybe Nate would do it for him.

No closer to a solution, he left the bathroom and went to find his wife in the food court. She had gone to order salads for the both of them.

When he found Lynda, he was surprised to see two teens, a boy and a girl, sitting at the table with her. Both were maybe sixteen or seventeen, or just a little older than their son Nate. The boy was sitting across from her, a strange look on his face, while the girl was scowling with her arms crossed. He sat next to Lynda, across from the frowning girl, trying to figure out what was going on.

The first thing he noticed was that at some point Lynda had undone two of the buttons on her blouse, and was showing off the tops of her bra cups. The way she was leaning forward with her shoulders hunched further emphasized her already impressive cleavage. The boy's eyes were locked on her chest, his mouth slightly opened. The girl looked on in disgust.

"Let's go, Chad." She pulled on his arm.

"... you go on," he murmured, waving her off.

"You look strong, Chad," his wife said, licking her lips. "Do you work out?"

Chad's expression brightened. "I'm on the football team!"

Lynda reached across the table, touched his arm. "That's soooo cool. I love football players."

Finally, Mike regained some of his composure. "Lynda? What's going on?"

"Is this your friend?" the girl snapped. "Tell her to stop flirting with my boyfriend before I claw her eyes out."

Between the two of them, Mike and the girl were able to pull Chad's attention away. Lynda seemed disappointed. "You're no fun."

"He was already with someone."

Shrugging, Lynda picked at her salad. "It was just some harmless flirting."

Although his wife's behavior had surprised him, some of the shock was wearing off. Because of Nate's wish, it was already beginning to seem normal that Lynda would flirt with teenage guys, and be good at it, too. Mike reminded himself to ask her for tips later (well, not really, because he only had eyes for Jake!) The best part was that he now felt safe asking her to go on the double date with him.

While they ate, he quickly explained Jake's situation. His wife nodded understandingly. When he was finished, all she asked was whether Jake's friend was cute.

Mike smiled. "Probably! After all, Jake is cute. Why wouldn't his friend be?"

Finishing her salad, Lynda considered it.
111231211111112112111.title: Mike asks Lynda if she wants to double date

choices: A store for more mature women.
1112312111111121121111.content:
Lynda thought about it for less than a minute.

"It sounds great!" she said. "Text him back."

Extremely happy, Mike did as she asked. Jake got back to him almost immediately and confirmed the date for Saturday evening. He and his friend Greg would pick up Lynda and Mike at seven o'clock. Although Lynda could drive (unlike Mike), she liked the idea of the two boys coming to get them.

As they were leaving the food court, Lynda leaned over and whispered. "You do realize what this means, right?"

"What's that?"

Lynda clapped her hands. "We're both going to need new outfits."

Mike, who had just been trying to find a moment to ask his wife about that very matter, could barely contain his enthusiasm. "I want to look good for Jake," he admitted. "Not like a little girl."

"We can fix that," his wife announced, pulling him by the arm.

A few minutes later, Mike was in the fitting room at Victoria's Secret. His wife, acting more like his mom, helped him pick out his first bra. She chose for him something padded, designed to push his chest together and up, giving him the illusion of small breasts and just the hint of cleavage. Along with a pair of lacy pink panties that matched the bra, she also picked out some sports bras for him to wear in gym class and some plain cotton undies. Because of all of Nate's earlier wishes, no one thought it was strange at all for a grown man to squeal in delight like a teenage girl in Victoria's Secret. The women who heard it, including his wife, just smiled.

"I can't wait to tell Heather about this," Mike said, swinging a full shopping bag. The padded bra was clearly visible under his t shirt. Lynda had suggested he wear it out.

Lynda grinned. "You can do that later. We need to find some sexy outfits for tomorrow night."

Nodding, Mike let himself be dragged along to another store.
1112312111111121121111.title: Lynda accepts

11123121111111211211111.content:
Because of his reading, Mike already had an idea what he wanted to wear for a first date. The problem was that he knew nothing in the usual teen girl stores would fit him. Nate, however, had already taken care of that with an earlier wish. When his mom had taken his dad shopping for school uniforms, Nate had known that some intervention would be necessary because it was unlikely the store would carry a uniform in the right size. What Nate wished was that whenever his dad shopped for women's or girl's clothing, stores would carry options in his size.

It was a simple enough wish, but what it meant is that wherever Mike and Lynda went, they found things that would fit both of them. Mike quickly settled on a pair of dark jeans with a pencil leg and a blue silk cami top. Since the top was sleeveless, it would show off his bra straps, but Mike liked that because it was a look many of his friends favored. Studying himself in the mirror, he also realized how much he needed to shave his armpits.

After helping him select his own outfit, Lynda browsed for her own. Mike was glad to see this, as he'd secretly worried she'd try to wear some of her drab, adult clothing for the date, which would be embarrassing.

His wife eventually settled on a pair of jeans much like the ones he had chosen. She considered a cami as well, but since her breasts were much larger than his, it wouldn't work as well. She eventually settled on a v neck tee that clung tightly to her bust. With the right bra, she told him, it would be spectacular.

To be honest, while they pranced and preened in front of the mirrors, neither looked much like a teen girl. But only Lynda got strange looks from other patrons. Because of Nate's wish, Mike's presence was easily accepted while his wife's was not.
11123121111111211211111.title: A store for teen girls.

111231211111112112111112.content:
Lynda didn't care what the other shoppers thought about her. Lynda knew she could have any of the girl's boyfriends if she wanted them. She supposed that she had had quite a few already in her many years of flirting. She probably had had many of their teenaged lovers of their mother's of these girls when they were younger too. None of these realizations concerned Lynda in the least. For her it was quite ordinary. She had been dating teenaged boys for thirty-years now since she was eleven and had gotten quite good at it. There might even be a chance that even though she didn't know Jake she had already dated Jake's friend. She'll find out when he arrived at the house.

What actually concerned Lynda was Mike's date with Jake. Lynda knew that this was going to be Mike's first date with a teenaged boy and she was worried for him. She truly loved him although in what way was complicated now. She wanted the best for him and she didn't want to see Mike hurt. Lynda could tell that Mike was in a full on all out intense teenaged crush on Jake and those could be dangerous. Mike had given up so much to be with this boy. He had given up his job and had returned to high school. He hadn't even returned to high school at the grade level of his friends but he was now like an in coming freshman and that would be tough for Mike too. Mike didn't realize how that was going to be his vision was obscured by his love for Jake. That is all he thought about.

If the date didn't go well then Mike still would be attending high school on Monday. If he did he would likely see Jake in the halls too and his heart would be broken. True Mike was a full grown man and Jake was still just a boy but its not like Mike would beat him up. If things went wrong he would handle it like any other teenaged girl, he would certainly break down crying but then what? Would be drown his troubles in ice cream and sad songs or would he start rumors and get Jake into trouble. Lynda didn't know. But it was premature, they hadn't even dated yet. Lynda would be there at least to see that the date went well.

Lynda was going to have a good time with her date if he knew anything at all. That's what she was there for to have fun not to make any serious relationships although that was a possibility. You never knew what would happen. But that didn't matter what did matter was that she would be with Mike when he went on his first serious date with a boy.

All of these thoughts went through Lynda's head. She didn't stop to think of the absurdity of a man and wife going on a double date with two teenaged boys in which one of them was even a blind date. Mike on the other hand was floating on a cloud. He was in love. Well maybe you could call it an intense crush but it felt like love to Mike. He wanted everything to be perfect. He had to have the perfect outfit, and say just the right things, not come on on too strong nor come on too weak. He had to laugh at Jake's jokes and not seem too silly when doing it. He was bigger and taller than Jake but that didn't matter he had to let Jake take the lead. He didn't realize that Jake liked him so much that Jake was thinking similar things.

When they left the store Lynda and Mike headed home. Mike took a shower as soon as he arrived home he needed to shave his arms and chest so he would have the right look in his new top. He wasn't going to shave his legs since he was going to wear jeans, but he realized he had to wear a skirt (as part of the school uniform) on Monday so he shaved his legs too. He also wanted to practice with his makeup to get the right look. He wanted to look cute but not slutty. He wanted to be sexy but not whorish. He wanted to look sophisticated but not too old for Jake. So he spent what seemed like every moment from the time he got home until Jake picked him up the next evening getting ready. Lynda helped him when she could but there was no use Mike was just too nervous.

Mike was so excited about his date he was driving everyone else nuts. But Nate didn't mind he actually thought it was very, very funny. Nate decided to help Mike out on his date by taking a candy and wishing, "I wish that Dad had the longest, thickest most erect cock in school." There that should help Mike's confidence on his date.

1112312111111121121111121.title: The date goes well

11123121111111211211111212.content:
Monday finally arrived and Lynda had all the kids pile into the car. Lynda drove of course with Mike in the front seat and Nate and Erin in the back. Erin sat in a child safety seat that looked like a toddler seat but was build for her size. In her hands she carried a doll that was her security item when she was much younger but had returned to that function again. Erin was the first to be dropped off. She no longer went to high school she went to daycare like three year olds often do.

Lynda unbuckled Erin from her restraints and escorted her inside the building. While Lynda was gone, Nate asked Mike how his date went and Mike simply said fine. Mike didn't see the need to tell what was both his little brother and his son at the same time what was up with him on a personal level. But even though Mike had already texted Heather all the details he wanted to tell her again in person what had happened.

Lynda returned to the car and they drove to the high school. Nate went in to find his friends and Lynda and Mike went to the office to finish the paper work. When they were done, Mike was given his class schedule. This as it turned out was the same class schedule that Erin had had before she was demoted to daycare. Neither Lynda nor Mike remembered that Erin had ever gone to high school as far as they and everyone else except for Nate had known she had always gone to daycare.

"I'll see you at home," Mike said.

"You'll see me around here too."

"What do you mean?"

"Well I work here now....That was part of the deal to get you into the school, I had to start working here."

"You do?" Nate had made an additional wish using his candies to make Lynda work at the high school. He thought it would be so much fun. Now Lynda could drive Nate and Mike home from school everyday and they didn't have to take the crowded bus. Also, Lynda could start 'going out' with the cute boys she now liked. It was true that she also liked some boys that attended the middle school too. The former wish made her like teenaged boys regardless of their grade level.

"Yeap, it's a good deal, I we can all go in the same car every morning and they even gave me a bump in pay."

"Does that mean I don't have to cook and clean when I get home?"

"No, you still have to. A deal is a deal and you promised."

"OH, OK." Mike said dejected. But that wasn't important now, he had to find Heather and talk to her before the first bell rang. Mike walked off and Lynda followed him into the hall. When she got there, she saw all the sexy boys in the hall. She licked her lips, this was another benefit of working here. All had turned out for the best.
11123121111111211211111212.title: Monday at school.

choices: Good time can't go on forever

111231211111112112111112121.content:
Things had changed at school since Nate had gotten his wishing candy although neither Mike nor Lynda (not anyone else for that matter) knew any difference. Nate was now the most popular kid in school and president of the student council. Nate had dated several of the prettiest girls some he had dated multiple times. There weren't any more bullies at the school. Some of the bullies had found themselves weaker than the average kindergartener. Other bullies found themselves in love with the nerdy boys they used to pick on. Some bullies were so afraid of getting into trouble they would suck their thumbs, or break out crying or in extreme cases wet their pants. Some bullies were on their best behavior, they didn't want to lose their petition to be able to wear the girl's school uniform to be rejected. Others were already attending preschool with Erin. Regardless of the 'punishment' there isn't any more bullying in the high school.

Mike was happy as a clam now that he was a student in the school. He would prefer to be in Heather's class, but he could see her during recess or in the halls and that was just fine with him. Mike also enjoyed his time spent with Jake during the school day. Being kept separate made each encounter more enjoyable.

Lynda liked the new arrangement too. There were so many cute looking boys at the school and she flirted with any one she like that didn't already have a girlfriend. She didn't think that was right, but all free boys were fair game to her. She particularly liked the younger more inexperienced ones. Also since she worked in the office she had the home address of every student in the school. She would drop in at their homes on occasion and 'speak' with them privately in their rooms. Because of Nate's wish that she wouldn't get into trouble, none of the parents of the boys saw anything wrong with it. Lynda made most of their trips to the boys homes right after school. Mike had promised to cook dinner and clean up the house which gave Lynda time for these excursions. On those days, Lynda would pick Erin up at daycare at five o'clock instead of at three, but no one minded.

All in all, going to school was a happy and fun experience for Mike, Lynda and Nate. Erin also enjoyed daycare. She fit right in with the toddlers and her day was full of fun.
111231211111112112111112121.title: A day at school

1112312111111121121111121211.content:
Days, then weeks past. The family had gotten into a new routine and everyone was happy. Lynda had seduced almost twenty boys in the school. She was getting more action than the school slut but no one seemed to mind, not the boy's mothers who thought it was perfectly normal and certainly not the boys. Erin was as happy as any toddler. She could play all she wanted and didn't have to worry about anything not even what clothes she wore or changing her own diapers. Nate enjoyed running the school. Everyone knew him and everyone liked him. Mike made new friends in his grade but also remained friends with Heather and her crowd. Mike and Jake were in love and were going steady. Heather was a little jealous of Mike's relationship.

Everything was great but just a little boring to Nate so he decided to stir up the pot a little bit. He took his candy and made three wishes. One to effect each of his family members. Nate wished, "I wish that Erin would have diarrhea all the time." Of all the wishes this one effected its victim least. Erin was so into her toddler persona that she didn't even notice. She didn't care, she didn't have to change herself anyway.

For his second wish, Nate wished, "I wish that the parents of the boys that mom 'dates' would be concerned if they found out." This second wish made Lynda have to be more secretive if she wanted to pursue a boy she liked. But the boys didn't mind. It actually made her adventures more exciting.

For his last wish, Nate wished, "I wish that Dad would notice how things have changed but not be able to do anything to let anyone know something is wrong." With this third wish, Mike would be horrified about what had happened. He would know he isn't suppose to be going to high school or worse yet dating some boy, but he couldn't do anything about it. He also be horrified that his wife was sleeping with children and his teenaged daughter was acting like a toddler. Mike found himself living a nightmare which was actually the life of a typical teenaged girl.
1112312111111121121111121211.title: Good time can't go on forever

choices: She refuses. She needs to look out for Mike.
1112312111111121121111122.content:
Just a little after eight, Greg and Jake arrived. Greg was driving with Jake in the passenger seat, so Lynda and Mike dutifully got into the back, each of them clutching their purses. Lynda could tell her husband was nervous, but it was hard for her to concentrate once she got a look at Greg. He was older than Jake by at least a year and very well built, making Jake appear almost slender in comparison.

"Sup, ladies." That was Greg.

"Hi, boys," Lynda said, secretly squeezing Mike's hand. She felt bad for him. He hardly said a word until they got to Applebee's, where they were going to have dinner before seeing a movie. She wished Jake had taken more of the initiative and introduced everyone back at the house, or at least opened Mike's door for him or something. But he was young and apparently hadn't learned exactly how to treat a girl yet.

Fortunately, at Applebee's, he recovered somewhat and did open the door for Mike, even kissing his hand in a way that Lynda would have found cheesy if not for the obvious pleasure her husband got from the gesture.

"It's good to see you again, babe."

Mike blushed furiously as Jake introduced Lynda to Greg. He didn't call Lynda Mike's wife or anything like that, nor even indicate that he knew they were married. He introduced her to Greg as "Mike's friend." That was just fine with her. Greg was taller than Mike, even in those strappy sandals, and Lynda looked forward to getting to know him better without any distractions like her marriage vows getting in the way.

Jake, being younger than his friend, was also a little less confident, and in some ways Mike was younger than any of them. The two of them entered the restaurant first holding hands. Lynda, meanwhile, gave Greg a wicked grin and put her arm through his.

"You look fine, girl."

"So do you."

"Jake's actually my cousin. I'm staying with his family for a spell."

As it turned out, Greg was from another city. He'd been suspended from school for fighting. He would only be around for another week. That was fine with Lynda, as she wasn't looking for anything long term. She pretended to be impressed with his tattoos, touching his hand in just the right way, and laughing when appropriate. Her hope was that all this would rub off on Mike.

Fortunately, Mike didn't need that much help. He giggled whenever Jake tried to say something funny, and seemed to be genuinely impressed with the boy's intelligence. Lynda even caught her husband dropping "like" and "you know" into sentences, a habit he'd apparently picked up from his friends. "Stay focused, Ray." Mike shouted, demanding. All the while, 'Raymond' nervously rambled about Kate.

"I just wish that she were here, y'know?" 'Raymond wished.

Just as Mike was about to protest, infuriatedly, a bright, blinding light spread about the room, covering everything in the room. The wish took place and was filled promptly. Mike would be the victim of this wish.

Mike, from his masculine, middle aged man frame shrunk down and got smaller, in height and body mass. By the time the shrinking was done, he resembled a small teen boy, around his son's age. Next, his 'male plumbing' had been done away with completely, being replaced with the reproductive organs of a healthy young, teenage girl. He was now a she.

Her features then became more and more feminine; She lost all the hair about her body, except for her head, where her short brown hair became much longer, around the shoulder blades and notably darker, almost black, but still brown, nonetheless. Her legs and hips became more shapely and slightly more curvaceous. On her legs, the muscle once there diminished almost completely, being replaced by womanly fat, giving her rather attractive thighs. Her feet and hands became more slender. Her eyes closed, and, upon opening them, her blue eyes were now green. Her Adam's Apple faded completely, leaving only the sweet voice of a teen girl. Even her clothes changed, all she wore now was a pair of denim shorts, mid thigh, and a tee-shirt of the high-school Kate and Nate attended. On her feet, only a pair of sneakers and ankle length white socks. Mike was now a copy of Kate Smith. One could hardly tell that the person who now appeared to be Kate Smith, 15 year old girl, was really Mike Wilson, a father, husband and man.

'Raymond,' looked where Mike once was and found his daughter before him. "Kate! Honey! I'm so glad I found you! I've been looking for you everywhere!"

Mike looked incredibly confused, uncomfortable even. "Uhm... Raymond? It's me Mike, I don't know what happened, but it's me, I'm in the body of your daughter..." Mike pleaded.

"What are you talking about? You're not a man, you're clearly my daughter! Now stop calling me 'Raymond!'" I'm your Dad!"

Just as Mike was about to plead some more for his identity, there was that mental struggle again, this time the personalities of Mike and Kate conflicting over control. For whatever reason, Kate had successfully taken over.

"Sorry about that, Dad! I don't know what came over me! I felt like... I was someone else for a minute!" 'Kate' sweetly asserted, completely unaware of 'her' former status of an adult man.

"I know that feeling, Hon." 'Raymond' agreed.

"Come on," 'Kate' started. "We really should get back down to that party Nate's having."
113321112111111.title: 'Raymond'

1151.content:
"Nate Wilson, I presume?"

The shock of the shockingly shocking question shocks you so much it's shocking. In a span of about a minute you think you've managed to thoroughly convince yourself you're either fast asleep, clinically insane, or both. Standing in front of you, quite impossibly, is a stranger, a year older than you, with your exact hair, vividly green eyes, standing at five feet eight inches, physically fit, and who apparently knows your name.

"Who exactly are you?" you ask, confused as to how he got in your room - he certainly wasn't here before.

"Sorry for the confusion," he said apologetically. "My name is Donovan Wilson-Smith."

"Wilson-Smith?" you ask, unable to think temporarily. The names seem familiar somehow.

"You see," the stranger continued, "I'm actually, right now, technically, negative twenty-three years old. I come from the future."

"The future..." You feel as if you will faint if you receive any more shock today.

"Yes. You see, I'm your son.

Dad, are you okay? You seem faint."

*****

You wake up gasping in your covers. That was a weird dream, you think. You sit up, rubbing the sleep from your eyes, and see that the box of candies is still on your bed with the note still attached.

"That was quite a fall you had there."

You recognize the voice but are afraid to turn around. Instead, you reach into your pocket and feel - just as you feared - thirty dollars.

You turn your head slowly and once again see your son Donovan. "Big day, huh?"

Just then, someone enters your room. It's your sister, Erin, carrying an omelette. "Hey, big brother. I heard you fainted, which is why you missed breakfast. Here's to make up for it."

She turns to Donovan. "Who are you?" she asked.

Donovan replies, "I'm a friend from school," and winked slyly at you.

"Okay," she says and went downstairs.

*****

After you ate breakfast, you felt well enough to get out of bed. However, Donovan blocks your way. "Before we go," he said, "we have a few things to discuss."

"Yes, we do," you reply. "First of all, if you're from the future, why come here?"

"It's your friend, Josh Howards. In the future, a megalomaniac who will go unnamed takes over Missouri. Josh Howards is a spy who knows that the code that can stop him is in a locked chest in his basement because of the identity of the megalomaniac, but said megalomaniac destroyed the only key. My mission is to get the young Josh Howards to give the key so I can take it to Josh Howards in the future."

"But we're not in Missouri," you complain.

"Whatever. I realized I needed help - someone whom I knew would believe who I was - and the obvious answer was either you or my mother, Kate Smith. You would know I was telling the truth because you would recognize my face."

It's true, you realize, seeing that his face is almost a perfect cross between yours and Kate's. You also silently cheer that you are eventually going to marry her.

"It's not going to be easy, because no doubt the Megalomaniac will know what we're doing and cause obstacles; besides, convincing Howards to give the key won't be easy. That's why I sent you the candies; I can't use them because I'm displaced in time, but you're still fully intact."

"So I need to do what exactly?" you ask.

"Well, since Howards is too rational to believe our story, the only way we can get him to hand over the key is if we give him the only thing in the world he values more than anything: his grandfather's old photo album. Last I heard, it was somewhere in the Himalayas. It won't be easy; the candies only get you so far. We can only take three other people with us, but I'd recommend only taking one, since we may need to pick up more along the way. Naturally, it'll be Mom - Kate Smith, I mean."

Do you accept your quest?
1151.title: young, around a teenager

"When a strange man who looks like a combination of you and your crush shows up at your doorstep claiming to be your son from the future and sends you on a quest, you don't not accept. Therefore, I will not do what I shouldn't do and instead do what I shouldn't not do, which is to say, I don't refuse the acceptance of the quest which I refuse to not accept."

"What?" asks Donovan, thoroughly bemused.

"Yes," you say. "Sorry, I don't know what happened there. The shock of this shockingly shocking turn of events these past few minutes shocks me so much it's shocking, but I think I've recovered."

"Good. I recommend heading out immediately. I don't know how much the Megalomaniac has done to protect his future, but if I'm right, he knows I traveled back here and he's laid traps. Needless to say, he'll be after the photo album - he'll want to secure the key from Josh Howards and destroy the Maguffin."

"The Maguffin?"

"The thing in the chest in the future. It's a type of plot device. That's not what matters right now."

"So we head out now."

"Exactly. First, of course, we'll need to convince Mom to join up with us. It won't be easy, since she always seems to have some social engagement, but if you manage to become her boyfriend within the span of the next 48 hours without mentioning me, we can all set off together."

"That's acceptable," you say, even though it's something you were probably going to do anyways. "Wait, why the arbitrary rules?"

"They're not arbitrary at all. You only have 48 hours because the clock is ticking and the candies will only take to new users during that time period. You can't mention me - or at least say who I am - because that will jinx the mission. Literally. If someone knows about a future event which directly springs from a future socioempathic connection, it greatly reduces the odds that said socioempathic connection will occur."

"I think I understood some of that," you lie.

"Good. Now go get that girl."

You obviously pop a candy in your mouth, but before you can say anything your son yells, "STOP IT DAD!"

You pop the candy back out of your mouth into your hand so you can say, "What?"

Donovan sighs and puts his hand on his head. "No, no, no," he says. "It just doesn't work that way."

"Work what way?" you ask, nervously putting the candy down.

He sits you down on the bed, clears his throat, and starts talking.

"You were obviously about to say the exact words 'I wish Kate Smith were my girlfriend.' There are three very obvious things wrong with that - that is, if you understand how the candies work. The first and simplest is that it's the wrong color candy. Different colors grant different types of wishes. If you want a romantically-oriented wish, you need to use a pink candy.

"Secondly, the candies are often unpredictable. If you don't word your wish right, it might be granted in a way you didn't expect but which comes natural to the candies. If you've studied them for as long as I have, you know that the wish you were trying to make, even done on the right candy, would be granted by analyzing your girlfriend and causing Kate Smith to take on characteristics of her. Since you don't have a girlfriend, there are no characteristics for Mom to take on, so she will simply cease to exist - to become 'nobody', who is presently your girlfriend.

"Thirdly, even if you worded it properly, making wishes which involve the emotions of others is extremely risky. It wouldn't result in anything resembling emotional stability for any involved parties, and the last thing we need on a desperate quest to save Missouri is emotional instability. In short, you have to become her girlfriend 'the normal way' - by asking her.

"Now, to divulge in-depth into the inner workings of the candies..."

Half an hour later, you are a master of the candies.

You now need to become your crush's girlfriend 'the normal way'.

You start your quest the way any hero would - by eating breakfast with your family.

Nobody questions the quest you casually mention, nor do they doubt the identity of your friend. After they each faint, revive, and look quizzically at your $30, that is.

Now that you're not hungry, you may begin your extremely heroic crushquest.
