121131122111112111.title: The Replacement.

1211311221111121111.content:
Tommy was very pleased to see Natalie and her sisters board the bus. He called to her, but she didn't seem to hear him over the din of the engine and talking kids. So he waited patiently till she was walking right next him and gently prodded her squishy upper arm: "Hey!"

Natalie turned, her eyes widened to saucers as she saw him: "T-tommy!"
"Hi Natalie. What's up?"

"Uh...hi Tommy." said Natalie scared, now taken aback at the sight of seeing her best friend this soon. "Err...what are you doing on the bus?"

"Our car broke down. I'm just riding the bus till its repaired." he again extended his arm and rubbing her shoulder in an affectionate manner. "You didn't call last night. Something the matter?"

Something certainly was the matter. Natalie cringed and visibly flinched beneath his touch, stepping out of reach in horror.

Being touched by Tommy wasn't a new thing for Natalie. As mates they had had physical contact frequently. A pat on the back, wrestling in the dirt. Standing on each others shoulders to reach greater heights. But this was a different ball-game entirely. They had both been boys. To be touched and rubbed in fondness as the girlfriend of your previous mate; it was nothing short of mortifying. Worse still was that Tommy's strong firm fingers had elicited a warm pleasant glow from Natalie's soft sensitive skin where he had touched the bare flesh of her arm. To her terror, Natalie had enjoyed it.....

"What's wrong?" asked Tommy, sensing her mental discomfort, reattempting to feel her arm.
Natalie knocked his hand away: "Don't touch me!" she hissed. Oh dear, how did he screw up this time? wondered Tommy.

"But...why? Did I do something?" he asked hurt. Changing tactics he held her gently by the hips. Natalie's face first blanched, then reddened and heated up like the inside of a furnace as the blood of embarrassment rushed to her face.

With a scowl she slugged him in the chest, back into his seat: "I said don't touch me!! I swear I will break you! Just please!"
Tommy frowned worriedly: "Okay, I'm sorry. But if you can just tell me what I did wrong." Natalie was looking at him the way one looked at something that had crawled out from the swamps and had died on your doorstep. Tommy wondered how he pissed off his girlfriend this badly.

Natalie had a pained expression; she didn't want to hurt her mate, but she also didn't want to be his sweatheart either. She pursed her puffy lips and said: "Look, it's not you, it's me." Oh now that sounded so salty, Natalie wanted to gag at herself. Fleeing, she stalked off to sit as far away from Tommy as possible.

Tommy smiled at Natalie's retreating form; she was going to be difficult again today...

=====

When Erin had made her wish she had made it vague and without any specifications. All she had wished for was that Nate could be her older sister. And since Nate had already been her older sibling, the only thing the magical candies had altered was his gender, nothing more, nothing less. This might seem like an insignificant detail, but it had a large impact on how the effects and results of Erin's wish was carried out.

Nate had flipped gender and his reality had been feminized, like his room. But the rest of his life had remained unaltered. His past: every action he had taken, every event that had influenced him, was unchanged. His personality, hobbies, talents, desires, memories, the way other people had remembered him, his relationships and activities, his friends, all unchanged. So everything he had done( or not done) as a boy was replicated exactly, precisely; only as if he had done/not done them as a girl.

Now as a boy, Nate had never worn skirts, bras, panties, teddies, dresses, stockings or bikinis. He had never used make-up, never gone to the mall to shop for recreation. He had never participated in any girly activities whatsoever. And as a boy these traits were obviously unremarkable. But as a female...boy oh boy, they made Natalie one hell of a tomboy girl as seen through the eyes of her friends and family in this altered reality!

For example: Nate had never worn earrings. Neither had Natalie. Thus the reason why her feminist mother wanted to take her for piercings in this reality.

Nate was an outdoors-person and a naturalist who adored creepy crawlies. So was Natalie; this truly made her the arch anti-steriotype of feminism.
Tommy Iverson loved Natalie for this. In his memory as altered by the magical-sweets, they still had shared their childhood since kindergarden, but with Natalie as a girl. In Tommy's mindset Natalie was a rough and husky girl who didn't mind getting dirty or breaking a few nails; she had a real sense of adventure for things like sleeping in tents or even out in the open(again: normal for boys, relatively extraordinary for girls). She was a lot of fun to hang with.

Course when they grew older and out of their baby fat, so too did they grow out of the childish-stage where touching one of the opposite sex was 'icky'. Tommy's adoration for his childhood friend (Natalie) turned into attraction as she blossomed into a lithe cute teenager. When Tom had first asked Natalie out, it had earned him a fist in the face. But he was persistent: eventually after a swollen nose, a blue and black eye and a sore jaw, Natalie had relented and realized he wasn't mocking her, and had agreed to be his girlfriend. Least this was this was the version of events as experienced by Tom as the magical-sweets had made him believe.

Natalie could be a difficult girlfriend to work with. Tommy had at last summoned the guts to send her a love-letter yesterday; nothing mushy, merely in plain and simple terms how he felt about her. Natalie would have broken both his legs with a blunt instrument if he dared to be romantic with her, as she disliked being treated like a girl ( just as Nate obviously would have revolted against being treated like a girl in his original reality). Tommy hoped it wasn't because of his letter that she was regarding with such disgust right now on the bus....

=====

Sighing,Tommy sat back down next to the red-haired, 17-year old Zepp Howards, now his closest male buddy in the absence of Nate. Zepp was an anomaly. He had good grades, but constantly got in trouble, running the risk of being expelled from school. His life hobbies included mixing gunpowder, building crackers and launching fireworks. At the roofs of people's homes. And then fleeing before the authorities...
He had a lot of guts at least. The bus monitor, a mean obese woman, sat a mere 2 seats away, and he was in the midst of folding a makeshift cigar-shaped flash-stick.

"Trouble in paradise?" asked Zepp, without looking up. He had seen the exchange between Natalie and Tommy.
"I think Natalie hates me." replied Tommy in gloom.
"Did you figure that out before or after she told you in her usual polite ladylike way to eff off?"

"I don't get it. Did I say something to upset her?" said Tommy ruffling his hair goofily.
"Dunno. Were you stupid enough to tell her how pretty she looked this morning? You know how our dear Natalie loathes compliments about her good looks." said Zepp now licking the paper the edge of a paper cylinder the way one licked at a letter and rotated it closed to resemble a fat cigarette; withing this he inserted something resembling like a miniature piece of dynamite.
"No." said Tom. "I only said hi. And yet...she looked at me like I was toxic garbage. Like I was something lower than...lower than-"

"Lower than shark shit shade at the bottom of the sea abyss?!" queried Zepp enthusiastically.
"Gee thanks. That does wonders for my self-esteem."
"Sure thing. Anytime buddy."

"But seriously: did I do something insensitive? I only wrote her a letter. Guess I'm the world's worst poet."

"I wouldn't worry about it. My bet is Natalie's just having her girl time of the month. Quite understandable she'd be a bit irritated."
"What do you mean?"
"What the heck do you mean 'what do I mean'?? What else could I be referring to when I say the key words of 'girl' and 'once per month'?"

"Oh."
"Yeah, oh. Still, don't sweat it. She'll get over it in the course of the morning. Then she'll be back to her old cheerful swearing self, telling us what maggots we are. Then we'll all live happily ever after. While I place this zoll in the principles exhaust pipe." said Zepp, holding up the menacing looking little cigar-thing with a fuse running out its one end.
"I somehow doubt that. I think she's angry at me in particular." said Tom, looking at Natalie sitting several rows behind him next to her sister, Erin.

He hoped Natalie would forgive him soon, he had wanted to ask her out on a date this weekend...
1211311221111121111.title: Busride.

choices: Natalie's point of view; her schoolday.
Nicole's point of view; how she discovers the Candies of Change...
12113112211111211111.content:
WHATS WITH ALL THIS TOUCHING!!! raged Natalie in her mind.

The morning had been understandably traumatic and unnerving for Natalie with the discovery that she would remain a girl for life. But what finally derailed her, was when Tommy Iverson had touched her.
Natalie had already been dreading to confront her best friend as a female, but she had never anticipated it to be so soon, and on the bus.

It hadn't been 10 seconds till the little basterd had started to get intimate and had rubbed her shoulder! But what finally had made her flip was when he had held her by the hips! Natalie didn't know what had been worse: the fact that she had wanted to rip him to shreds for grasping her, or the fact that she (in her infinite humiliation) had for a split-moment wanted him to keep holding her as his girlfriend...

The feel of his gentle hands on her sides had short-fused her fluttering heart. It had been a marvelous sensation to be held by such firm handsome hands. But...like a Thermometer exploding at the top-end from being overheated (almost like Natalie's blood-pumped red face at that very instant), Natalie had erupted with indignation as she had lost all self-control and had vehemently punched him in the chest. Natalie was almost glad that she was now weaker as a girl, for she might had cracked a few of Tommy's ribs as Nate. Almost...her fist felt sore beneath the impact...

What the F###?! Natalie couldn't believe she had actually been attracted to Tommy! This can't be real! What was wrong with her?! Her male pride quaked with shame at the thought that she had, and in fact still now as she sat next to Erin, felt a warm glow at the thought of being held by Tommy. Another guy! Her mind was in turmoil of confusion: how can it feel so natural? She had been a boy herself! She can't like another boy!
It wasn't helped by either the fact that Tommy had treated it as if having touched her as his girlfriend had been normal, nor by her stupid sister Erin grinning goofily and doe-eyed at her as if to state: "Ooh! I saw all that! Natalie's in love!"

But Natalie calmed and composed herself; she just needed to get through the day for the weekend. And then she could try and figure out things out from there.
The bus halted in front of school-grounds and unloaded its cargo of teenaged humanity. There the passengers joined a further throng of children clad in the school's uniform to mingle and socialize before the bell alerted everyone to the commencement of the schoolday.

To her dismay, Natalie discovered that her experience in physical contact as a girl wasn't over yet. It was the hugging! Every single girl wanted to hug Natalie in greeting! They were obsessed with it! Hugs, hugs and just more blistering hugs! Every single girl, without exception just had to insist; they just wouldn't take no for an answer!!!
"Err...no thanks, I'm good." Natalie would say meekly, holding up her hands, and try to slip away.
"Oh don't be such a sour-prune." they would answer cheerfully and almost cheekily, and just go ahead and embrace her tightly without giving her a chance to evade. No less than 2 dozen girls 'ensnared' Natalie like this!

At first Natalie thought the schoolgirls were mocking HER in particular; that they knew she was in fact the previous Nate. But as she looked carefully, she realized that hugging simply seemed to be an ingrained behaviour when it came to girls greeting other girls. It seemed that a hug was a simple sincere physical expression of acceptance between female companions. It was quite a queer sight to Natalie whom had been a male previously. Girls would hug her with far more fondness than she would her own mother! Even if they weren't particularly close either.

Boys in comparison would rarely resort to any such form of intimacy. Maybe a handshake, maybe a pat on the back, maybe high-five or a fist to shoulder. But NEVER a hug! To hug your male buddy without any exceptionally special reason, like having your favorite sports-team win a League or season, would be regarded particularly awkward. Even brothers and cousins would never hug and only connect via a hearty handshake. Male hugging was sometimes allowed if tragedy struck, but even then it had to be quick. And even THEN the hug had to be a firm, powerful bear's embrace of manliness! Not the gentle, extended, almost cuddling way girls were hugging Natalie now! Quite strange really...

Kate Smith, Heather Yamato, Janet Day, all of Nate's previous good girl friends (note the separation you idiots) were in on this morning ritual of hugging. And all of them, much to Natalie's annoyance, asked her about what she did last night.
When boys greeted one another, they did it in short syllable dialogue. All they would say was: "What's up?" and the answer would be: "Not much. You?" and that would be the sole extent of conversation for the entire morning.

But no! Girls just HAD to be different, didn't they? They weren't satisfied by one-liner answers; for each and every one you had to explain in vivid detail precisely what had happened in your life the previous day, now matter how boring or repetitive it was!

Luckily...or unluckily, Erin was there to answer on Natalie's behalf. Natalie frowned on Erin's bubbling happiness; once again she seemed oblivious to Natalie's discomfort. It was as if Erin were ecstatically showing off her new baby puppy. Much to Natalie's blushing embarrassment Erin told of her and Natalie's sister's slumber-party. The girls ooh'd and aah'd at how sweet that was and expressed what a good sister Natalie was in comparison to their own bratty siblings. Natalie's blush intensified and she tugged nervously at the straps of her chappy-pink backpack.

When Erin arrived at the part where she had practiced make-up on her sister, all of the girls in the group squealed in delight and congratulated her for having had her tomboy sister made ladylike. Thoroughly ticked off at this, Natalie stalked away cherry-faced. But the girls would have none of it and yanked her back.
"Don't be like that, Natalie!" wined Heather, pulling her arm.
"You should come to one of OUR slumber-parties too!" said Janet, tugging the other arm.
"Join us to the mall! You'll love it! I swear!" Kate pleaded.

Natalie snorted. "Ugh."
"Tell you what." said Janet, holding Natalie secure with her athletic arms, playing with Natalie's ponytail. "We can go visit the petstore and any other place you want, as long as you spend the afternoon shopping with us."
"Yeah." said Heather, holding Natalie's left hand. "You NEVER go out with us! We really like you!"

"I'm busy!" said Natalie desperately, feeling as if she were being divided as feed amongst a pack of harpies. Friendly, kind ones, but still!
"With what? With Tommy?" jeered Kate, among the giggles of all present.
"No!" hissed Natalie, her cheeks resembling the rising morning sun.
"Good!" declared Kate. "Then we'll see you after school!"

Catching at straws: "But I have an appointment after school at 2!" Natalie said brightly, thinking of an escape.
"Yeah, but...the piercing is AT the mall, Natalie! We can meet after Ma takes you there." chirped Erin innocently from the side.
Natalie gave Erin a dark look.
"What piercings exactly?" Heather asked Erin.
"Natalie's first earrings! Lynda is taking us to the jewelers. Can I come with too?"

"Sure!" said Janet brightly. "Just keep Natalie from escaping till we get there!"

Natalie looked at Erin, sighing: "I hate you."
"And I LOVE you, Sis!" Erin replied with smile that threatened to split her small head in half, holding her sister's lower arm lovingly. She was going to squeeze out every drop of fun she could have with Natalie during today.

The monitonous ring of the plaza bell informed that it was now 7:15 AM, and that the first class were about to start. Natalie dug in her bag and was relieved to see from her roster that all her classes had remained the same. Biology first, them maths, excetera.
The group diverged and the children went their separate ways...

========

Secrets were like cocaine to Nicole. Trying to keep something hidden from her, be it innocent or scandalous, were like teasing a blood-hound with a raw steak. The moment Erin had tried to hide the candy-container from her backpack, Nicole's curiosity went haywire and her senses went hyper. Nicole simply loved getting beneath the skin of people, Erin more than most (one of the reasons they didn't get along very well, and why Erin and Natalie were far closer as sisters). And the best way to pester people, was to threaten to expose their closet skeletons, even if Nicole never intended to. It was also a fine way to milk favors: like getting Erin to buy her ice-cream every recess in trade for not telling mom about her poor grades or whatever.

During the entire bus-trip, Nicole's eyes had been glued to Erin's bag. Erin was hiding something, something BIG; that much was certain; for Erin was a usually open, honest person. And Nicole simply squirmed in glee at the thought of finding out exactly what it was...
Nicole was patient. She just needed to follow Erin around, and see where she went with her backpack. She already knew the combination for Erin's locker...
12113112211111211111.title: Hugs...Ugh!

121131122111112111112.content:
This was so easy, it was almost a crime. Well actually it was a crime: robbing another child's locker at school was punishable by detention, but that was beside the point!
Nicole had tailed Erin the whole morning, keeping in the crowd, keeping inconspicious, something made easy by her looking such an innocent adorable little sweet girl.

Finally her enduring patience and persistence had paid off in the form of Erin leaving her school-bag unguarded in her locker for recess. Nicole was on the locker like a dog on a T-bone steak, clicking out the numbers to unlock the combination. The lock clacked, indicating it was opened...

At last, like a treasure hunter having found the fabled X on his map, Nicole opened locker with extended heart-thumping drama, as if she was opening a bank vault. Looking sideways if any could see what she was doing (and looking as guilty as a crow this time), Nicole opened Erin's bag. Excitement quickly turned to disappointment as Nicole rummaged through the backpack. Nothing seemed out of the ordinary. Books, spacecase, a few girly baubles, but nothing even remotely of interest. Nicole was peeved. She had such great expectations of what Erin's secret was. She puffed up her cheeks out of frustration at not having had her way.

Then it happened: she found the candy-container. But Nicole didn't react. She just pushed it aside, not realizing its significance. Then she opened it and looked inside to see if it hid Erin's notorious little secret. Only candy danggit, Nicole thought bitterly.

Then the next thing happened: SHE ATE A PIECE OF CANDY in an attempt to spite Erin whose secret seemed safe.
There is nothing here! thought Nicole. What could it be? Was I mistaking when I thought I saw Erin hiding something? No! She was suspicious! She acted happy! Then stressed when Natalie asked her what she was looking at!
I WISH I KNEW WHAT SHE WAS HIDING! Nicole thought. And that, dear reader, triggered the magic of the candies of change.

Inside Nicole's mind it was raging like a flashbang. She felt her brain go numb as her memories of Nate as having been altered by Erin's wish to making her think her older brother had always been her older sister revert back. She had wished to know what Erin had been hiding; and the only way to grant her wish was for the magical sweets to inform her of their supernatural properties and tell her all about the events Nate had endured as Natalie.

Nicole gasped out loud. Then she laughed and giggled hysterically at the thought that her dear brother was now a girl and that she KNEW! Other school children looked at her funny, but she ignored their stares. She was going to have the time of her life chiding him about being a her! And now that she had these sweets she was going to be the ultimate pest! But she wouldn't be cruel to him, only toy around with him a bit.

She placed back the container in the bag and closed and locked the locker. But only after having taken a single candy piece.....

==================

Natalie wished she had listened to her mother Lynda when she had told Natalie to cross and close her legs whenever sitting as a girl.
The reason: that little dipshit of a pervert, Joey whom sat 2 tables in front of her, had been eyeballing her undies for the last 1/2-hour of Maths! As a boy, Nate had been well acquainted with the arts and crafts of perversion, even if he hadn't been guilty of them, and therefore Natalie had caught the creeper out in very short order...

Joey had used a shaving hand-mirror which he had glued to the top of his one shoe to violate Natalie's undergarments with his eyeball pressure. Having seen the whiteness of her cotton panties in the mirror's reflection, Natalie had snapped her legs shut with the force and speed of a brick-press and swore under her breath. That creeper! Natalie had the mindset of a boy, but the modesty of a girl, and she wasn't going to let this stand, oh no!

Plotting revenge, Natalie constructed a makeshift blow-dart gun, by taking out the ink-capsule of one of her pens, leaving only the outer plastic shell for a pea-shooter. Using the ample marksmanship Nate had with slingshots, Natalie decked the mirror with a bullseye of a chewed paper ball. Then she shot his right ear. When Joey turned around in indignity at who the heck would do such a 'childish' thing, he saw Natalie looking him straight in the eye. Natalie couldn't tell whether his ears glowed bright red from pain or embarresment at having been caught out.

The rest of the morning had passed relatively normally for Natalie. Well...as normal for as could be for one who'd been gender-bended by his little sister into a her. But Natalie couldn't focus on improving her academic prowess at all. She suffered from the duel stress of feeling out of place as a female and whether she would remain a girl forever, a fate she most certainly didn't want, even if Erin did.

But most annoyingly, she couldn't stop thinking about Tommy bloody Iverson! It was just so, SO wrong!! To be the girlfriend of his previous best buddy! It burned Nate's very soul with disgust and shame!
And yet...and yet Natalie couldn't stop thinking about him! Worse still was that she felt a warm pleasant glow whenever she did! An increase in the pumping of her heart.; sweaty palms; a mouth running as dry as a cork. What the hell?! She was falling in love with him!
And yet she liked that thought. She liked the prospect of being Tommy's girlfriend even if she didn't want to! The less she tried to think about Tommy, the more she longed for him! Her mind was in utter turmoil!!!
Natalie sighed deeply and just banged her head into her bunk in resignation. This sucks, she thought demoralized.

Trying to get her mind off of Tommy, Natalie thought of something else instead. Like her friggen missing pockets! Earlier this morning Natalie had concluded that girl clothing must have been designed by mentally deranged people. For they had no pockets! Skirts had no pockets! Girl jeans, shorts and trousers seldom had pockets! What on earth? She realized the importance of handbags as she needed one if she wanted to carry any loos articles with her outside of her backpack.

Nate had always licked the feeling of a weight in his pockets. He would carry a pocket-knife, his cellphone or even a compass with him. But the fact remained: he always carried something in his pockets! This was not possible in a skirt. Natalie only had her shirt pocket and to put something in that as her shirt strained against her over-endowed breasts was an impossibility. Natalie just blushed at the thought.
Luckily her girl self seemed to also have disregarded handbags just as Nate did as she couldn't find one in her backpack.

She hoped the girls whom had wormed her into a shopping session this afternoon wouldn't make her buy a handbag! Natalie felt depressed all over again as she remembered that she would have to go for piercings and then suffer through a all out girls's shopping spree with Erin, Kate, Heather and Janet. She didn't feel like she had the energy for that as well! What a day!

Natalie just sighed. This was proving the adventure...
121131122111112111112.title: Nicole's wish.

1211311221111121111121.content:
And the adventure went on as she faced Tommy again. Damn her thoughts were really become more and more girly while Tommy was around. She had to find any way to become a male again, maybe she can find the box still in the trash been? She urgently wanted to check this when at home.
But before being home again she had to survive the afternoon, which means getting the ear piercing and doing a shopping tour with the girls.
Damn as a girl you don’t have an easy life!
1211311221111121111121.title: Continue in school with Natalie

12113112211111211111212.content:
Natalie went to classes as usual, not noticing the mysterious black haired girl looking her intently ever since she entered the room.

‘Oh my, he actually got turned into a girl,’ the girl thought as she giggled, but no one reacted, ‘How mean of them to throw the candies in the trash, I spent a lot of time making those. 15 whole minutes. Hmph,’ she pouted.

Natalie managed to suppress her thoughts about Tommy for now, but there was no telling when they would surface once more. She found it hard to believe that the candies were truly gone, and yet cruel reality only served to remind her time and time again.

She refused to accept this fate thrust upon her by a mindless piece of candy, she would persevere and find some way to get out of this nightmare of a parallel universe or whatever it was. As she thought that, the teacher droned on about the Planet Jupiter and its countless moons.

The class eventually ended signalling the end of the school day, and she departed from her place of solace away from the terror which was eating away at her mind bit by bit. The mental block she worked hard to seal away the thoughts of Tommy shattered as she saw him walking in the distance.
12113112211111211111212.title: more around school

choices: Have her turn Erin into a boy?
121131122111112111112122.content:
I expected more entertainment out of the sweets, but it looks like they’re now playing it safe. I’ll have to show them what wishes are all about, ehehe.

The mysterious girl walked out of the class along with Natalie who didn't suspect a thing. She wore glasses and looked quite ordinary. Or that’s what the magical illusion shown to the other students looks like. In reality, she didn't need glasses in the slightest was extremely beautiful, despite appearing only 15 years old.

What shall I do now…?
121131122111112111112122.title: The Mysterious Girl

1211311221111121111121221.content:
The mysterious girl wearing an elegant black dress lied back on a luxurious canopy bed in a giant mansion, and pondered what she was going to do next.

Ehehe, I’ll let you have a taste of your own medicine, Erin. You didn’t see this coming, did you? Haha, that makes it even better. The mysterious girl started drawing golden runes with her finger and they melded into the world one by one.

First, I will have you slowly transform into a boy. I will save your breasts and vagina for last. I’ll also have to block the candies from reversing this spell for a few weeks, trivial. What time period shall I use? Oh, I know, ehehe. Over the next 12 hours, you will turn into a boy. Yeah. That’ll be good.

The mall was surprisingly close to the school, so Erin walked with the transformed Natalie who was still grouchy about being transformed into a girl. Relax, just embrace it. Sigh. I really don’t want to change her back, but… The consequences of not doing so are horrifying. I wouldn’t want her to do anything hasty, if she hates it that much. I wouldn’t put it past her going to some shady doctor.

Natalie flicked through various shady websites on her phone, ‘They claim to do gender reversals, huh. It’s worth a shot. Even though they might be a scam, it’s still better than being like this and having my mind eroded bit by bit by this stupid Tommy brainwashing candy,’ Natalie thought.

She stopped on one site which had the most ridiculous and had the stupidest promises, but as she knew, the impossible was very much possible.

‘What the hell is this site? Madame Mara’s Magical Emporium? Even for a scam, this isn’t very convincing. Nonono, I shouldn’t pass up any possibility. Screw that, these prices are highway robbery.

$5 million for a gender reversal? Pfft… $10 million to gain the ability to fly? That’s just stupid …And what’s this, candies which can change reality for $50 million dollars, who would belie- Candies?! It couldn’t be, could it? Even if it’s the real thing, where on earth am I supposed to get $50 million? I would have to sleep with every man in this godforsaken city.’

As Natalie was worrying about changing back, Erin’s body slowly got bulkier and more muscular, although the full extent of these changes wouldn’t be visible for an hour or two.
1211311221111121111121221.title: Have her turn Erin into a boy?

1211311221111121111122.content:
Nicole tore through the school hallways with sprinting speeds that exceeded spoetnik's launching. Like a soft drink having been shaken before being opened, Nicole could barely contain the fizz of excitement that threatened to bubble up from her. She clutched the magical sweet she had swiped from Erin's locker earlier close to her chest as she ran; as if all the world would dare to take her truimph away from her.

Still charging blindly, it was not until when she rounded the corner and a hand snatched her shirt collar, that she decelerated. Like a bike going on a wheelie, Nicole's feet run out from under her - her sudden stop motion by the scruff of her neck causing her legs to go up in the leverage. When the underside of her body finally reached terminal height from the momentum, they then came crashing down like a meteor; right on her bottom. Nicole grunted on impact.

"Hold on there, sport. Where are you going in such a furious hurry? The sun is shining. The birds are singing. Such a beautiful day and you don't even pay attention to it."

Zepp!! Tommy's pal. Standing up and rubbing her still-sore butt, Nicole glared at the slyly smiling lanky red-headed teenager. The bugger had had the nerve to pull her by the shirt and make her slip!

"You jerk! That hurt!" she moaned.

"So sorry! Really I am! I tried to call to you, but you seemed on such a mission. So terribly focused, you couldn't hear me." he said cheerfully, rubbing her hair into a mess as she glowered at him.
"Where were you going in such a blasted hurry anyway?"

"Nowhere. I'm going nowhere!" she quickly said, red in the face, still reeling from her inglorious decent back to earth.

"Oh, and I suppose you don't happen to have anything sinister in your hands either?" Zepp said with glinting eyes, reaching for Nicole's hands.

Petrified of discovery, Nicole jumped backwards and crossed her arms behind her and out of reach of Zepp's clutches.
Almost in panic: "Nothing! Nothing. I'm not doing anything! Keep away! I'm just off to maths now."

Zepp laughed: "Oh come on! You can do better than that. That was a terrifically terrible attempt at lying! I expect a much better effort from you of all people, Nicole!"

Nicole scowled. The irony was that she was now lying as badly as Erin had lied to her earlier this morning. Zepp the troublemaker was Nicole's match in life. The only other person beside her mother whom could best her.
A self-proclaimed mad-scientist and a serial pyromaniac, Zepp was Nicole's significant other in terms of scams and mischief; only he was a far greater deviant and delinquent. He could snuff out lies far better than she, and being older he had the advantage of experience when it came to spinning tales. Nicole would never be able to lie successfully to Zepp.

"Fine. Have it your way. I'll leave you to whatever scheme you're hatching." said Zepp, backing up with a smirk.

Nicole sighed, visibly relieved that Zepp was retreating: "Can I go?" she asked apprehensively.

"You should be in class."

"So should you!" Nicole retorted.

Zepp grinned: "Touche. But before you go-" Ah great. What now? thought Nicole.

"Do you know where the bug-girl is?" Zepp asked.

Nicole's logic hit a cul-de-sac: "Huh? What? Who?"

"Your sister: Natalie. You know the one whom threatens me daily with putting that horrible arachnid of hers down my neck. The one whom spends all her free time climbing trees and staring at insects and wood-lice when most of us normal human beings would instead play video games and eat ice-cream?" Nicole's face just continued to register confusion. "No? You know: black hair, freckles, Tommy's bloody girlfriend for crying out loud! Come on there's only three of you! It can't be that hard." he rambled in desperation.

At the sound 'girlfriend' Nicole burst out laughing, followed by a hiccup of giggles.
After having wished for the knowledge of how the candies-of-change worked and therefore subsequently the identity of her sister Natalie being in reality her older brother Nate, Nicole had her memories restored about him. She had only since that hilarious discovery thought in terms of her brother now being a girl and squirming about it, and had associated him with his old name.

When Zepp had mentioned Tommy's girlfriend, Nicole could not keep back the flood of mirth. Just too funny! Her brother having a boyfriend. She was going to rub that in his face like acid after school!

But more significantly she now understood whom Zepp meant when he had asked about Natalie, whom she'd momentarily forgotten was Nate in girl form, and had for a moment not had a clue about whom he was speaking.

"Thank you, thank you. Yes, I know I am a glorious comedian. But seriously: do you know where bug-girl is?"

"Oh, you meant Nate!" Nicole said before she could stop herself.

"Nate?" Zepp queried; a puzzled frown creasing his forehead. Nicole scolded herself for her slip.

"I meant Natalie, yes Natalie." she said, hoping Zepp didn't start connecting dots in her paranoia.

"OH I get it." Zepp jubilated; a grin tearing his face: "Nate is Natalie in male pronoun. Yes our bug-girl can be quite the tomboy."

Nicole snorted in her mind. Dude, if you only knew...

"I had wanted to ask Natalie to join us this afternoon. We're going to on a hike to the forest hill. She avaliable?"

"No." said Nicole hurriedly, hoping to put as much distance between herself and the ever clever Zepp before he dug into her: "He...She's going for a piercing with Ma to the mall."

"Pity." said Zepp. Then without warning he confiscated the sweet from her hand in such lightning swiftness and silent dexterity that Nicole didn't realize he had stolen it from her until he held the spherical candy in front of her. Nicole gasped and tried to pry it away from him in naked terror, but the difference in height meant that Zepp only had to hold it high to keep it out of reach of her desperate fingers.
"No! No! That's mine! Please give it back!"

A disappointed look crossed Zepp's face: "That's all? I thought you had something...well don't know...more interesting hidden away."
Nicole was howling with rage and tears by now, but Zepp just kept her smaller weaker frame at arm's length.

"Mmm...looks tasty. What would you do if I ate it?"
Nicole stopped moving, horror spread across her face.

That would be crap, was the first thought crossing her mind.

"What's going on out here?" demanded a young but commanding and stern voice.

"Oh dear. We're in trouble." said Zepp amused. Nicole whined in despair.

It was Zack - Zepp's older brother. And in this world 2 greater opposites did not exist. They were as dissimilar as night and day. While Zepp was a force of chaos - a troublemaker and the embodiment naughtiness, Zack was the paragon of order.

Zack was a hall-prefect. And while he wore the nerdiest glasses and the geekiest clothes, he did so in style. He was prim, proper, posh. His attire impeccably flawless. His tie was perfect. His shoelaces was perfect. Even his white collar and cuffs without mark. His spectacles gave him a distinguished air instead of making him look a nerd. He looked the part of a genuis groomed for success. And having the looks of a sitcom star and the body of gymnast didn't hurt much either to make him an imposing school leader and candidate for Head-boy next year.

Zepp in stark laughable contrast looked like a street urchin that had crawled out from the sewers. Scruffy unkempt clothing, chaotic flaming hair and a sly grin that made him look guilty by default.

"Oh hi there, brother. Didn't see you?" Zepp called.

"What are you doing out of class, you skunk? I hope you aren't dumping your disgusting habits on this poor girl here?" Zack declared, striding forward with force.

"You would think that of your own kin?"

"I don't remember being related to baffoons. Get yer arse back in class before I drag you back to it by the ear." came Zack's retort.

"There goes my fragile feelings." Zepp mock pouted: "Discarded by my own brother is such a dreadful way! Oh the humanity-!"

"Oh shut up. Get yourself scarce before I make your tail-end fragile with a spanking by my boots." Zack spat annoyed.

Zepp threw up his arms in false worship: "As you command, my lord!"

Zack kicked him to get him moving: "Stop polluting my air en be off with you, ye blasted oxygen-thief."

Nicole squeaked to Zepp: "Wait! Give it back!"

Zack didn't even ask Nicole what she meant; he was too salted by Zepp's antics: "Whatever you got, return it now, Zepp."

Zepp flung the candy over his shoulder: "Just a joke. A joke! Just messing with her!"
Nicole caught it with the same heart-pounding relief as someone would be catching a priceless antique china vase. She didn't waste time picking up speed and distancing herself from the 2 brothers with her treasure intact.

Turning back to Nicole, Zack said: "What's a minor doing in the senior block of the school...hey..where'd you go??"

The hallway was deserted. Zack tsked and moved on.

Kate looked at the squirrel, and said, "I swore that squirrel just talked."

Lynda led them into the juice bar Heather just escaped from, destroyed the bartender, who turned out to be an illusion, and re-barricaded the door. "It's a long story..."

Lynda cast a spell that erected a barrier around the interior of the bar. "Alright. As long as this barrier is up, you don't have to worry about getting transformed any further, but we can't stay here forever, because he will take notice, and will react. Now gather 'round." With everyone gathered around, she says, "First and foremost, Trevor and Nicole are under a glamour that essentially renders them blind and deaf to this world. As far as they know, we're at Disney World. I do not want them to see or hear this horrible place. Would you want your child to witness such carnality?" Everyone agreed. "Besides, since they are children, they are pure, and cannot be touched by this island's magic. Still, I want to get them, and everyone else, off as soon as possible. Eros is a truly perverse being."

"Eros... Wait, isn't he the embodiment of eroticism?" Kate said. Everyone gives her an odd look. "What? I take Latin. Eros is the root word from which we got the word erotic."

"Exactly," Lynda said, "and it was on this island I sealed him, 30,000 years ago."

"Yes, 30,000 years ago. I was abducted by aliens from my roaming nomad hunting tribe about 31,000 years ago and gifted with the knowledge of advanced technology and the powers mankind call 'magic.' They saw potential in the human race and wanted to see if I could lead my fellow humans. However, instead of inspiring, I scared my still under-evolved brethren, and that led me into isolation. During that time, I noticed I had stopped aging, and never got sick. I tried a few more times to bridge the gap with my fellow humans, but was repelled every time. Then, one day, an alien came. His, or rather, her name was Eros, for originally she was female, and claimed to the aliens that modified me that she could do what I couldn't, asking for a steep fee in return. At first, it looked like she was going to succeed, and had basically usurped the planet right out from under the humans' noses and the noses of its observers/protectors, but then I discovered she was simply mind controlling their primitive brains, using lust as a drug, and those that refused and preferred the old ways... well that's where her love of turning people into animals came from. Very soon though she began to become interested in satisfying her own perverse desires than keeping up the con. When that happened, I got a quick apology and was told to deal with her."

"Obviously, he... she... it, is still alive, so what happened?" Heather interjected.

"I was getting there. Well, as it turned out, Eros had been siphoning power in secret from the aliens without their knowledge, increasing her powers, and making new diabolical traps to transform her subjects, like the juices in this bar. I found her and challenged her a battle on this very island, but after three days straight of fighting, we knew neither of us were going to win in a straight-up brawl, plus we both had to really pee, so we called a time-out. During that time, as I was relieving myself, an idea hit me. It was a game of elixir Russian Roulette. Whomever drank the transformation potion lost."

Basically, act like an ass, become an ass... or whatever form of the month Eros is in the mood for."

"What are happening to his clothes?" Nate asks Kate who just shrugs her shoulders as she has no idea.

"I wish that some of this treasure was transported to the real world." he says as the candie dissolves.
134311111111111111.title: Treasure Room

1343111111111111111.content:
Just as Tommy finishes making his wish, he hears the door behind him opening which startles him a bit, causing him to jump slightly. "Who's there?" he asks.

He turns around to see someone dressed in chainmail nodding at him. "Ah there you are Tomda, please come, you are wanted in the main hall." the knight says.

Tomda just looks at him with a hint of confusion in his face, wondering what this man just called him when he shakes it off as he knows that the man called him by his name. "Oh uh...I'll be there in a minute." he replies as his voice cracks, getting a bit higher.

The knight nods his head and leaves the room to take back that message. "This is getting really weird, I need to play along, at least for now." he decides as he leaves the room and hurries to catch up to the knight.

As he walks down the hallway, his shoes start to change as the material becomes sturdier and compress tighter on his feet which had shrunk in size. The color also starts shifting to that same light pink that his pants are turning into.

Meanwhile, Nate's about ready to freak out as he's starting to figure out what's happing to Tommy. "He's gotta be turning into some sort of woman." he deduces when suddenly something appears on the bed.
1343111111111111111.title: Someone Enters the Room

choices: Tommy meets the king of lions.
Nate and Kate try to find a solution.
13431111111111111111.content:
Nate hears something drop next to him on the couch. He begins to take a closer look to find a gold rupee between him and Kate. "Whats the deal Nate?" He then realizes whats coming up next. "Kate watch your head!" "Wha?-" A bit late too react, dozens of gold rupees fall out of thin air on top of the two teens. Surfacing from the pile of rupees, they both take in a bit of air. "You alright Kate?" Dusting the rupees of her head she replies, " Besides the fact a bunch of gold tatteted my head, yeah Im good." Unfortunately fot Nate he did receive a bit of a headache from the turn of events. "Why in the world did we just get attacked by treasure?" "Well its actually a wish Tommy made earlier." "Well what did he wish for?" "Since these are rupees, you should be able to make a guess." Observing the gold, she took in the fact that tjey wete obviously rupees, and since Tommy was in a treasure room full of them it became evident. "Wow. I feel really dumb about this." "Thats okay. I mean how many times do you have rupees drop on you from out of nowhere?" "Yeah true that. But what are we supposed to do if your friend is trully stuck in that world?" "Well to tell you the truth there is not much we can do. We just have to hope that he comes to his senses before he uses all of the remaining candies."

Unfortunately as they looked on the situation was only getting worse. As Tommy walked the halls, his hair turned to a brunette color and became more long and thicker as well. But still he was oblivious to his changes.
13431111111111111111.title: Treasure

134311111111111111111.content:
As Tommy walked through the halls of Hyrule castle, he was suddenly stopped by a guard. "Excuse me young sir. But his royal highness would like a word with you." Tommy became just a bit confused. Mainly because the king never appeared on Twighlight princess he was sure of that. But just to fit in he replied, "Yes sir. I will see him right away." But just before he left he just remembered he had no idea of even where the king was in the first place. "Um where exactly is he? Sorry I can't really remember." "Ha ha don't worry over it child. I too sometines get lost in this palace. Except the last time that happened they cut my rupee payment. But anycase the royal highness is in his chambers to the left from here. Just simply follow the stairs." "Alright thanks mister." The guard waved his hans fairwell as Tomny ran for the throneroom. But as he was running his transformation was nearly complete. Needless to say Nate was starting to get nervous on the situation.

"Um Nate?" "Yeah?" "Are you sure your parents aren't gonna ask questions when they find gold rupees in your hallway closet?" "Oh itll be alright. They are gonna be gone for over a month so it's ok." "But what about your friend Tommy?" Just as she said his name, Nate turned his head torwards the TV to see the progress of the wish. "Oh my god." While he and Kate were cleaning out the rupees, his friend had gained new appendages on his chest. And from the way it was looking it would not be long before 'he would be 'she'.
134311111111111111111.title: Tommy meets the king of lions.

choices: A wish from the candies is made
1343111111111111111111.content:
After finally making it up the stairs, Tommy came to a velvet red door with engravings of the triforce. Pushing them open he witnessed probably one of the most gigantic rooms he has ever been in. It was basically the same room he degeated the final boss ( Ganondorf ) in. But instead of the evil atmosphere from the game, it was almost a wave of honor being placed upon him as if he was graduating school with his family watching. There were crowds of people in a line against the wall with many gaurds in front of them as if they were security to an event like WrestleMania. But in the midst of all that, he saw what was looking in front of him with a smile on his jolly face. Sitting on the throne in front was a man in red robebes with a built but aged phisique. The king of Hyrule, The King Of Lions. As he rised from his throne, he held his arms out for embrace. And for some unexplaneable reason he responded to it with happieness swelling from his soul. He picked up the pace in his walk as he rushed into the king's embrace. But through his feelings he didn't realize that his transformation was finally complete. "Welcome home my dear." Tears began to fall from his eyes as he laid eyes on him. He somehow felt safe and comftorable near him that he didn't realize the words he uttered to the king. "I missed you too father."

Nate and Kate could only stare with an agaped mouth. "He said WHAT?!" Then Nate realized something had to happen. But at the rate it was going it almost seemed hopeless. "Well look on the brightside. He does still have the candies so he can still wish himself back." Nate took in rhe words of comfort as much as he could. He needed it. His eyes started to quiver as they filled with tears. He was trying to hold them back as long as he could, but the dam was starting to shake loose from the rapids in his eyes. "I know your trying to be positive but.. I don't want to lose him! Hes my best friend and I got him into this!" Nate couldn't take it anymore as the dam finally caved in. He bent his head over in shame as streams of tears swept across his tensed face. He kept visioning how shameful he looked in front of his girlfriend. Would she see him as a pitiful sight to her eyes? No. She knew that this was something very hard for him to go through. Not every person has thier best friend stuck in a fictional world while turning into anther entirely different person. She took grasp of Nates chin as she looked deep into his depressioned soul. And in one quick sigh, pushed her lips agaibst his in a passionate kiss. Nates eyes went from straigned to open and wide in shock. Kate's face flushed into a cherry red as she gave a comforting smile of reassurance. "I know that this is very hard on you.. but no matter what happens I want you to kniw that there will always be a shoulder for you let your eyes flood to. Crying dosn't make you weak, it just proves you have the humility to have such feelings for someone." Nate couldn't express words on how much of a girl he had that teully cared about him through thick and thin. He dried up his eyes that still bared tears that weren't from his saddened state, but from his touched heart. "Than... thanks Kate."
1343111111111111111111.title: the throneroom

choices: "What do you want to do, Nate?"
1343112.content:
"I wish for the rules on what we can and can't do with these candies." Nate exclaims.

"Why'd you do that?" Tommy asks.

Nate answers him, "Wouldn't you want to know the limitations or conditions on these things before you waste them, or worse, make a vague wish and get some vague monkey's paw ripoff wish?"

"Good point." After Tommy said that a vortex opens up, and swaths of paper comes spewing out, rapidly filling the room. "How much legalese do these things have!!" Tommy screams as he tries to stay afloat amongst the paper. Nate quickly comes up with a new plan. He says with the same candy in his mouth, "How about I wish for the abridged version?" Suddenly, all the paper condenses in on itself, and becomes a CD, labeled, "Candies of Change Rulebook: The Abridged Series." Below that, it says, "As narrated by LittleKuriboh."

"Guess we should play it..." Tommy mentions, staring at the disk. They put the disk in the stereo and begin listening. Right away, the iconic voice of famed abridger LittleKuriboh came on, saying, "What am I doing here? Who are you people?"

In the background Marik says, "Just read the &^*$(# script go we can go home, lest you want to watch the super secret commentary tracks on the 4Kids dub of One Piece again that you can only access by hitting up, up, down, down, left, right, left, right, menu, then select where they discuss their original plan to have every character voiced by Dan Green and Rachel Lillis, for they said it works so well for FunImation. Seriously!! Half their characters are voiced by Christopher Sabat. What the hell are they going to do when he retires or gets mauled by a bear, or something?"

"Mauled by a bear?" LK asks.

"Or something... Uh... Er... Shut the &%^# up... NO!! Don't shut the &$^% up, read your lines, and compliment my motorcycle so we can all go home!!" Marik barks at the funnyman.

"Okay, okay..." LK says, ruffling papers over the mic. He reads from the script the rules, boiled down to their basic language. "Congratulations on acquiring the Candies of Change, a powerful non-San Francisco-based treat that can grant many of your wishes, or end the world, depending on how much of a dick you are. While powerful, they are not all-powerful. For that, you'll need to snort crystal math, and only quantum physicists know how to cook up pure math. Wait, 'crystal math' what the hell... Bah, I'm not worrying about it. I just want to get out of here and get lush off my ass so I can forget all about the idiot who abducted me in the first place and kept trying to do god awful 'attention duelists' jokes every five seconds. Anyway, here are the rules..." Nate takes out a notebook and pencil, jotting down what is said.

"First, no one may lose their life as a direct result of the candies' power, so this means you can't wish people or places dead, but we aren't held liable if say you wish for a giant robot, hit a building, and a piece of rubble falls and swishes a puppy. That's an indirect consequence. As an addendum, if you make a wish that turns a male into a female then they become pregnant, or are wished pregnant, the baby can neither be unwished, nor can the former male be turned back into a male at that time. The child must be carried to term and delivered before any female to male wishes would be allowed."

After a moment, LK goes on, "Second, wishes need not be vocalized. Even thinking in the way of 'I wish' while one is in your mouth is enough activate the candies' power."

Nate scribbles this down, saying, "Nice to know."

"Third, be specific. If you leave too much to chance, the candies will generate a random response, and they have a penchant to lean toward doing things for the lolz, but sometimes for the evulz. For instance, if you simply say, 'I wish for a car,' you could get Lamborghini, or you could get a rusted over '82 Toyota Tercel with a broken muffler, and it's on fire... and there's a dead hooker in the trunk."

Nate and Tommy gulp.

"Lastly, whatever you wish, remember, you can't unwish it for another 37 hours."

Marik chimed in from the background, "Wait? 37 hours? Who made these things? The same people who made the 'Range Game' for the 'Price is Right?' Next thing you'll be telling to spay and neuter my pets..."

LK adds, "Well, actually, that's the last bit here on the script..."

Marik yells, "You have to be shitting me..." The disk devolves into muttering amongst themselves over the script and Bob Barker, then it ends.

Nate finished writing his notes and says, "Well, that was weird but informative."

Tommy smiles and quips, "You did ask for the abridged version."

Nate holds up a candy to the light and asks, "Well, what should we do then?"
1343112.title: "Candies of Change: The Rulebook" for Dummies...

choices: Meddling in the kitchen with Mike & Lynda...
Kate, while sneaking into your room, saw EVERYTHING...
13431121.content:
Tommy quickly snaps up a candy and pops one in his mouth. Nate knows the intent in Tommy's eyes, and knows he's planning some kind of prank on him with that glare, and Nate quickly gulps one into his cheek. "Draw." Tommy declares. There's a flash, and both Nate and Tommy double over, bodies shifting, frames lightening. Nate's hair started turning a strong teal green, while Tommy's red hair began turning a sandy blonde, both lengthening.

***Flashback***


Both boys declared their wishes at the same time in their minds just after Tommy said draw.
"I wish Nate looked and sounded like Hatsune Miku, but also a catgirl!! Two things at once!! He'll never come up with something like that on the fly in under three seconds!!" Tommy thought.
"I wish Tommy looked and sounded like Rei Miyamoto from High School of the Dead, but also a centaur!! Hah!! Beat that!!" Nate thought.

***Flashback End***


Hips were widening, waists were narrowing, faces were becoming more delicate. Tommy groped his soon to be massive melons. Nate smirked, seeing his reflection, his face and hair having fully changed into that of the virtual idol. "Knew you'd do something with Vocaloid, but I got a surprise for you..." Nate stood tall as his clothes began to take the form of Miku's iconic grey sleeveless top, necktie, detached sleeves, pleated skirt, and boots.

Tommy had sat down to combat the initial pains of the change, but now was physically the spitting image of Rei Miyamoto, and his pants had already changed into Rei's ever-so-short Fujimi High uniform skirt. Suddenly, he can no longer stand sitting anymore, his... her spine on fire. "What did you do?" Tommy yelled as nubs shot out of her hips just above her groin, shredding her boxers. Before she can fall to the ground, these nubs had already grown into fully formed limbs, resembling human legs, but as the distance between the four legs grew, course brown hairs grew over her legs and "second torso," her feet being forced onto the balls as they extend, toes fusing into hooves, legs becoming fully equine as the new legs and old legs finally finished stretching apart. A fine sandy blonde horse tail began flicking behind Tommy as his t-shirt changed to match the uniform skirt, completing the Fujimi High uniform.

"Centaur, eh... Not bad..." Tommy smirks, not surprised when her voice comes out matching the character she now resembles. "Now for your twist..."

Nate moaned, "Wha..." his voice in the process of becoming Miku's, looking around as the last of... her body hair fell away and A-cup breast grew on her chest. That was when everything went silent, but only for a moment. Nate saw why, and found her ears gone, but just as quickly as they vanished, two new black furred cat ears shot out the top of her head. A loud ringing ripped through Nate's head, the sensation of sound being returned to her world, and with enhanced clarity to boot, was actually giving Nate a mild headache. Her new ears twitched as she heard Erin talking upstairs on the phone, her mom calling the Smith's over to join them for dinner in the kitchen while Mike is cooking lasagna, and Nicole & Trevor playing football with their friends... next door. Finally, a black tail pierced her panties, then pierced through her skirt just below the skirt's waistband. It grew out a full 4' in length, and on the end a green ribbon manifested itself into a bow. Nate flicked her tail, mildly fascinated by the taffeta on the end, before turning back to Tommy. He realized the hidden context behind the catgirl part of the wish. "Before you ask, I'm not doing that 'nyan cat' song." Nate told her, speaking in the ultra-soprano register of Miku. Tommy gave Nate her best puppy dog eyes. Tommy knew Nate couldn't stand the 'nyan cat' song, or the meme in general, but was was trying to use her moe eyes to guilt her into a song. Nate's aggravation subsided, somewhat. "Maybe 'Melody Line...' later." Tommy squealed in delight, jumping up and down and skipping on her four hooves.

"Now..." Tommy uttered, "let's go prank some more people!!"
13431121.title: I declare prank war...

choices: "...of all things you can do, and you choose a 'prank war?'"
134311212.content:
Suddenly, Nate's window opened up. "Oh crap, it's Kate!!" she screams.

Kate has a shocked look, saying, "Alright, explain what I just saw."

Nate says, "Haven't you ever seen a neko Miku and a centaur girl before?" trying to pass this off as normal.

"Nate, I just watched you and Tommy transform, and heard you too. Heard everything." They gulp. "What I want to know is..."
134311212.title: Kate saw EVERYTHING...

choices: "I got a good prank!!" Nate exclaims...
1343112121.content:
"What I want to know is..." Kate said, reaching into the tiny satchel and pulling out a hand overflowing in candies, "...why didn't you invite me? I LOVE pranking people!! You know that, Nate!!"

Nate thought back, remembering all the time Kate and her got his sister good. "You're right!! You always come up with the most hilarious jokes."

Kate downs a candy, "Like this down!!"

Tommy gulps, "What is she..."

"I'm not messing with you guys. No... This prank is directed at way girls are depicted. I'm tired of vapid airheads flaunting themselves while promoting unhealthy habits, but I think it'd be funny if shy good smart girls became the eye candy de jour!!" Nate and Tommy cock their heads in confusion and blink. "Just watch..." She swishes the candy around and says, "I wish this wish affected everyone outside of this room, that all the popular and arrogant girls, the vapid ones that build their lives on their looks, became plain and homely, and the shy, nerdy, geeky, good, innocent girls became the icons of beauty. In short, slutty bimbos will now be flat-chested average-looking girls that dress conservatively and are expected to dress that way, and pure, virgin, sweet girls that work hard and value their intellect have cartoonish F-cup and larger breasts, tiny waists that never expand no matter what they eat (unless they get pregnant of course), wide hips, dressing like total sluts in nothing but tiny tops and miniskirts, and not only is it alright for them to do so, they are encouraged to do so, even by their parents. However, the girls themselves will still remember the old world as it was, so a shy girl that would never dress like a total bimbo would be totally embarassed by her clothes, while a whorish girl will long for something more revealing. However, if they try to put something on that goes against their personality (a good girl tries to work conservative clothes, or a slut tries to wear slutty clothes), the clothes will turn into the proper clothes. Also, the smarter, nicer, and more pure & innocent a girl is, the more like a cartoonish bimbo she will look, with tanner skin, bigger butt and boobs, and tinier tops and skirts, and the naughtier, meaner, dumber, and sluttier a girl is, the uglier, more flat-chested, and conservatively clothed she gets (and cannot wear skirts), and vice versa."

"I don't get it." Tommy said.

"Basically," Kate said, swallowing the remnants of the candy, "...now if the girl has a horse-face and walks around in a frumpy sweater that looks like your aunt made you and mom jeans, she's a slutty bimbo. If a girl walks by and she makes men's junk melt off, she's so polite, well-mannered, nice, and smart that she might just be the reincarnation of Buddha or the second coming of Jesus. However, the former hot girls will be in a living hell of ugliness and bad clothes, and the good clothes will die of embarrassment from wearing such skimpy clothes, despite their parents buying them for them."

"I get it." Nate said

"Still don't get it." Tommy said.

"You were never the brightest bulb..." Kate growled, and using another candy, wished for an orb to view other people. "Now watch..." She motions Tommy in closer. "Show me Janet Day." In the orb was Janet, dressed slovenly in a long sleeve polka-dot shirt, her notorious bust now B-cups, and wearing a pair of plain slacks. Her visage, while not gross, wasn't turning heads. She looked, roughly average. "Because Janet is such an arrogant pretty girl type, she now looks like a plain Jane." Kate waves her hand. "Now show me Chrissy Gardner."

Tommy says, "She's the biggest slut in school..."

Kate, "Yeah... Look now." She shows him the girl, wrangling jocks into the bathroom for her variety of fun. However, instead of the hot sexpot Tommy recognized from his homeroom, there was an acne-laden, flat-chested, almost horse-faced girl with long, unkempt blonde hair, bad teeth and when she took off her hideous turtleneck and underlying frilled blouse, she had a hairy chest and bacne."

"Unzip honey, and I'll like, screw your brain out, and stuff..." she tells the jock.

"Man, you're ugly, but god, I'm horny..." he says, as he goes to unzip.

"Gross, gross, gross!!" Tommy yells, nearly shoving the orb out of Kate's hands.

Kate then says, "Alright, now for the final example, here's Alice Walker."

"Isn't she the president of the A/V club, the science club, chess club, and VP of the anime club? She's got to be the biggest dork in school." Tommy said.

"But she's also one of the nicest girls in schools." Nate reprimanded Tommy. "Remember she raised all that money for those people that lost their homes in that tornado last year, and she never complains about being bullied by the popular girls?"

"Shhh!!" Kate quieted them.

On the orb, there was a girl in a bookstore with a stack of physics books and manga, reading away. She had short raven hair done in a bob that lined up even with her chin and wearing big thick coke glasses. However, her face was the epitome of beauty (by older standards), but more shocking was her body and wardrobe. She was well tanned, sporting mountainous H-cups in only a tiny red bikini top, a white leather micro miniskirt that barely covered her rear, pink belt, and red knee-high boots with five inch heels. Over her butt crack (which a tiny portion of which was exposed) was a tramp stamp, however unlike the old world order before Kate's wish, "tramp stamps" were now intelligent or had a positive message to them. Hers was of the Boltzmann constant, k = R / NA. "I wish my mom would stop buying me such short skirts... It's so embarrassing!!" Alice mutters to herself as she scratches her butt, blushing with embarrassment. Suddenly a group of popular girls, now ugly as can be, come up and start shoving her around and calling Alice names.

"Dork!!"

"Nerd!!"

"Virgin!!"

"What is this?" One of them looks at the physics book she was reading. "Science is like, stupid!!"

"You'll never be popular like us!!" As the one who said that spoke, her teeth got more crooked, her clothes more dingy, and and she lost a few millimeters from her bust. A different girl shoves Alice down, and when she does, that popular girl's face breaks in even more acne, and she gets a hunchback. "The new 'People' isn't in... Let's go to the mall, girls..."

As they leave, Alice is laying there, about to sob a bit, when a girl in short shorts and a halter top with D-cup breasts working at the coffee shop in the bookstore came over and said, "Don't worry about those girls. Means girls are a dime a dozen. Now how about I help you up?" Alice takes the barrista's hand and gets up. After helping Alice up, her breasts expand to DD-cups, and her short shorts turn into a pleated miniskirt.

"Now do you get it?" Kate says to Tommy?

"Girls go bad, girls get gross, while nice girls get hotter the nicer they are."

"Exactly."

"That could be fun to watch," Nate said, adding, "plus it'd make adultery impossible, because you'd get uglier with every misdeed!!"

"That was a good prank!!" Tommy said.

"Who's next?" Kate says.
1343112121.title: "...why didn't you invite me?"

choices: "...keep my friends close..." (Ask friends to become Vocaloids)
"...keep my enemies closer..." (Make Tammy's bullies and haters into Vocaloids)
13431121212.content:
Tommy says, "I got a good one..."

"I doubt that..." Kate scoffs.

"Just watch." Tommy laughs as she downs a candy. Without saying a word, Nate and Kate saw everything other than themselves freeze, as they are whisked to a secluded spot in what appears to be an abandoned building, with a clock tower visible. The trio then saw the hands of time accelerate around them, the clock hands spiraling ahead faster and faster, until 37 hours had passed, at which time they fall into a wormhole. While in it, a white haired asian man comes walking by.

"Aren't you kids a little young to be accredited quantum physicists?"

All three of them chime out, "Famous quantum physicist Michio Kaku!!"

"Exactly." he nodded. "Say, how are you kids manipulating the time stream?"

"Magic candies." Tommy said.

"Ah, interesting."

"Wait, what is going on?" Kate demands to know.

"We fell through a wormhole I had set up to pull us back to the point we initially started from, and therefore, are going backwards in time. Michi Kaku..." Tommy seems genuinely lost.

"Don't you know? All quantum physicists can freely travel across eleven dimensional hyperspace and manipulate string fields. I myself am on my way to a birthday party for Edwin Schrodinger and Elvis Presley on a planet mankind won't discover for centuries..." Dr. Kaku then leans in and whispers, "but don't tell Alan Roth. No one invited him." Speaking up again, he says in a booming voice, "Well, just don't go blowing up the Earth. Lisa Randall hates it every time we got to put it back together. PEACE!!" He vanishes in a maelstrom of lightning into the time stream.

"Well, um... there you go then..." Tommy goes, scratching her head.

The wormhole spits them out milliseconds after they vanished from their room, time moving normally. Suddenly, Lynda and Mike come in the room and say, "I see the day finally came..."

Nate said, "Um, what's going on?" She was put off a bit my his mom's hot body and slutty clothes, but knew thanks to Kate's wish that meant her mom was a fine upstanding, smart person. "Wow, Kate's wish is weirder in person, especially when it's my mom." Nate thought to herself.

Her parents sat on her bed and said, "We have something to tell you sweetie."

Lynda said, "Back when you were two, we were in a horrible car accident, and you got in the paper because you miraculously escaped without a scratch when we had several broken bones."

Mike said, "Truth was, you nearly died, your body far beyond the capacities of human medicine to repair... and we didn't get hit by a boulder in a landslide... it was an alien spaceship that crashed into us."

"Aliens!! Mom... Dad...?" Nate said, tail raised on high.

"The aliens had a little girl. Her body mostly survived, but she was brain dead from a head injury..." Mike said.

"So they made us a deal. They would combine your two bodies to keep you from dying, but on your fifteenth birthday, you would lose your human shape forever, taking the form of the girl in her teenage years." Lynda went on.

"Don't worry..." Mike blurted out, taking Nate's hand. "Genetically, you still have half your genes, so you're still our child, but now you're... just a girl... a girl with a really high voice, green hair, and has cat ears and a tail..."

"You better get to the point, because now I'm really confused!!" Nate exclaimed, secretly staring daggers into Tommy.

"The parents of that girl, the one that make up the other half of your genome now, are of a highly musical race of aliens that call themselves 'Vocaloids.' They detected our satellites back in the '80's and came here, and almost left, uninterested, if not for anime. They said they loved our take on the genre, and was studying it more when space junk hit their cloaked ship in a 3mm wide defect in the ship's plating. The science scout ship then crashed, in all places, right next to our car, the shrapnel smacking us into a tree." Mike stated bluntly.

"After they completed the fusion process, they said they were in fact the great leaders of their race, their names Leon and Lola, and said this incident has changed their plans on first contact with mankind. Since their daughter's brain died and yours lived, they felt it wrong to take you from us, but said there would be the day you would have become the ambassador of the Vocaloid race." Lynda tried to explain. "They tried to help ease the process, and make you famous before your time by creating the Crypton Future Media company, as well as the Zero-G company, and sold the Vocaloid vocal synthesizer programs, as well as the other various software, figurines, and manga to make you an international star in preparation for this day."

"But just two problems..." Nate quips, tugging on her ears and tail.

"The Vocaloids were more worried about getting their name out first, and not small details like that." Lynda stated. "A human avatar would be more universally accepted, as trying to market you in all your catgirl-ly glory could have put you off as a gimmick to attract otaku."

"So, they declined to hide important physical features of mine as a marketing move..." Nate lips out with sarcastic wit.

"That's... the gist..." Mike sighs.

Nate sighs as well. "Well, if I'm supposed to be this 'ambassador,' how and when am I supposed to bring about first contact with alien life?"

"Of all things, it'll be a concert... a free concert, in the park, tomorrow." Lynda exclaims.

"But I don't know any of those Vocaloid songs!!" Nate exclaims.

"But you are the real life Hatsune Miku, and your fans will expect them from you..." Erin cackles from the stairs, having been listening in.

Lynda goes, "Erin, upstairs!! Now, um... daughter... I guess I should find a more feminine name than 'Nate' to call you now, but I'm not ready to call you Miku yet, like Leon & Lola want me to... anyways, from what you've told me, Tammy here is a huge Vocaloid fan, and has pretty much every one of the songs written with the software on her computer. Go with her tonight and rehearse."

"But... It's a school..."

"No buts!!" Lynda said. "This the future of mankind, missy!! I order you to have a sleepover with your friend Tammy!!"

"Okay..." Nate said dejectedly.

Later that night, after discovering her whole wardrobe had been replaced with clothes Hatsune Miku has worn in MMD videos, as well as extra copies of her famous sleeveless shirt/tie/detached sleeves/miniskirt/boots ensemble, Nate went to Tommy's, now apparently Tammy's house.

"Really!! You made me half alien and the messenger of an alien race based on your favorite music?!"

"An alien race based on my favorite music that also happens to be kemonomimi too!!" Tammy laughed.

"My god, your prank is elaborate... But what was that whole time jump then wormhole then about?" Nate said.

"Remember the rules said you can't unwish a wish for 37 hours... Well, I sped time up for 37 hours, placing us in a remote location just in there was some temporal weirdness we don't know of yet, then sent us into a wormhole that through us out just after we were moved, so we wouldn't be missed. This way, we will have waited 37 hours, without actually waiting 37 hours."

"That's... clever." Nate quips.

"I also used the second rule, and just thought my wish, since it was too verbose to say without possibly screwing it up. I needed the 37 hours so I could affect others without having to worry about Kate's wish completely getting in my way. Now, unless I say otherwise, any girl I change, or anyone I change into a girl, will be exempted from Kate weird reverse bimbo wish."

"All nice and good, but what are you planning?" Nate asks.

"Well, a Vocaloid concert isn't just Hatsune Miku performing alone. There's other Vocaloids too!!"

"Oh... right!!" Nate smiled, glad someone would have to share her burden.

"We're going to need a Kagemine Rin, Kagemine Len, a Meiko, a Kaito, a Megurine Luka, a Gumi, a SeeU, and a Hagane Miku. I think I have an idea where to start. I think I will..."
13431121212.title: "Pick me!! Pick me!!" Tommy shouts...

134311212122.content:
"You plan to turn people that hate you into things you like..." Nate quips. "That's brilliant."

"Yeah, it is!!" Tammy says, brushing off Nat'es sarcasm. "I get rid of my enemies, and you get backup singers/new friends."

"Well, even though I know the people that mess with you are total jerks and bitches, I still don't like this plan." Nate states.

"If you help me, I'll magically upload all of Miku's songs into your brain..."

Knowing Tammy still had the candies, and it was still her turn, she sighed and relented.

Down the street, Janet Day was in her bedroom, making out with her jock boyfriend Adam Waffler, 17, 6' 6", brown hair, a total d-bag. Her parents was out on the town, as they usually are. "Well, here goes..." Tammy says, downing a candy.

Upstairs, Janet and Adam are tonguing away, when Adam pushes her away. "You perv... Making out with your sister... Wait, wha..." He looks confused as Janet's hair began to shorten, her red pleated skirt separating into a pair of black shorts. Adam's jeans also change, shrinking down into black short shorts as his legs become lithe and girly. Both their shirts suddenly change into white sleeveless shirts with yellow striped black sailor fuku collars. Adam found a gold kerchief tied tied below the collar, while Janet saw a necktie of matching color hanging from the collar. Janet watched as Adam's eyes got huge, even for anime standards, the irises turning from brown to an azure blue. His hair began to bleach out, lengthening a little as two berets secured his bangs in front.

As he shrank a little, Janet grew. Adam yelled out, in a higher, feminine voice, "J... J... Ja... Your name, it's on my tongue... What is it?!" Small breasts adorned Adam's new girly torso, as Janet's deflated, but her overall build stayed wiry.

"Sister, did you hurt yourself? My name is Len!!" Janet answers Adam, her mind fully lost to the changes, now believing she was Kagamine Len, and was almost completely him physically as well.

"I knew that, brother!! I was just testing you!!" Adam joked, his mind now that of Vocaloid singer Kagamine Rin. Finally, the last changes happened, as Janet's vagina became a penis complete with balls, and Adam's male equipment sucked into him, making female equipment. They now were the spitting images of Kagamine Rin & Len  , however, they weren't done yet.

As their headbands come into place, Rin's ears suddenly shift, becoming long white rabbit ears. From the seat of her shorts a fuzzy, pointy rabbit's tail pops out, as the shorts mend around it. Len grows matching ears, but instead of a tail, gains thick fur on his chest, forearms, and lower legs that resembles rabbit fur, and grows rabbit whiskers on his face. Janet, now Len, says, "Hey sis, just where the heck are we?"

"I don't know..." she answers back. Suddenly, they hear a stone hit the window. Looking out, they see a familiar face. "Hey, it's Miku!!" Rin calls out from the window. The twins come running out the house. Rin jumps on Nate's neck with great ferocity, greeting her like she's known her for a while now.

"Well, we have the twins, Tammy?" Nate said, prying, Rin off of her. "Who do you plan to recruit next?"
134311212122.title: "...keep my enemies closer..." (Make Ta...
