134312.title: A female Transformation

13431221.content:
"I wish that you were a French maid that worked at my house, and that you were over here right now."

Nate then hung up the phone. He started talking to himself. "Now to wait for the magic to happen."

"What was zat?"

Nate turned around to see a pretty, 20-year old girl in a maid's outfit. She had short, sandy blonde hair, and blue eyes. You knew this was Tommy, but the maid didn't look like she knew she was Tommy.

"Tommy?"

The maid looked confused. "Are you referring to me, zir?"

Nate then shook his head. "Nothing, you can go back to work."

After a "wi", she left. Nate the pondered what to do with his left over candy.
13431221.title: choice 1

135.content: What do you do instead?
135.title: do something else

1353.content:
As Nate walked to the backyard door he was so entranced by what he just witnessed and the possibilities that the magic sweets held, that he almost bumped into the family fish tank.
His mother, Lynda, was facinated by goldfish, and kept a large aquatic zoo of the critters within a fish tank in the hallway.
Nate eyed the goldfish as they swan idly and serenely in circles, oblivious to Nate, who was staring at them intently as well as the smile that started to creep accross his face.

Nate wasn't a jock, and in fact was fairly skinny, but he was a swimming fanatic. His friends and family often joked that he was born underwater. Even his oriantation nickname was Tadpole. He represented both the school diving and swimming club, and his favorite passtimes included his continual daring attempts at breaking international records such as holding ones breath underwater the longest and diving the most laps without resurfacing for air.

Nate was still giddy with the prospect of being able to make wishes at will, but was still suspicious and reluctant to get his hopes up high. If life had taught him anything, it was if something was too good to be true, then it probably wasn't.
However, he did feel a peculiar excitement at the thought of at least testing whether the candies he held were real or not. He had nothing to lose, right?

He ran outside with his treasure to the backyard swimming pool, a magnificently large body of water; it covered a 3rd of the entire backyard. The first things he would wish for was an improved breath, with that he would break any and all international records involving diving.
But before he went any further he had a long look at the candy container. It was a simple tin cylinder, with no markings or paper or any inscriptions, or what Nate looked for: instructions.

Nate was a bit puzzled as how the candies worked. Did he merely have to eat them and make his wish? Or what? Opening the lid he counted the sweets; there appeared to be roughly a hundred.
With excitement overruling caution, Nate took one sweet and sucked it.

Finally being at the wishing stage, Nate didn't know precisely what to say or how to word his wish, and nervously he simply said:
"I wish I could breath underwater."
1353.title: Baptism by water.

13532.content:
Nate knew instantly that something was wrong. The skin on the sides of his neck and ribs felt as if they being torn open from the inside.
The pain continued until he could feel air flowing through them. What the...?

Nate tore off his shirt and saw rifled red strokes of open skin covering the sides of his torso between each of his ribs. Touching them, he realised they were gills! The same on the sides of his neck, where there were 3 pairs.

Nate was mesmerized.His wish had actually been granted! With gills, he could breath underwater indefinitely. He was ecstatic and terrified at the same time.
But he was also confused. How was he breathing right now? Touching his chest he could feel his diaphragm still expanding as his lungs were inflated and deflated with oxygen where he breathed through his mouth, but with a slight aircurrent between his fingers as he held his rib-gills.

Nate didn't have time to ponder this as he suddenly felt his entire body shudder when an explosion of pain from head to toes hit him. And with the pain came further transformations. Nate started writhing on the grass like dog trying to scratch an unbearable itch. It looked like someone was experiencing an epilepsy.
The pain wasn't excruciating or like a torture. Instead it was like rubbing off a particularly irritating scab.

Nate could see the skin between his fingers grow and stretch until he had webbed appendages similar to those of frogs. The same for his feet, only his toes started splitting halfway from the ankle before they grew webs between them.

Next Nate felt as if his nose were being rammed back into his face with a baboon-spanner until he had flat snout with 2 splits for nasal openings in them. With it however Nate could suddenly experience scents and smells as he had never before. His sense of smell was now so acute that he could actually see (or so he swore) the aromas being eminated from the flowers in the garden.

Following up, Nate could feel his very spine being pulled out of his back. As if some surgeon on crack and with a twitch were trying to extract his marrow. Feeling his back for the cause ,Nate felt a dorsal fin starting to jut out. It was growing from his spinal column between his shoulder blades.

After that, Nate next felt like crying as rump was overcome with agony. Just above his butt, from his sternum started growing a long slender, cylindrical tail half as long as he was tall. From the tip of the tail sprouted beautiful vertical fins.

Next in line, all Nate's body hair on his skin was sucked back in as if by a vacuum cleaner. His skin turned a grey-blue tint, then became scaly and pointed. A marine camouflage.
The hair on Nate's head lengthened and became sleek and silky, and held a green-blue colour like seaweed. They then fused into pencil sized braids hanging from his head like a Jamaican-hairstyle. Or perhaps like medusa's head-snakes, only with the back of the snake's tails.

Finally his face. His ears retracted.
And his eyelids fell off. Repeat: fell off. This made Nate go ballistic, as he was unaware that his eyes had turned into the ever unblinking cat-eyes that was associated with fish.
Lastly his jaws pushed outward as his lips shrank and became flat. His teeth grew into twin sets of razors, fitting perfectly like 2 bear traps within one another.

At long last the agony started to subside in a throbbing afterglow, Nate felt like he just ran a marathon. Whist on fire. He crawled to the pool to see his reflection. What greeted Nate was both amazing and horrifying.

The blue-skinned thing with unblinking yellow eyes staring back was humanoid in shape and right there the similarities with humans ended. It was amphibian in nature and sharklike in appearance.
Webbed hands and feet, gills on the sides of its ribs and neck, a powerfull slender tail and a shark-shaped dorsal fin made it obvious the thing was adept at swimming.

It only had openings where ears should have been and a flat snout with 2 diagonal slits for nasal openings. Green-blue tendrils, thick as pencils, hanged from its head and acted as hair. Like a sea-anemones tentacles they wormed around with a life of their own.
Most striking of all was the twin sets of razor teeth protruding from the thin inward lips, indicating for all the world to see that the creature was without a doubt carnivorous.

Nate had turned into an ancient human-hybrid adapted for life at and within the ocean. He was now an Atlantean. A citizen of the doomed and sunk city of Atlantis. They were well-known for their ability to breath above and below water.

Of course Nate didn't know this; all he saw was this fascinating and fearsome creature staring back at him.
In total, utter shock his first words were...
13532.title: Nate becomes an Atlantean.

choices: Try to convince Tesla you are Nate
135321.content:
Nate just stared at his own reflection in the swimming pool water, unable to believe the creature was him. Eventually he was convinced as the it mimicked all his actions perfectly.
The sets of teeth curled into a smile as Nate jubilated: "Holy Smokes! This is Epic!"

Unable to contain himself any longer, Nate sprang into the water. Time to go for a test run, he thought. As the water enveloped him, he felt like being covered in silk. He felt lighter and stronger; the Atlantean body obviously functioning optimally submerged.

Nate realised he was breathing underwater, using his gills. But could only do so whilst moving. If he slowed to a standstill, it felt as if he was being smothered. It was clear to him that like all fish he had to keep on the move to ensure that water flowed through his gills from where he could filter oxygen.

So moved he did. And fast. He swam at unnatural speeds as his powerful tail and webbed limbs worked in unison to propel him through the water like a torpedo. He swam so fast that he created funnels directly on the surface from where he swan as his powerful strokes displaced the water, forcing the above to fall. Whirlpools encircled the pool.
Nate was having the time of his life. Never before had he experienced such a fun way to swim.

Nate also discovered some interesting things about his Atlantean body. His head didn't have ears because there was no need to catch soundwaves throught the air by an ear shell, sound travelled more efficiently through contact in water. His eyes also never blinked, because there was little need to replenish the moisture that would have evaporated in the atmosphere. Even his seemingly useless dorsal fin aided in acting as an aquatic aerodynamic stabilizer, aiding his steering. Since Nate desired to become a marine-biologist, he found all this fascinating.

Eventually Nate decided he had his fun and exited the pool. He was now more interested in finding out how and why the supernatural sweets worked. Looking again at the candy container, Nate saw that beneath the lid a warning label stood. He had missed it earlier since it was on the underside the lid when it was closed on the container.

In clear typed lettering he read the following:
##########################################################33
Candies of change (A proud product of Magnificents-Magics)

Warning: Read rules before use.

(1)Make wish whilst consuming candy. If no wish is made, candy will be consumed as if it were regular sweets.

(2)Wish may be thought or spoken.

(3)Ensure sufficient detail is given for parameters of wish, otherwise product will assume closest approximation for the desire.

(4) Consumption of 1 piece of candy will lead to temporary 24 hour change/alteration.

(5) Consumption of 5 pieces of candies simultaneously will lead to change/alteration that remains permanent, but is reversible with consumption of more candies.

(6)WARNING: Consumption of 10 pieces of candies simultaneously will lead to change/alteration that is permanent AND irreversable. Negation of effect of this product will then require class 10 alteration magic. Contact nearest Magnificents-Magics branch if accidental undesired permanent state is suffered.

(7)This product cannot recreate the effects of love nor enforce it.

(8)This product cannot resurrect life of any kind.

(9)This product cannot and may not be used to kill life of any kind. Magnificents-Magics prides itself in supplying only safe products.

(10)This product cannot and may not be used to induce misery to the lives of others, in any form or degree. It is for use, solely for the owner to aid/improve his/her lifestyle or/and for their personal enjoyment. Product can never be used to cause emotional/physical harm to those not desiring it.

(11) Product supplied with 100 units of candy.

Please contact nearest Magnificents-Magics branch for enquiries.
######################################################33

Fascinating, thought Nate. He shook the container and concluded that there still had to be 98 left, as he had used 2.
He just had, had, had to show his siblings this. He could imagine all the fun trouble they could get up to.
However as Nate was busy pondering the container and its contents he was oblivious to everything around him.

He didn't notice his brother and sister coming outside into the backyard until he was jolted out of his thoughts by a heartretching scream. He looked to see his older 18-year old brother Tesla and younger 14-year old sister Shekkis staring at him in horror.
It was Shekkis who screamed, her hands covering her mouth, a box she carried dropped. Tesla's hand moved to large bayonet he always carried on his belt.

Nate meekly tried to smile to reasure them, but his best approximation of a smile in the Atlantean body only served to make him bare his teeth in a threatening way, causing Shekkis to faint right there and then. Tesla took a combat stance.

Oh Shaait, thought Nate, realising for the first time that he literally didn't even have a tongue to tell them who he was.
Nate became very scared. Tesla was one of the youngest men to have been nominated for the Spetsnaz training regime, and would run Nate through easily.

What should he do to identify himself? Eat another sweet to turn back hopefully in time before Tesla scewered him on the spot, or try someway to make Tesla realise he was Nate, even though he couldn't speak.
135321.title: Found the Instructions.

1353212.content:
Nate now flailed his arms in panic to indicate who he was, but this only served to antagonize Tesla, who moved to stand between Nate and Skekkis, then advanced on Nate with his bayonet drawn, clear with the intent of vanquishing this monster who had scared his sister.

Nate scurried away, and Tesla followed but almost tripped over something; it was Nate's shirt from earlier, ripped and bloodied from his earlier transformation where he had his sides torn to grow gills.
Tesla's face grew ashen, thinking that the shirt was all that remained of the aftermath between Nate and this creature: "Nate!!" he screamed in terror and anger. "What did you do to him you basterd?!" he shouted at the real Nate.

Oh shaait! Tesla thought Nate had eaten himself or something. Tesla flung himself at the creature, Nate tried to avoid but was caught.
Tesla pinned Nate to the ground, hand on throat. "Say your prayers, freak!"

The hapless Nate could only watch, as Tesla raised his bayonet arm for a deathblow, Tesla's other arm keeping him pinned. The poor chap couldn't even close his ever unblinking fisheyes at the sight.

But Tesla saw something which which made him hesitate. He was confused. The creature had Nate's watch on his right arm. And his torn trousers. And his torn socks and shoes. Tesla stood up puzzled, releasing the creature: "That you Nate?" he asked.
The creature eagerly nodded its head.
"How?" Tesla asked simply. How? What an odd question, thought Nate. If he had been in Tesla's place he would have gone on like a disturbed crackhead asking a multiple of questions along the line of: Holy crap man, what happened? or: This is way too weird, what's going on dude? But not merely: How?

The creature pointed to the fallen candy container, Tesla walked over to and picked it up. He inspected it and read the instructions intently, then he burst out laughing: "Nate, your an idiot."

"Let's see; have to make this right the first time." he took one candy put it in his mouth and made a wish. "I wish Nate was turned back to normal, exactly as he was before he made his wish, that he retained all his memories up until now, that his change be instant and painless, his clothes be fixed, and err... that nothing, no unexpected things happen. Yeah, that's about it." The candy in Tesla's mouth dissolved, became a bright ball of light. The ball of light enveloped Nate transforming him into his good old self instantly. Nate noted no pain this time, he was greatfull for Tesla's foresight.

As the dust settled Nate faced Tesla still sitting on the ground and perplexed by these recent events. "You alright?" asked Tesla helping him to his feet, to which Nate replied shakily: "Yes."

"Good," said Tesla knocking Nate back the ground with the punch to the nose.
"What was that for?!" said the outraged Nate.
"For being an imbecile. You scared the hell out of me."
Tesla then helped Nate back up and then promply punched Nate in the face again, landing him on the ground for a 3rd time.
"Again?!"
"That was for scaring the living daylights out of sis." he said waving to the fainted form of Shekkis.
Tesla helped Nate up for a 3rd time, Nate cringed, but it appeared that Tesla was done handing out punches.
"What the heck is wrong you? Since when did you get kicks from giving people hart attacks, Nate?"
"Oh yeah, why'd you just attack me?" Nate counter accused.
"Did you see yourself? You looked like something straight out of a Clive Barker Horror flick!"
"Oh"
"Yeah, exactly: 'Oh'."

"I didn't mean for any of that to happen." Nate defended.
"What precisely did wish for?" Tesla asked, more curious than angry now.
"Just to breath underwater."
Tesla snickered: "You should have specified your wish in minute detail. Vague wishes tend to lead to screw-ups. Didn't you read the instructions?"

"I've already made my wish then, the instructions were under the lid and-" He stopped.
"Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait ,wait, wait! How do you...how do you know all this? How were you so calm back there? How'd you know what to do to change me back? You acted like you've seen magic and wishes and...stuff before."

Tesla smiled thinly at Nate and said....
1353212.title: Try to convince Tesla you are Nate

choices: They find her, hiding in her room.
They find her, hiding in the hall closet.
13532121.content:
"You...have...wait what?" asked the stupefied Nate.

Tesla grinned at Nate looking as if he were trying to decide whether or not to tell him something.
"Well...the cat's out of the bag; might as well tell you."
"What exactly?"
"You remember me being recruited by spetsnaz last semester."
"Yes."
"Well, it wasn't the public-security-sector that enlisted me, as I said to ma. It was Docow."
"What??"
"Docow. D.O.C.O.W. The Department of Covert Occult Warfare."
"I'm...confused."

"You usually are." mocked Tesla before continuing: "I'm basically a witch-hunter, Nate. I belong to a specialist unit who counters supernatural threats. And I also track and locate dangerous magical artefacts before they can cause their havoc. Stuff like this, Nate" he he help up the candy container. "Before idiots like you can screw-things up."
"Oh, give me a break. How was I supposed to know that was dangerous before today."
"One does not test fate by putting random crap in one's mouth that has the words 'magic' on them."
"Says he with experience and the one who nearly stabbed me to death."

Tesla and Nate smiled at one another."Fair enough." conceded Tesla.
Tesla continued: "However, this little box of parlour tricks doesn't appear to be dangerous. You read the no misery and no death rule right? It's clear its creator had no malevolent intent with these. I'd go as far to as to say its an almost trivial bag of tricks, we can have our fun with it later..."
"See? No reason to have hit me."
"But your face makes such a nice punching-bag!" joked Tesla, before showing a serious face: "The only thing that bothers me is the brand. Magnificent-Magics. Never heard of it."
"Right. Now explain to me how on earth it makes sense that you're supposed to know the brand."

Tesla frowned: "All formal organisations that practice spellcraft professionally have to be registered to Docow. You're not registered, you don't get a magic-licence. You practice spellcraft without magic-licence, you break the law. Simple enough, my simple minded brother?"

"Your making less and less sense, Tesla. Why would witches care about braking the law?"

"Oh, you wouldn't know, would you? O.K. it works like this. Using magic isn't illegal. But using magic on other people without their consent is. Even if witches were helping others, they still have to get whomever they're using their spellcraft on to sign contracts issued by Docow. Now these contracts are special paper resistant to magic; that way witches can't pull a fast one on us, by making innocents sign their own name under the influence of a control-curse. Only people completely willing to whatever change was agreed upon in the contract can sign, short of being blackmailed physically.


Witches can still practice their magic in peace, but they're not allowed to, for example change anyone into a dog or cat without them having agreed to it by contract. Especially not permanently. Only witches operating by our contracts are allowed to be registered by Docow. Those practicing magic on others without the proof of contracts, we have to apprehend into custody.
I'm worried by this brand, because I don't recodnise it. Meaning its not registered by Docow. Meaning its creators are not using our contracts. Meaning they might be operating illegally. Chance of course its a group of young witches in hiding not even aware of our existence. Meaning I have to go find them."

"Now that's a whole lot better. Tell me, you mean there's good witches too?" said Nate.

"Why of course!" exclaimed Tesla in surprise: "Lots of them...in fact most of them. In fact I'd go as far as to say almost all of them. Usually gypsies, fortune tellers, and village witchdoctors. We at Docow only exist to keep the rotten apples at bay, and stopping some young inexperienced witch going too far with getting revenge on the poor sod that's her ex or whatever."

"Thought you said you were a witch-hunter. Doesn't sound like much hunting involved."

"Bah! We at Docow like to brag. Make ourselves sound more impressive than we really are. Fact is, nowadays we're mainly a peace-keeping middleman between the Magical and Physical realm. Our unnecessarily ominous name of Department of Covert Occult Warfare, is something we've vainly tried for years to change in the face of the Bureaucracy that is our government, and have failed.
Now we don't hunt witches, we only track them."
"For what?"

"To ensure their safety; we're not as modern as you'd like to think. Lots of fanatics out there who'd like go all midievil and have some stake burnings. Sometimes the poor girl isn't even aware she's a witch; their magical-abilities only becoming evident during puberty. We at Docow hear reports of weirdness; sometimes we go investigate. If its a witch we send her to apprentice under one of her own. Make sure she doesn't lose control. An keep her from harm as well. Everyone's happy, usually."

"So only girls are witches?"
"Yep." said Tesla.
"I have a headache. This a bit much at once." said Nate holding his head.
"Say where's Shekkis?"

They looked at the backdoor entrance, where she had collapsed, she was nowhere to be seen. "Shekkis!!" shouted Tesla, no answer.
"Oh great, she's probably hiding somewhere thinking Nate the miniature Godzilla is after her." he accused Nate.
"I said I was sorry."
"Come on lets go look for her, she doesn't know about these sweets. She's probably scared stiff."
13532121.title: "I have."

choices: They try convincing her to come out.
135321211.content:
Shekkis was scared stiff, but not because of Nate scaring her as the Atlantean. She had regained consciousness after Tesla had turned Nate back to normal and when she had heard him tell Nate that he was a witch-hunter, she became truly fearful.

You see, she was witch.

She had ran upstairs as quickly as her legs could carry her, slammed her door and locked it. Then she had cowered and shivered under the duveys of her bed.

It started about a year ago. She discovered that she could do things others could not. First simple things: like lighting a candle without using a match, making small thing float. She discovered many of these tricks and even went as far to use her abilities, which she herself could not explain, to enter her school's talent-competition as a magician. With an unfair advantage, she could make coins literally disappear and change playing-cards into whatever her audience had guessed.
She made a magnificent performer and loved the attention.

She would practice her magic and spells in secret, hoping to outdo even Houdini one day.
One of her experiments led to the creation of magically imbued sweets. After months of labour she had created the pinacle of her work. She called it: The Candies of Change.

Shekkis had wanted to test their potency and whether they actually worked and had decided that as her brother, Nate's birthday was around the corner she would give them to him and see what he wished for.

But she didn't think things would turn out this way. She never wanted to cause any trouble, she just wanted to have some fun. When Tesla had revealed himself to be a witch-hunter she fled. She of course hadn't heard everything that Tesla had explained to Nate, firmly believing her would harm her, instead of offering her security as he had explained.

When she had heard Tesla shouting after her from the backyard, she started shaking and trembling.

She of course didn't realise they were concerned for her safety, whist they didn't suspect she was a witch and had not fled from Nate but from Tesla.

So when Nate had knocked on her door calling: "Shekkis! You in there?!" she had shouted back: "Stay away!"

"Smooth." said Tesla to Nate thinking Shekkis was still terrified by the Atlantean.
"It's okay Shekkis, its gone, there's nothing to be afraid of." said Tesla.
"Your lying." she shouted back.

Confused Nate and Tesla conferred. "Now what?" asked Nate.
"I can pick her door." offered Tesla. "We should calm her down."

"Stay away!" she shouted again.

Now what?
135321211.title: They find her, hiding in her room.

You basically shrug it off and continue upstairs to your room.

What do you decide to do?

What is even more surprising is that the banner is accompanied by a picture of something very familiar. The picture shows a jar of candy filled to the brim, one that looks exactly like the jar you left on the table. "Does it really work?" you say to yourself. You find your mouse slowly rolling over the ad banner. You...

Melody Willow, a 21 year old women who...

"Hi! Im Melody Willow, the proud maker of wishing candies! Just 199.99 for a jar each, a total of 38 candies! BUY NOW! And make your wish come true!" Meldoy Willow said on the banner, she is a beautiful brown haired girl, with soft blonde highlights, light green eyes, pale, full lips and a cute button nose.

1432.content:
Nate was exhausted and not in the right state of mind to even care whether the 30 dollars he held in his hand was supernaturally procured or not. He just threw them down next to his cubbard, and face-planted himself on his bed. Sleep captured him in seconds; his light snoring sounding throughout his room.

======================================

Downstairs, sitting alone, Nate's mother, Lynda was also exhausted. She had had a rough day. She was glad that Nate had organised his own birthday party, for she had been stumped today. She would promise to make it up to him later this weekend, for not being there.

You see, Lynda was a widow. Her husband Mike, having passed away 3 months previously. What was truly traumatizing about his death was that Mike's Life-Insurance policy had been rejected by the scumbag Insurance company for which he had faithfully paid out every month without a missed payment for the last 6 years. And now his family for whom he'd loved and cared stood on the brink of poverty.

Lynda was forced to toil away daily at her sweatshop job in order to keep the Wilson family afloat. She just managed to make enough in order to keep her 3 children from starvation. Nate(16), Erin(13) and Nicole(11) had been very supportive and responsible. They had helped cleaning around the house, made food for her every night when she came back drained and had been a great pillar of support to her the last few harrowing months.

But a cloud of doom loomed over the household: Lynda was pregnant. Heavily so. And her douchebag employer had refused her maternity leave. If she didn't arrive for work, she would not get paid. Lynda was already 3 weeks past the legal date by which pregnancy was allowed at work, yet if she stopped the rest of her children would starve. She had cried many nights in desperation. Knowing at some point she would cease to be capable to work in her state. She didn't know what to do when the time arrived.

So she just sat and caressed her swollen belly, talking softly to her unborn infant. Hoping for a miracle. Next to her on the kitchen table still stood the candy container where Nate had left it. Feeling understandably depressed she groped for it and undid the lid.
She began to munch on them, oblivious to their implications or applications.

She regretted that Nate had taken a part time job as a pizza delivery boy just so he could get some extra income for the family. She felt guilty. He had worked hard the last quarter. He was steadfast and had told Lynda many times he wished he could have taken the burden from her back. Erin and Nicole had both been there as well, but she was always especially comforted by Nate, since as he was a miniature version of his father, Lynda found great comfort in his childishly determined words, for Lynda missed her spouse greatly.
Suddenly Lynda broke into tears like so many times before: "Oh Nate! How I wished you really could have taken the burden from my back..." she sniffed, wiping her eyes.

Lynda had been chewing one of the magical sweets at the time she said this. And as she vocalized her desire, its powerful magic took effect. A crash of lightning and a flash of light, made Lynda sit upright with fright. She almost had a heart attack, believing a gun had been fired.

What happened next made Lynda more fearful than she had been in her entire life. Her breasts shrank, from her milk-filled state to her normal less proportioned size. Then her pot-belly diminished, restricted and started to disappear. Lynda screamed, clutching her stomach, which grew smaller and smaller. She was convinced her unborn child was being taken to oblivion and wailed: "No! No! Please! God no! No please! I shan't ever complain again!" The poor woman was petrified she was being punished for talking out of turn.

Once all proof of her pregnancy disappeared into obscurity, Lynda collapsed to the floor and wept. She was now in body exactly as she had been before her pregnancy, her maternity dress falling loosely in front of her.
Suddenly a stream of light escaped her open mouth, and formed a spinning streak like a flying firework. It orbited Lynda a few times, then shot upstairs. Without understanding why, Lynda dashed after it, tears trailing her wake.

The light streak entered Nate's room, and Lynda followed suite. There she saw her son lying chest up and bare-chested on his bed, fast asleep, the light-streak hovering over him, before entering his mouth.

Like a snake going in headfirst into its underground bunker, the light-streak took 3 seconds before its entire trailing tail followed suit.
Lynda looked at her son, unsure what to do.

Next, Lynda almost fainted, experiencing something equally as frightening as before.
=============================================================

Nate woke up in fright, seeing the light-streak enter him. He closed his mouth, but it kept entering him through the nose and ears. He couldn't actually feel it, for it was like gas. He saw his mother looking at him from his doorframe, she was scared; this in turn caused him to be scared.

What happened next, happened fast: Nate's chest was bare so he could see things on it change. His areolas grew broader and darkened ; the nipples on top of them started jutting out like screws. The flesh behind his nipples felt swollen, and as he looked they inflated outwards, like 2 balloons slowly being filled with water. Similar to 2 missiles being raised from their silos, Nate gradually grew breasts. Large ones too. Nate could but gape in shock.

But it didn't end there, oh no. His stomach started expanding as well. Like a rubber tube being slowly inflated, his belly increased in size, breath by breath. His hips flared a bit outward to accomodate this enlarged gut. And below his enlarging gut, Nate could feel something shrink inside of his boxers. He lifted the hem to see his one-eyed member decrease into the empty invertedness of womanhood. The scrotum formed the labia and external nether lips.
Nate's face turned as white as a sheet, his blood draining.

Finally as Nate lay there on his bed, his transformation stopped. He looked down at himself with utter horror. His chest sported 2 nude pert G-Cup sized bosoms, and his lower waist a heavily pregnant pot-belly. Below that, at least mercifully hidden within the exceedingly tightly restrained boxers, he could feel his nether lips constrained. Nate tried to sat up, his huge watermelons bouncing across his chest. He couldn't sit up any farther, his pot-belly preventing further angling.

He looked a queer sight. He still had his face and arms and legs and almost everything. But it was as if someone superglued a sizable pair of orbs on his chest, larger hips around his sides, and a movie pregnancy set-piece onto his lower midriff: only this pot-belly was real, organic, alive. It looked strange on his slight 16-year old frame.

Nate then hiccuped and a flash brought the light-streak back out. The streak settled in the middle of the room, morphing into something solid. It was a grandly carved wooden signbord.

On it stated: Greetings from the creators of product #1256: Candies of Change!
Number of units utilised: 1/100
Most recent wish made: "Oh Nate! How I wished you really could have taken the burden from my back..." Lynda Wilson at 6:37 pm, Wilson residence, kitchen
Most recent wish effectiveness: Limited. Please specify wishes in minute detail. Vague wishes may lead to undesired consequences.
Most recent wish result: Burden being assumed pregnancy is shifted to son; son is equipped with full utilities required to raise child; includes breasts and womb.
WARNING: Product #1256 cannot create or destroy life. Pregnancies cannot be unmade, only shifted.

Both Nate and Lynda stared at one another, then screamed. Their terrified screams mingled into the cold, silent night air, shuddering through the house.

"Really? Because I feel like I've done it before. Your room could use a cleaning." said Nicole. Then, almost out of nowhere, Nicole had a little feather duster in her right hand. Nate wondered where she got that.

"Ugh, this is so weird, but I suppose if you want, then go ahead." said Nate.

"Thank you." smiled Nicole as she practically skipped into the room, beginning by dusting off his furniture while humming to herself.

"Well, I guess she was serious about the cleaning." said Nate. However, he didn't really notice that Nicole was still sucking on a piece of candy from just before the wish ended, but even she didn't really even notice now.

"Your room is so dusty." smiled Nicole as she collected what she could up, putting it in a good place away from where she was working. However, as she was trying to reach up, there were some places where she couldn't reach.

"Heh, a little short there." smiled Nate. Nicole pouted at him.

"How can I finish then?" she groaned.
1453111211.title: She's here to clean up

14531112111.content:
"I wish I was a better maid." said Nicole to herself, something that caught Nate off guard.

"Maid? Why do you think you're a maid?" Nate asked.

As he said that, he gasped and took a step back as Nicole's clothes began to morph. Her white socks turned jet black, rising up her legs to her thighs. White bows formed at the top of her new stockings. Her white and pink shoes turned equally black, forming around her feet and a heel forming in the back.

"W-What?" Nate nearly exclaimed, stumbling back a bit.

"What's wrong?" asked Nicole innocently. She obviously didn't notice anything weird.

"Your...." Nate started before it started up again.

Her shirt and shorts became a single garment, while the leggins blossomed out into a skirt with white and black decorations. It became a little flowery too. The top of her shirt began to conform down to her chest, exposing her shoulders and the top half of her torso. A couple armbands then appeared on her forearms and a black choker appeared on her neck. To top it off, a white flowery headband appeared in her hair.

Nate felt like he couldn't breathe.

"You're acting funny." giggled Nicole as she turned around to dust some more. As she bent down, Nate could see that her underwear was also changing, getting a little smaller and turning black as well.

"What is going on? Could this get any weirder?" Nate nearly panicked to himself.
14531112111.title: She wishes that she was a better maid, much to ...

"Sorry, master, but you know that I not in any relation to you," she replied worringly. "How could I? I am but your your humble maid." As she said these words, they started to take longer to come out, as she had to filter what she said so Nate could understand.

Speaking of Nate, he was more worried than ever. "Tell me Nicole, who are our parents?"

"Zat iz a hard quezton. Do you mean yourz or my?" she asked confusingly, now in a heavy French accent.

Her brother gulped while trying to answer. "Yours..." he managed to get out.

"Oh! Of courze! Zat iz eazy. Angélique an' Arvin Archambault. I underzand if you worry about mine life back home. Zit is very nize to have zese talks with zu, master, but I must get zu work." All Nate could do was leave his jaw hanging as his now French sister started to lose anything that made them related. Nicole's brown hair turned a natural light blond and her blue eyes changed brown. Her Wilson DNA had quickly turned into that of the Archambault family and the memories of her parents and three sisters back home in Alencon, France were embedded in vivid detail. These memories were not false, as there was in fact a loving family back there that miss their dear Nicholette.

"Don't you have ze stuffz to do, anyway?"

"Very well, zen. If you inzist on zaying an' watching me, zen I am forzed to oblige. Juz don't zimply zay for ze eye candiez," she winked in a mature woman's voice.

Before Nicholette could answer, her body started to age rapidly. In an instant, she grew from 3'8'' to a sleek 5'9'', with the womanly legs to match. Her face melted to reveal a beautiful French woman's with seductive brown eyes and makeup expertly applied, free of any of her former baby fat or blemishes. The hair on her new skull turned a bright natural blond that curled without any artificial needs and continued to elongate down to her flat chest.

The strands of hair were pushed up slightly as her chest became fully developed, to say the least. More womanly fat was applied to her hips that also allowed her curves to show in full flaunt. Nicholette was far from the five years old she was but moments ago. She now resembled a downright gorgeous 28 years old French maid and reality knew that statement to be true.

"Prepubezent?! Zu may be mine mazter, but I will not be inzulted by your feelzings of inzecurities! All becuz zu are fat-chezted duz not mean zu have ze right to beright mine developments."

How does Nate react?
1453111211112.title: I think this is more important.

14531112111122.content:
(The new Nicholette: http://maiddeluxe.files.wordpress.com/20... )

"Flat chest?!" Nate growled, forgetting that he just watched a five years old girl become more than five times her age. "I will let you know that I am simply developing!" He didn't notice a training bra appearing on said flat chest. "To think you would think me low enough to project my inadequacies on you for a simple chest complex is deeply insulting! You are but a simple maid who is here to be seen, not heard. I would not consider you anywhere worthy of my envy or even acknowledgement beyond anything worth saying that is simply fact. I possess no envy over your developments and only wanted to comment on your incessive humming. It is deeply distracting me while I am frightfully busy, entertaining yourself like a simple child, so I would like to ask you to please cease immediately." Nicole was no longer in his memory and his voice continued to crack until it sounded like a girl his age's.

"Insécurité petite fille."

"That is what I thought. Now get to work, wretch, and stay within your own business." With that outburst out of the way, Nate barged out of his room, slamming the door.

14531112111122.title: What?!

145311121111221.content:
"What nerve!" Nate almost yelled to himself. He was still fuming over what happened earlier with Nicholette. However, over the past few minutes, he had tried to cool down again.

"Wow, when have I ever lost it like that. Guess I need to calm down a bit." he finally said after catching his breath. He didn't feel like going back up to his room, as Nicholette was still up there, and he didn't feel like encountering her for some time.

"Everything was felt weird since today started. I wonder why." he pondered to himself. The candies had, for the most part, left Nate's mind, although he still could remember them a tiny bit. However, he remembered them being taken away, but he couldn't remember by who, with Nicole becoming a new person. Who knows where they were now. After sighing, Nate continued walking downstairs, trying to clear his head.

As he walked downstairs, he kept scratching his chest absentmindedly. Before, a training bra had appeared on his small chest during the talk with Nicholette. Other than that, his shirt was now sky blue, but that was it. To be honest, the itching was getting a bit annoying.

"Ugh, why won't stop." he nearly growled as he finally got downstairs. As he did, he looked down briefly, and stopped a bit because his shorts now seemed to be the same sky blue as his shirt now.

"Huh? I wasn't wearing that before was I?" he asked himself, although he couldn't figure out the answer.

What happened next?
145311121111221.title: Nate continues changing

1453111211112211.content:
As Nate wondered around downstairs, his other little sister Erin appeared.

"Hey, what's up?" she asked.

"Oh, nothing too important." said Nate.

"Really? You look stressed." said Erin, not really believing that.

"Well, I'm just thinking about a lot of things. It's not really your business." said Nate, not trying to be offensive. Erin pouted a bit at that.

"Really? You're always like that aren't you?" she said.

"I just prefer to keep some things to myself. Now I need to go." said Nate, leaving Erin behind in the family room. Erin kept pouting at him, sucking on a candy that she had with her. She had ended up finding the jar after Nicole left them, not really knowing what the candies could do.

In the other room, Nate sat down, just thinking about some things while getting a snack.

"Perhaps some comfort food can calm me down." he told himself.

Back over in the family room, Erin kept sucking on her candy.

"Nate is so weird sometimes." she said to herself.
1453111211112211.title: Erin appears

14531112111122111.content:
"Nate is so weird sometimes." grumbled Erin as she sucked on a candy. "I wish he would be more outgoing sometimes. Then maybe he would actually talk to me."

Meanwhile, Nate was pondering something himself. He began to feel that he had been too harsh on Nicolette. She was doing her job after all.

"Perhaps I was too harsh with her." said Nate as he ate a piece of string cheese from the fridge. "All right, perhaps I should go apologize."

With that said, he began walking out of the kitchen. As he did, he didn't notice how both his shirt and shorts were now light blue, and starting to look a bit shiny as well. However, along the way, he did stumble on his feet a bit, but he stayed right up. He looked down and saw that he wasn't wearing any socks anymore.

That's wierd. I was sure I had socks on." he said to himself. Now he just had his shoes on, although that would soon change as well.

Anyway, Nate walked past the family room where Erin was. Not bothering to talk to her right now, Nate got to the staircase and began walking upstairs.

"I wonder what she's doing right now." Nate said to himself.

Suddenly, as he got halfway up the stairs, Erin's wish took effect. Nate stiffened a bit as the new weird sensation flowed over him.

"What was that? Did something happen?" asked Nate out loud. "Oh well, I need to hurry and find Nicolette." he then said.

With that decided, he walked up the stairs with some more energy, as if he had loads of things to tell people now. He didn't know why but it actually felt good. He began to feel free to express himself somehow.

"Well, it works for me." he smiled as he reached the upstairs.
14531112111122111.title: She ends up making a wish

145311121111221111.content:
As soon as Nate opened the door to his room, he noticed that something seemed different about it. It wasn't the fact that it was now five times its original size, the giant pink bed decorated in fluffy animals and hearts, nor the the new stained glass windows. Everything else seemed as it should be: the room-sized wardrobe filled to the brim with regal dresses, the sky blue walls splattered with the mural Nate has been working on since he was three.

The room still seemed fit for loyalty. Very girly royalty. No, what was wrong was that there was a full grown French woman sitting down in a chair at his giant mirror, sobbing.

"Nicolette, what troubles you now?" Nate asked sympathetically.

"Like zu care?!" she snapped back angrily, trying to hold in the tears.

Nate sighed. "Listen, I am very sorry for what I said earlier." His voice cracked while saying this, not noticing it rising a pitch. "I was far too childish and unbecoming to snap at you like that. I hope you could find it in your heart to forgive of such unruly behavior." By now, his voice sounded exactly like a girl his age's.

"Zank you, Master Nate. Iz just that..." She wimpered a little as she brushed her eyes, wiping off some washed up mascara. "My family relizes on moi and thiz job and I waz afraid... I waz afraid you would tell on moi. Getz me fired. All becuz of zat little, zupid crack of mine."

"Nicolette, please have more faith in me," Nate said comfortably while laying his hand on the older woman, not noticing his nails being painted blue. "I would never never fire you for the sole purpose of my own complexes."

"Je vous remercie, maître." she replied back with a large smile. "Oh! What iz this?" She noticed a single candy laying on the floor and picked it up.
145311121111221111.title: Finding Nicolette

1453111211112211112.content:
"Master, I think zis iz yourz," Nicolette said to her employer while handing over the candy.

"No thank you, Nicolette. I believe you have garnered at least a small piece of candy for the troubles I have given you today." He smiled warmly at his worker, his face feminizing to a female version of his original.

"Très bien," she said in French while gulping the candy down. "You know, it iz a shame that zu have all thiz charm and no one to share it with."

"What ever do you mean?"

"I mean haven't zu ever thought of your prinz charming?"

Nate blushed at the question, not noticing the makeup being magically applied that accentuated his embarrasment. "I am very sorry, but I am afraid I have too many duties at hand to allow time for courtship. In fact, I still have pressing concerns to deal with. Goodbye, Nicolette," he said rushingly, hoping to get out of the uncomfortable subject as fast as possible. He then proceded to rush towards the door immediately. The French maid watched in amusement.

"I really do wish ze could have ze perfect prinz for herzelf." Nicolette then decided to keep on dusting, unaware of the candy glowing in her mouth.
1453111211112211112.title: Eats ith herself

14531112111122111122.content:
Just as Nicolette made her wish, her former older sister felt a shiver down her spine.

"Must be a draft," Erin inferred to herself, albeit in a masculine and slightly more mature voice. "Wait... Is that my voice?" she asked no one while putting her hand to her mouth. Further inspection caused her to realize said hand was much larger and her nails were much shorter and plain.

"Nate!" she called out in sheer terror with her new voice. "Where is thy fair hand of mine maiden?" She slapped herself in the face, hoping to snap herself out of this strange curse. "Why must mine tongue be restricted to such luxuriant patterns? Is it not insult to injury to force me through such distressful transformations and thy language be altered, also?"

Knowing nothing else to do, the changing teenager rushed into the nearest bathroom, her height growing up to 5'11''. As soon as she made it inside the bathroom, her newly extended legs and arms were already invaded by new bodyhair. Strangely enough, this new hair was blond, as opposed to her natural brown. One look in the mirror revealed to her that the hair on her head had also turned blond and was barely over her ears. While she was staring at herself, awe struck by her changes, she also witnessed her young, feminine teenager face morph into a masculine, older teen's.

Erin couldn't handle all this sensory overload. She dashed over to the toilet and started throwing up, her hips depleting in the proccess. The muscle from her breasts redeposited themeselves all throughout her body until she was completely flat-chested, but pretty well built. For a young man, that is.
14531112111122111122.title: Erin starts changing

Meanwhile, Nate had just exited his room after talking to Nicolette.

"Well, that was a good talk. I'm glad that there was an understanding there." he smiled.

As he walked down the hallway, he began to notice something a bit weird. The hallways seemed to be a little wider and higher than normal.

"Huh? Am I seeing this right?" said Nate as he rubbed his eyes a bit. True enough, it still looked weird. He probably lay across the hallway now without touching the walls. He shook his head though, as thinking about it just seemed to make it even more confusing.

"Well, whatever it is, perhaps Nicolette can get to it." said Nate as he began walking down the stairs. When he got back down to the bottom floor, things still looked normal there, causing Nate to wonder if he was just hallucinating or something.

However, as he walked away from the staircase, he had a sudden sense that things were a little bigger than normal. However, it wasn't like the hallway. Nate looked around and, for some reason, began feeling like he was a bit smaller than normal.

"Okay, maybe I do need a break." sighed Nate as he kept walking. Little did he know that, unlike the hallway, this time the change was because of him. He was shrinking from his normal height of 5'6, going down to about 5'2 right now.

However, before he could think any more on it, he ran into someone.
145311121111221111222.title: Back to Nate

1453111211112211112221.content:
As he walked through the family room, Nate was a bit surprised to see that Erin wasn't anywhere to be seen. However, he did see Trevor walking by, seeming sucking on something in his mouth.

"Hey Nate." said Trevor casually.

"Hi Trevor." said Nate.

"What are you doing?" asked Trevor.

"Oh nothing much." replied Nate. He really didn't want to say much to Trevor right now. However, he was beginning to feel something within himself, as if something inside had something to say.

"If you're okay, then why are you acting weird?" asked the 7-year old. Then, Nate felt something come out of him.

"I don't need you prying into my business." said Nate with a stern look.

"Huh? What do you mean?" asked Trevor.

"I mean that if I have something to say, I'll say it. You need not pester me all the time." said Nate.

"Hey, don't talk to me like I'm some stranger." said Trevor, getting a tiny bit angry with Nate being so defensive.

"I don't care. You still talk to me appropriately, not like some ignorant child." said Nate.

"What does that even mean?" asked Trevor, getting more than a bit angry right now.

As Nate talked about this, his shirt and shorts, which were now both light blue, began connecting together, the difference between them getting smaller. The hems slowly connected together until one garment was formed, until you couldn't say that Nate was wearing a shirt and shorts.

However, neither of them noticed this.

"You make me so mad sometimes Nate, and just because you're older than me." said Trevor, sucking heavily on what was in his mouth, which happened to be a candy he took from Nicole's room a bit earlier.

"You know, I wish I was in charge sometimes!" Trevor nearly yelled. Nate laughed a bit.

"How would you be in charge? You're so much younger." said Nate.

"I know, but I wish I wasn't." said Trevor, stomping his feet and walking off.

"Wow, that boy has quite the temper sometimes." said Nate. As Trevor stomped off, Nate felt something form around his neck. Although he couldn't see it, a blue choker had appeared around his neck, continuing the changes.

Anyway, after that, Nate sat down on the couch for a bit, trying to get this thoughts figured out. He honestly wasn't sure why he snapped at Trevor like that. It was most unusual, although some part of Nate seemed to find it natural.

"Why is that? I'm not normally that hot-tempered." pondered Nate.

As he sat down, he actually ended up crossing his legs in a rather feminine position, although it was a while before he noticed.

"Hey, doesn't mom cross his legs like this. Perhaps I shouldn't then." pondered Nate. However, he couldn't really seem to get his legs to separate, until he eventually just gave up on it. It didn't seem worth the effort.

"Oh well, I guess it's no problem." said Nate.

Anyway, as it went on, Nate didn't really look at his shoes, which were beginning to lose any color or decals on them. The size seemed to be shrinking, as if trying to form around his feet. Before long, the color had all gone away, leaving just white shoes, but they were still shifting and forming into something else.

"Well, I guess I'll watch something." said Nate as he grabbed the remote and turned the TV on.

He had no idea what was going on with Trevor as a consequence of that wish.
14531112111122111122211.title: Trevor makes a wish about himself

145311121111221111222111.content:
While his older brother was watching TV, Trevor decided to march into his room. However, he actually ended up marching into his parents' room and just didn't notice. There was a lot of unnoticed this day actually. Well, anyway, he figured a couple puches to the wall would vent out his prepubescent fury, but the wish gave him a churning feeling in his gut. In response to these uncomfortable feelings, he decided to pay a visit to his parents' bathroom within their room.

Before reaching the toilet, he couldn't help but notice something was different about him in the mirror. Wasn't his eyes supposed to be blue? Because now, they looked like a deep hazel. And why was his hair blond all of a sudden?! A moment ago it was dark brown!

"What the hell is going on?!" he asked in horror no one while his voice seemed to crack. He started pacing all around the small bathroom in deep thought and terror, paying no heed to the fact that he aged from 7 years old to 12 with his height increasing exponentially to 4'10''. This change actually left a shiver down his spine that caused him to look back at himself in the mirror. Before he could though, Trevor felt like something was choking. Out of sheer reflex, he grabbed at his neck and tore off whatever he felt was restricting him.

He looked down at his hand to examine what was previously choking him and all he found was a small necklace. Two small black straps holding an expensive looking saphire stone. Before long, the necklace reattached itself to Trevor's neck. Except this time, his neck felt much longer and seemed to have lost its small adam's apple, so it now fit snugly.

"How peculiar," he observed in a melodic woman's voice, now only in dull surprise.

1453111211112211112221112.content:
While Trevor was starting to adjust to his changes, Erin was in mortal terror.

Her pink tank-top and snug blue jean pants had somehow transformed into a snappy-looking white jacket heavily decorated with various medals she was currently unable to read and a pair of less tight brown pants seemingly made out of a very expensive silk. Though she was still heavily worried about her changing condition, she still was unable to acknowledge the shiny gold sash and shoulder guards that now belonged on her person. Erin did notice, however, her constantly changing frame.

She looked at herself in the mirror once more, but she did not see herself. All she saw was a young man around her brother's age. And a rather dashing one at that, she had to admit.

"Why have I been cursed to appear as such?" she sobbed in her now masculine voice, the feeling of her new adam's apple only causing more distress. "Why must I become such a rugid man?" Just after she asked her question, Erin felt a strange object appear in her new jacket pocket.

She took it out to inspect and found a locket. A solid gold locket shaped like a heart. Out of curiosity, she opened it and found a picture of a beautiful young woman dressed in blue. However, as soon as Erin saw this woman, his heart was aflutter. That wasn't a mistake calling Erin a he. A quick glance at his sweet Natallia was enough to change her forming girlhood into a more mature manhood.

Aaron could not simply spend all day looking at his beloved's picture all day. He had to find her in person! It was his duty as a prince and her fiance
1453111211112211112221112.title: Back to Erin

14531112111122111122211122.content:
Back in the parents' bathroom, Trevor was just starting to calm down. A small part of him understood that he was changing, but the rest of him was constantly explaining that it was normal. And the rest of him was believing it! So, almost any former sign of panic was replaced with almost complete serenity.

With the feeling of mortal terror out of the way, Trevor decided it was high time to relax for a bit. After a couple moments of thought, he decided a good soak in the bathtub would do his nerves good. Even when he reached to start the bath, he failed to notice that the entire bathroom was growing and transforming. What was once only a half-bathroom was now the size of three bathrooms and was filled with much more expensive accomodations. We're talking about royal quality accomodations. Even the bathtub he was about to fill was now the size of a king-sized bed with a gold rim and jets.

As his now long and feminine hands turned the knobs to get the temperature just right, Tevor looked around the bathroom once more. My word,' he thought. 'Nicolette really has been doing a recognizable job with the cleaning.' Any memories he may have had of his younger or older sister had instantly vanished, replaced with those of the family maid and Nate's boyfriend. 'I must remember to commend her for this job.'

Not long afterwards, he was finally able to slip into the regal tub. The perfectly heated water sent a shiver down his spine that caused it to extend along with his age. He may not have been thinking about it at the time, but he knew he was now 18 despite still only being 5'4''. I suppose that was rather normal for a girl that age.

It was like everyone disappeared around him. Nicolette was still upstairs, and he couldn't find Erin or Trevor anywhere. He wondered where Trevor had gone after his little temper tamtrum.

Anyway, he sooned walked into the kitchen again, getting himself a little snack. However, as he walked in, he noticed that some things looked different. It looked a bit bigger than before, and there seemed to be more things than before. Actually, looking further in, he noticed someone else in there; a young woman who he didn't recognize. However, she smiled at Nate.

"Good day sir." she said with a bow. "Do you need anything?" she asked.

Nate was a bit bewildered by the sudden appearance of the woman, but he responded anyway. "Well, I was just going to get a sandwich." he said.

"Okay, I'll get on it." she said as she ended up preparing a basic PB&J sandwich.

"Here you go." she said with a smile.

"Um...okay." said Nate, wondering if he should have been concerned by her sudden appearance. "Who are you by the way?" he asked.

"I'm Melissa of course. Did you forget?" she said, her smile not wavering at all.

"Um...it's nothing." said Nate as he took his leave of the kitchen, with Melissa staying in there. "Well, that was weird, but at least she cooks." he said.

As he walked out, a brief breeze flowed across his skin, making him shiver slightly. Unknowingly to him, his skin was softening up, as if soothed daily with the best shanpoos around. It was going nicely with his shrinking frame.

"Why, thank you, Master Nate. You are quite a benevolent boss to us all. I shall go now. Farewell."

"Farewell," he replied as the cook closed the door and he popped a candy in his mouth. "My, my. I do wish I had a more appropriate accomodations for my kingdom."
