1513111.content: Nate sees his sister and asks"have you seen my candy"? She lies "no" and Nate leaves. Kate starts talking to Nate and Erin starts sucking on the one of the candies and wishes for Nate and Kate to swap bodies.
1513111.title: Erin

choices: Turn into a girl (over time? or instantly?)
Turn into a woman (over time? or instantly?)
1513121.content:
"These from your friend?" asks Mom as she juggles the jar of magical candies playfully, pretending to be a professional circus performer. Fail. The lid of the jar is flung open by an 'invisible force', and the candies dash out, happy to be free.

"Mom!" You howl in annoyance. "Those are mine!"

"I know, I know dearie," Mom replies cheerfully. "But can't your tired Mother have some fun?"

And without having the decency to ask permission, your Mom scoops up the entire pile of fallen candy and unwraps one. You know your Mom has one weakness. And that is, Candy. Yes, she's an adult. But put her next to a jar of candy, and she'll completely lose her head over it.

That's what she is doing now.

"MOM MOM MOM MOM MOM!" You holler, as upset as a hen who's just lost her eggs. "NO! GIMME EM'!" And you leap for it.

Your Mom ignores you, before darting away and popping the candy into her Mouth, sucking it happily.

"Mmmmm," She purposely interjects. "Heavenly."

That's one magical wish wasted already. So, as furious as a tiger, you move in for the kill. But just as you are reaching for the remote control to knock your Mother out or something, your annoying brother, Trevor materializes at the doorway. The sight of him just sores your eyes.

"Oh my, Natey-Batey," Trevor sings. "Why're you screaming like a girly?"

"Shut up Trevor," you recite the same line you recite ten times a day.

Mom's face darkens at once. "Apologize to Trevor now, honey."

"You spit that candy out first, Mom!" You retort.

World war three starts in the middle of the Living Room. A showdown between you and your Mom, with Trevor singing Barney's songs at the side. Someone should just shoot that kid. He's better of dead.

"That's it!" Your Mom explodes. "Nate! Why can't you just understand me? I wish you would you know! Just stop being such a insolent boy!"

Number one, the sweet is still in her mouth. And number two, she accidentally emphasized the word 'boy' instead of insolent.

Uh-oh.
1513121.title: Lynda

choices: You read the stuff on the Sweet Wrapper?
15131211.content:
Mom finishes her furious monologue, leaving no space for any comments. You don't understand why she's upset at you, when Trevor's the reason for this entire drama. He always gets off scot-free. Its no fair.

Trevor's still singing the sickly chorus 'I love you, you love me' repeatedly. His horrid froggy voice is definitely worming itself into everyone's head and aggravating their ferocity.

"Mom-" you attempt, but she gives you The Look, so you drop it. She then turns on her heels sourly and stomps off. Trevor sneakily grabs the sweet wrapper from Mom on the way out and begins twisting it into all sorts Barney shapes studiously, as though it's the most important thing in the world.

As you've mentioned earlier, someone should shoot that kid.

You're raving mad, so you don't notice the subtle changes which are occurring to yourself at the moment.

"TREVOR!" You yell instead. "DAMN YOU!"

Distracted, Trevor looks up from his twisting, and gawps. "Natey-Batey is a girly!"

Again, he's being the one thing he's good at - annoying.

"Shut up, Trevor!" You scream back, louder. "SHUT UP!"

Trevor's face turns white and red at the same time, making him resemble a rooster.

"What?" You demand, starting to feel self-conscious. "What is it?"

But as you ask, you feel a tingling sensation race up your spine, and slowly spreading to your entire body. You feel as light as a balloon, and you immediately sense something ajar. Panic-stricken, you stare at your reflection in the television. You're literally shape-shifting. The monster in the mirror is no longer you. Its structure is slimming down, its hips are rounding, its hair is lengthening, its lady-like legs are taking shape, its features are feminizing, and its chest...

Oh no, lets not talk about the chest.

You're a girl. Literally. A. Girl.

You shriek, and so does Trevor. Just that, the octave of your voice is pitched the same as Trevor's! WHAT THE? It's as high as tweetie bird's! Wait, hasn't your voice already broken? Mom used to joke about you sounding like Darth Vader right?

Then you remember the magical candy, the wish, and... the sweet wrapper in Trevor's hand. Maybe it can tell you something?

You're desperate, so you lunge for the flimsy wrapper like a deranged sugar-high kid.

(What happens next?)
15131211.title: I. Am. A. Girl? O.M.G!

151312111.content:
Trevor's holding onto the sweet wrapper, so urgently, you take the other end and tug hard on it.

"Nate..." Trevor gasps. "What... What's happening?"

Trevor has two sides to him. The Angel Side, and the Devil Side. Sometimes I wonder if he's bio-personality-disorder because he acts them out so well. I mean, he can win any adult's love, and yet, he can also re-create hell for anyone he chooses.

Right now, he's so anxious he's probably unintentionally playing Angel.

"Gimme the wrapper!" You order. "I need it!"

"You're... you're a girly!" Trevor merely gasps again.

You don't need to be reminded that again. Gosh. Impatiently, you tug hard on the sweet wrapper, and this time, it tears.

"Oh damn!" you curse angrily. "Trevor, gimme it!" You hope that it's not completely torn. Maybe you can piece it back together and read it?

Trevor's still in shock. Instead, he recoils at the touch of your hand as though you're some lethal bacteria, causing the tear to deepen.

The wrapper tears itself into two clean halves. And the moment it does, another bout of tingling sensations zip up your spine. This sensations's different from the first - it's... it's almost numbing. It's like getting pins and needles all over your back. The sensation spreads like wild fire, and the next thing you know, your entire body's under that strange spell.

Trevor's eyes tore themselves out of their socket. He's sitting right in front of you, gaping at you like you're about to destroy his favourite fire truck - and mind you, that's a jolly great shock to him. After all, no one dares to touch his toys because Mom loves him to bits.

"What?" you demand, not fancying being a museum artifact. "What?"

"You... you're changing..." he stammers.

You don't know what he means again. So you turn and stare back at your reflection in the television screen. True enough, you've got to give this one to him. You are changing. In fact, you're changing back to yourself! - you can tell by the way your features are 'masculining' themselves.

Yes! At last!

When the sensations has completely left you, you realize how Mom's evil 'wish' had been broken. The sweet wrapper tore and KA-BOOM, the wish had been reversed! You realize devilishly that you could use this to your advantage!

You spy the jar of candies on the table and then sneak another glance at Trevor who's currently wetting himself on the couch. This sounds evil, but you immediately know what to do.

Time to have some fun! :D
151312111.title: It Tears

choices: change him also into a girl
1513121112.content: Now you know that it is certainly time for some revenge on Trevor…
1513121112.title: Sabotage Trevor with a wish!

choices: Continue from the outage - more changes
15131212.content:
The moment Mom exits the living room dramatically, the lights flicker and go off on cue. And the entire house plunges into a bout of pitch darkness. At first, you suspect it's Mom who's purposely dolling this out as punishment. But when you finish mentally countdown-ing from five to zero - and the darkness hasn't lifted, it occurs to you that something isn't right.

What's going on?

Trevor's the first to scream of course. Well, at least he quit singing. But when his shrieks get shriller and shriller, you begin to prefer his singing.

"Power Outage!" Mom yells frantically from the second story. "Mike! Get the torches and candles out!"

Dad's completely prepared. It's as though he's been training for years already. Professionally, he zips to the kitchen to dig the stuff out, faster than Trevor can say 'Barney' (and mind you, that's hard, especially if you can't tell the difference between your fingers and your toes in the darkness).

Mom finds out a way to get her sweet revenge. "Nate, quit standing there!" She orders. "Help your Dad out!"

"Got it, Mom," you groan reluctantly.

Hey, that's no fair. Trevor's job is easier, considering he's just sitting on couch yelling his lungs sore. And that's pretty easy.

You stumble in the pitch darkness, tripping over some of Trevor's cars and trucks, and slipping over your younger sister, Nicole's puzzle pieces. Oh gosh! The pain's intoxicating! Especially Trevor's fire truck. Ouch! That one probably caused a big dent on the sole of your foot.

If Mom intended to torture you, she definitely succeeded.

You finally reach the kitchen at last, after clearing all the obstacles in your path. Dad's already in there with Erin, ransacking through the cupboards for the torches and candles.

"Err... Need any help?" You ask the duo.

In the distance, Trevor howls like a lonesome wolf. Everyone turns in the direction of the sound.

"Nah, we've enough people already," Dad finally replies half-heartedly. "You should go on out and keep Trevor company."

WHAT? You'd wasted your effort overcoming mountains and valleys to get here... WHAT THE...?

You scowl back furiously. "I'm staying! I don't care!"

"Geez Nate, chill off," Erin snorts.

"Mom made me come here!"

"Whatever," Erin replies nonchalantly. "Fine, you help out Dad while I'll go tend to Trevor. Don't forget, you owe me a favour, alright?"

You roll your eyes. Favour, favour, favour - hadn't Erin learnt anything from Church? Didn't look like it, you know. So you don't reply. Owing Erin a favour is almost as bad as keeping Trevor company. She really knows how to use her favours.

But... keeping Trevor company is still the utmost worst.

"Okay, okay," you finally decide irritably.

Erin grins evilly, and you begin to regret your decision. She's probably already thinking of a million and one ways of using the favour against you. You sigh - life is unfair. Erin flashes another triumphant smirk before stumbling to her feet and groping her way out of the kitchen.

Unlucky you.

She crashes right smack into you, sending you sprawling chest-flat on the stupid floor.

"Erin-" you start to yell. But then, something else catches your attention. It's the uneven feeling between your chest and the floor. Is the floor... uneven? Can't be, right? I mean - it's a floor for goodness sake!

Well, so at least you've cleared that possibility. But if the floor's flat... that means your chest is the uneven one... But how... But how...

Oh crap, remember your Mom's wish?
15131212.title: Turn into a woman (over time? or instantly?)

151321.content:
Nate's friend Tommy had made off with the candies, snickering to himself all the way as he headed away from the house back to his own. "How dumb was he to leave these out where anyone could take it." he mutters to himself as he pulls a wad of hundred dollar bills in his hand.

Having used up one of the twenty candies in the bag for the wad of money he now possesed as a test to see if they really work, he counts how many are left inside. "Nineteen left. I wonder what I should use them on." he says to himself as he walks into his house, making sure to pocket the candies where no one can see them.

He heads up into his room, passing by his older sister who was sitting on the couch watching some dumb reality show on MTV while his mom is in the kitchen reading a book.

Once inside, he makes sure to close his door and lock it before taking the candies out of his pocket and setting them on the bed. "I wonder what I should wish for next." he muses as he starts looking around his room for inspiration.

He's not able to find anything right away but soon his eyes lock on to a picture of the actress Ellen Page. "I know just the wish now." he says as he pulls a candie out of the bag and puts it in his mouth. "I wish that Ellen Page was my best friend and girlfriend." he says.

Little does he know that due to the way he worded the wish, his best friend would slowly be altered into turning into Ellen Page. And his best friend just happens to be...
151321.title: Tommy

1513211.content:
As Nate was looking through his house for the candies, he feels a small tingle go down his spine, causing him to stand straight up and look ahead. After a few moments he shakes his head and refocuses himself. "Gotta worry about finding those candies." he says as he keeps looking.

Meanwhile, Tommy kept looking at the poster of Ellen Page that he kept in his room. "Soon I'll have the girlfriend I've always wanted." he says to himself. For the longest time, he had always had a crush on Ellen but he was realistic, he knew that he'd never have someone like her.

But then he glanced at the candies and smiled. "And with these, I can finally have her as my girlfriend along with anything else I could've ever wanted." he says to himself as he decides to fire up his Xbox and start playing one of his games.

Back at Nate's house, he was starting to get extremely frustrated that he couldn't find the candies, the thought of someone taking them not even crossing his mind yet as he searches his room yet again. As he's looking through it, things start to vanish in there such as some of his more personal belongings, leaving the room to appear less full than it normally does.

And this is where the changes to Nate begins although they're small at first. His age jumps up a bit to just 17 years old but since it's a minor change, he doesn't notice it yet. But he does notice that the room seems a little bit different. What is his reaction to this?
1513211.title: Nate

choices: He Sees Nate in His Head
15132112.content:
Nate immediately notices that something is wrong with his room as it looks like that he's missing some of his belongings. "Just what is going on here?" he asks aloud as he scans his room so he can get a better grasp of what's going on.

However, he feels a nagging voice in the back of his head telling him that things are normal this way but since his current personality and memories are the strongest right now, he quickly pushes this voice to the back of his head, unaware that it's going to be coming back with a vengeace later on.

Nate heads back down to his living room where his family is watching a movie. "Do any of you know where that bag of candies are at?" he asks to which they all turn to face him and shake their heads.

He just groans in frustration as he decides to leave the house and take a walk to clear his head. As he starts walking out in front of his house, he starts to walk in a feminine manner, placing one foot in front of the other in long, graceful strides which causes his hips to sway back and forth. 'Why am I walking like that?' he thinks to himself.

He tries to walk normally but for some reason he can't seem to break that motion. Meanwhile back at Tommy's house, he's getting very anxious about his new girlfriend-to-be. "I got an idea." he says as he puts a candy in his mouth. "I wish to know where my girlfriend is." he says leaving 18 candies left.

What happens because of this wish?
15132112.title: Remain Calm

151321121.content:
Tommy is very much confused as he sees an image of Nate appearing inside of his head as he's walking down the street. "That's odd, I wonder why it showed me Nate, shouldn't I be seeing where Ellen Page is at?" he asks himself when an idea comes to his head.

He puts another candie in his mouth, dropping the count to 17. "I wish to know why I'm seeing Nate in my head as opposed to my future girlfriend Ellen Page. He felt the candie tingle in his mouth and his eyes widened upon learning the truth. "Nate's turning into Ellen?" he asks incredulously.

It would appear that is indeed so as he notices that the image of Nate inside of his head starts to slowly begin altering. His brown hair gets a little bit darker as it lengthens down to his ears. It stops there for now but Tommy knows that it won't stay that way for long.

However Tommy is not the least bit concerned as now he knows that he still will have his best friend as his girlfriend. "Nothing left to do now but sit back and watch the show." he says smiling as he continues playing his video game.

Nate was continuing his walk and noticed his hair brushing his ears. "Ok now this is getting really weird." he says as he brings his hand up to brush his hair away. "I've really gotta get back home and check this out." he says as he turns around and begins heading back to his house.
151321121.title: He Sees Nate in His Head

1513211211.content:
Nate walks in the front door of his house and starts to head to the bathroom, his dad noticed his quick return. "That was a pretty quick walk. Something happen?" he asks as he turns around to face him and notices something odd about him. "What's up with your hair? It looks a little darker and longer." he says while waiting for his wife and daughter to return from the kitchen.

Nate shrugs his shoulders. "That's what I'm going to get checked out now." he says as he walks into the bathroom.

This little altercation didn't go unnoticed by Tommy. "Uh oh, looks like someone is catching on to what's going on, can't let them interfere." he says as he picks up a candie. "What to wish for now." he says as he tries to think of just what he wants to wish for.

Suddenly an idea pops into his head and he throws one into his mouth. As he does this, Nate heads into the bathroom. Once Nate's inside, the changes occur to him even further as his tennis shoes conform tight to his feet. "Ouch." he says as he looks down at his normally white tennis shoes and notices something odd. "Are they darker?" he asks aloud.

Meanwhile, Tommy speaks his wish. "I wish that Nate's dad was right here in front of me." he says as he swallows the candie. Suddenly, Nate's dad Mike appears right in front of him. "I think I'm going to have fun with this has he holds one of the sixteen remaining candies.
1513211211.title: Back Home

15132112111.content:
Mike is very much confused as to what's going on and why he's in the bedroom of his son's best friend. "Tommy what is going on here?" he asks hoping that the young man has some idea as to the strange happenings that have been going on that day.

The only answer he gets from Mike is a devilish grin as he places a candie in his mouth. "I wish that you were a cheerleader at school. And not just any cheerleader but the most ditzy, air-headed cheerleader in school as well as the most popular girl there." he says.

Mike is more confused than ever upon hearing this but when he feels a tingling go through his body and he sees that he's wearing a cheerleading outfit as his age was getting younger, all the way down to seventeen. His long blonde hair trails to the middle of his back framing a pretty face with large blue eyes and pouty lips.

The body that's contained inside the outfit is one of the perfect feminine beauty, curves like a coke bottle and breasts about ready to burst out of her cheerleading top. And on the right shoulder is the name embroidered into it which reads 'Trish.'

Trish shakes her head sending her long blonde locks flittering back and forth. "Like, why am I here and not at practice?" she asks.

Mike just smiles at this. "Oh you were here so I could help you with your homework." he says as he notices her new books laying on his bed.
15132112111.title: With Tommy and Mike

151321121111.content:
Trish lets out a playful and feminine giggle. "Oh yea like, that's right. My totally lame parents said if I don't get my grades up, they'll like, take me off the cheerleading squad." she complains as if that's the worst thing in the world that could happen to her.

Tommy shakes his head in mock sympathy for the young lady's plight. "Don't worry, I'll make sure you pass your class." he says as he sets about tutoring her and helping with her homework.

Meanwhile back at Nate's house, Nate was still looking at himself in the mirror wondering just why he was changing. "Maybe someone has the candies and is making strange wishes." he says to himself but shakes his head. "No, it's gotta be something else." he reasons.

He exits the bathroom and goes into the living room to find his dad. "You in here dad?" he asks as he sees that his dad is gone. "That's weird." he says as he shrugs his shoulders and heads back out to continue his walk to clear his head out.

As Nate continues his walk, the changes to him continue as well. His legs begin to extend, adding a couple of inches to his height. The legs themselves start to take on a more shapely, toned appearance as if he spent a lot of time making sure they looked as lean and fit as possible.

But then something happens as Nate is walking
151321121111.title: Doing Homework

choices: Alter the Rest of Nate's Family
1513211211111.content:
Nate continues walking as he sees a long black limosine drive past before it hits the brakes. "That's weird, I wonder why it stopped." he mutters as he keeps walking.

But then something strange happens as he sees the limosine's reverse lights coming on as it begins backing up towards him. "Now what's going on?" he asks as he tries to keep ignoring it.

However this ignorance of the limo cannot continue as someone in the backseat rolls down the window to yell at him. "Hey what are you doing walking around out here Nate, get back in here." a man dressed in a suit yells at him.

Nate's about to tell this guy that he has the wrong person when he feels that voice in the back of his head telling him he needs to get into the limo. It's a little bit stronger this time and he finds himself compelled to obey it as the man inside opens the door and he steps inside.

With Nate inside the limo the changes continue on him further as his socks completely vanish, leaving his feet bare except for his shoes which look like they're falling apart as the sides fall away and vanish along with the toe part of it them which takes on a point.

Meanwhile, Tommy finished up his lesson with Trish as she headed home. "Like thanks again Tommy, I'll be sure to like, come see you again if I need more help." she says as she walks away.

Tommy has a twinkle in his eye as he holds the bag of candies. "What next?" he asks himself.
1513211211111.title: A Limo Pulls Up

15132112111111.content:
Many thoughts are racing through Tommy's head as he awaits the eventual arrival of his soon-to-be girlfriend who is Nate who is slowly becoming Ellen Page. As all this had happened, the original Ellen Page vanished off the face of the Earth for her replacement to take her place.

And that's when an idea comes to his head. "I got fifteen candies here left which gives me plenty of wishes to use upon the rest of his family and give them much better lives, well ones I'd think are better anyway." He says to himself before popping a candy in his mouth.

Meanwhile back in the limo, Nate is inside, still confused as to why he was invited inside in the first place as well as the voice that was urging him to go inside. "So what exactly do you need me for and who are you?" Nate asks as his voice slips up an octave. 'Gotta get some water later on.' he thinks to himself.

The man inside the limo is busy chatting away on his cellphone, not paying much attention to Nate's question. When he's finally done, he hangs up his phone. "Are you ok Nate? How could you not recognize your agent Howard Silverstein?" he asks.

Nate knows he's never seen this man before in his life but something in his head was telling him that this guy did work for him, helping him get various gigs but even that was still fuzzy for him.

Tommy had finally decided where he was going next with the rest of Nate's family. "Yea this is gonna be a lot of fun." he says to himself. Who does he go with next?
15132112111111.title: Alter the Rest of Nate's Family

151321121111111.content:
Tommy decided to do some stuff to Nate's younger sister Nicole but he was having some trouble deciding what he wanted to do with her. "This is a little bit harder than I thought." he says to himself while still sucking on the candie.

It doesn't take much longer for an idea to pop up into his head which brings a bright smile to his face. "This will be perfect." he mutters before speaking his wish. "I wish that Nate's sister Nicole would become also turn into a random celebrity." he says.

With the time it took him to decide what he wanted to do with Nicole, he barely was able to make the wish before the candie dissolved, leaving only 14 left in the bag.

Once the wish was made, there was an occurence going on in Hollywood, California. One of the most well-known actresses, Anne Hathaway, was having an interview being done when suddenly, her good looks and acting talent seemed to vanish and she wandered off the set, wondering why she'd be in a place like this. The newly minted Talia Garner went back to cleaning the equipment to get ready for the interview that was going to happen later on.

As Nicole was in her room watching an old rerun of My Little Pony, she suddenly vanished from her room only to reappear on the set that the former actress was sitting at. "What's going on?" she asked aloud, undoubtedly confused about the situation.

Back in the limo, Nate was having a hard time trying to remember who this Howard Silverstein guy was as his pantlegs start to slowly retreat up his legs, stopping just at his shins.
151321121111111.title: Nicole

1513211211111111.content:
Just as when it seemed like Nate was going to give up trying to figure out how Howard knew him, the voice in the back of his head pushes to the forefront, giving him the knowledge that he needed. "I'm sorry Howard, I don't know how I could've forgotten something that important." he says.

Even though he was able to remember his agent Howard, something still didn't feel right about this to Nate and he was trying to figure out just what it was. However Howard didn't give him much of a chance to reflect on this. "Ok Nate, the premier is in five hours so we have to get you looking your best." he says.

Nate was no doubt a little bit confused by the premier that Howard mentioned. 'Isn't that something celebrities attend?' he thinks to himself as his arms start to get a little bit longer, reaching adult proportions but remaining small and delicate and very much ladylike with little or no hair on them.

Back on the interview set, the time it's taking Nicole to try to realize what's going on with her is cut off when the person sitting in the chair across from her is speaking. "So Ms. Hathaway, how do you feel about this latest movie?" the person asks.

Nicole is very confused by what this man is asking when she looks down at herself and sees that gone are her normal clothes and in their place is a gorgeous, sleeveless silver dress that comes up to her armpits and that her body has gotten tall enough to fit in it. "Oh um..." she starts trailing off.
1513211211111111.title: He Remembers

15132112111111111.content:
Just before the newly minted Nicole Hathaway answers the question, a bright smile appears on her full, red lips as her brilliant eyes twinkle underneath the light. "I thought it turned out very well. The rest of the cast was awesome and we had a great crew." she says.

However Nicole can't believe she just answered the way she did as she has no idea what made her answer that way. Almost as if someone else took control and spoke for her. Her hair got longer before styling itself in a bun on top of her head as her aged jumped all the way to twenty-seven.

"So are you excited for the premier of your new movie tonight?" the director asks as Nicole's face morphs into an exact duplicate of the former Anne's. Puberty hits her quickly as she gains all the curves she needs to be a fully grown woman that she now is. She has just a little bit of trouble keeping her feet still in her new high heels but she manages to get it down eventually.

Back in the limo, Harry was going over the day planner for where they were going to stop first. "First thing we need to do is stop for some lunch. Then we're going to do a little bit of shopping for you followed by a trip to the gym as by then your stomach should be settled enough for a light workout, and then we're gonna get you cleaned up at the spa and you'll be all ready." he says.

Nate just nods his head at this as he starts to feel a small weight building up on his hips. 'Maybe hitting the gym won't be a bad idea at all.' he thinks to himself as his hips gain a few inches although they're far from their final destination.
15132112111111111.title: I Think It's Great

151321121111111111.content:
With their plan for the day decided upon, Howard pulls up a map on his smartphone to see where a good place for them to stop at for lunch would be. "There's gotta be something around here that's pretty decent." he says.

Nate's about to speak up about what his favorite restaurant is when he starts drawing a blank which leaves a confused look on his face. A look that Howard is quickly able to pick up on. "Is something wrong Nate?" he asks in concern for his client.

Nate sits back in his seat and shakes his head. "No it's nothing at all, thought I had something in my head I wanted to say but I forgot what it was." he says wondering why he blanked out all of a sudden.

Little did he know that he was beginning to forget a lot about this town, almost as if he didn't live here anymore which was slowly becoming a reality for the young man as his age jumped even higher to twenty-one years old.

Back with Nicole, the smiling young actress was more than eager to ask the last question that was given to her by the interviewer. "I'm very excited, I can't wait to see what the rest of Hollywood thinks of my latest movie." she says excitedly as the last of her mental changes kick in. The former Nicole Wilson, now the lovely Anne Hathaway can't wait to get to the premier of her latest movie with her closest friends and collegues.

Meanwhile, Tommy noticed that this latest wish had run it's course and decided to pick another family member to make a wish on. "Who should I choose now?" he asks as he looks at the fourteen remaining candies.
151321121111111111.title: Lunch Time

1513211211111111111.content:
Tommy picks up one of the candies as he decides on making his next target Lynda. "Now what to do with her." he ponders as he holds the candie in his hand, plenty of ideas going through his head but having no idea on how to pick one.

Back on the interview set, the new Anne Hathaway finished her interview before getting into her limo to head to her own premier which was seperate from the one that Nate was going to later on. As she got into her limo, she felt something was a little off, a little different than before. "Maybe this is a new day for me and I can be a bit of a different person.' she thinks to herself as she wonders about maybe hanging it up as an actress and doing something else with her life.

Meanwhile, Nate and Howard had finally found a place for them to eat lunch at thanks to the limo driver's knowledge of the area as it's his job to drive around the area constantly. They settled on an upscale Chinese restaurant which made Nate excited since he had never been there before but always wanted to go but couldn't because his family couldn't afford it so when they wanted Chinese, they ate at one of the lower class places.

'This is gonna be so cool finally being able to go in here.' he thinks to himself. Thoughts of having fried chicken and fried rice invading his mind. But suddenly the thought of eating anything fried starts to make his stomach turn. 'Maybe I'll have something that's grilled or steamed instead.' he decides.

Back at Tommy's house, he finally made his decision as he put a candie into his mouth, bringing the count down to thirteen. "I wish that Nate's mom Lynda..."
1513211211111111111.title: Lynda

15132112111111111111.content:

Signs of age sloped downwards, stopping at about 24. The hair on his head grew to about shoulder's length and retained Mike's original, brown hair color. He closed his eyes, and, upon opening them, his eyes were no longer blue, but a hazelnut-like color. Next, his features, skin and such, became very soft and warm. And, finally, his 'male members' departed and were replaced with 'female parts.' He was now a she.

She closed her eyes, and opened them slowly. She batted her eyes and looked about the strange room.

"Where in the world am I?" She asked in her sweet, soft-spoken voice.

She looked down and beheld Tommy, one of her students.

"Tommy? Where am I? What's going on?" She asked.

"Oh, Ms. Belle, you don't recall?" Tommy asked with innocence. "You were just here tutoring me for that test on friday. You know I'm not really all that good with math.

Suddenly, Mike, or, rather, Sandra Belle recalled it all. "Oh, now I remember! I'm so sorry, Hon! It must've slipped my mind."

"It's fine, Ms. Belle, it happens."

"Oh please, Tommy, no need to be so formal! We're not in school or anything" Ms. Belle chirped sweetly. "Please, just call me Sandra!"

"One down, the rest of his family to go..." Tommy thought, sinisterly.
1513211211221.title: "I wish that you were a new, young, outgoin...

15132112112212.title: Tommy targets another member of Nate's fami...

151321121122122.content:
"See you later, Tommy!" Sandra Belle called out while heading to her new red 2012 Corvette, which had previously been a 1994 pickup truck a mere hour ago.

"Bye, Sandra!" Tommy shouted back with a wide grin on his face. Man, if he got to spend the rest of the school year with that, school might just be worth it. Hell, maybe he could skip school entirely. All it would cost was a single candy...

He looked down at the candy in his palm. Should he use this for himself or one of Nate's family?

'Well, messing with other people's life roles was kind of fun,' Tommy thought to himself. 'Come to think of it, with Nate as my celebrity girlfriend, I would be short one best friend. But who would best fit the bill?'

He thought for a while, until a certain memory popped up in his mind. Nate's mother, Lynda Wilson, always came between the two whenever Tommy wanted to stay at Nate's a little longer or vice versa. She even called his parents on him after a mere two minutes of warning. Perhaps it would be fun to make her his new best friend.

The devilish teenager popped the candy into his mouth. "I wish Nate's mom was right in front of me." Then, in a bright flash, Lynda Wilson was looking around confusingly before looking straight at Tommy.

"Tommy Iverson, what am I doing here?" she asked in confusion, yet still seathing with contempt.

"I've already given my whole speach to your husband, I mean Ms. Belle, so I'm not even going to bother you with an explanation." The teenager sat down on his couch, pulled out two X-Box controllers and popped a candy in his mouth. "Please, take a seat, Ms. Wilson."

"I believe you mean Mrs. Wilson, Mister Iverson."

"You'd believe that to be true, wouldn't you? You know, you really need to take a load off, Ms. Wilson. I bet we'd be able to get along very easily. Maybe even be best friends." He widened his grin even further at the confused but nontheless furious woman. "I do wish you were my best friend."
151321121122122.title: Lynda, Nate's mom

1513211211221221.content:
"Well, Mister Iverson, you can wish alot of things. But that doesn't mean they'll happen, young man." The 36 year old woman and mother smugly told the teenage boy before her. Lynda never thought all too highly of the boy called Tommy Iverson. She thought him to be only trouble, and, in that, she never did approve of her son, Nate, spending so much time with him. Lynda actually believed him to be the spawn of the devil himself.

"I beg to differ, Ms. Wilson." Tommy replied blankly

"You know I'm a married woman, Tommy!" Lynda shot furiously. "Why do you keep calling me 'Ms?'"

"Oh, so I can see you don't know of what's become of your husband..."

"What did you do to him, you little punk?"

Tommy, upon hearing those words, took another suck of the candy and wished again, "I wish Lynda Wilson knew what happened to her husband."

Lynda gave a strange look to Tommy, but suddenly, her eyes went wide. Several images flashed before her eyes. First, she saw Tommy wish Mike, her husband, into his room. Next, she saw Tommy pop a candy in his mouth and heard him make a wish. Finally, she saw the man once her husband become a youthful, pretty young woman. He, or rather she, didn't even know who she was! She, the woman once Mike, thought herself a brand new woman! Lynda, with that, knew everything, and exploded into tears.

"You, terrible, terrible boy! What have you done to my hus-!" Lynda was suddenly cut off by a most peculiar feeling that shot through all about her body. It was beginning. She then remembered Tommy's wish. Her petite, womanly height, first off, shot from 5'4" to 5'6". Her shapely legs and slender arms became more masculine and bulky. Her smooth, shapely legs grew more muscle about them, and hair sprouted from every which way. Her feet grew in size, as well, also growing hair. Her arms, they became the slightest bit shorter and stubbier, also erupting hair and muscle. Her breasts essentially vanished, and, her chest sprouted even more hair and became significantly stronger. Her long brown hair shrank drastically, leaving behind a cut fitting for a teenage boy. Around her throat erupted an Adam's apple. Her face grew more masculine, all womanly features rapidly fading, though more youthful at the same time. Her blue eyes remained constant. All this was followed by the most drastic of changes. She became a he. Finally, her, or his, clothes from a womanly dress and flats to a pair of blue jeans, a tee shirt sporting a video-game logo of some sort about it, and a pair of black sneakers.

The boy closed his eyes, and kept them shut for but a few seconds before reopening them and happily greeting his friend, Tommy.

"Hey, Bro! How ya doing?" Lenny Atkins greeted, with his masculine voice, walking up to Tommy, providing him an intricate hand-shake.

"Just, fine, Len, just fine. Take a seat, let's play some X-Box."

"Sounds great, Man! Y'know, I can't help but feel a little off today, not myself... Maybe some X-Box with my best bud will fix that!" Lenny exclaimed.

"Maybe it will." Said Tommy blankly. "Maybe it will."
1513211211221221.title: Lynda

15132112112212211.content:
The two teenage boys continued to play video games while talking about regular high school stuff. Hot chicks, upcoming parties, the hot new teacher, Sandra Belle. Tommy seemed to really like that subject. By the sound of things, Lenny was every bit as unpopular as his friend. The thought of still being unpopular despite being in possession of all-powerful wish candies left a sour taste in his mouth. However, after about two straight hours of marothoning, the two best friends started to feel hungry.

"Man, do you have any food around here, bro?" Lenny asked his friend, not taking his eyes off the game.

Tommy laughed a bit before pausing the game and taking the jar of candies. "Well, I bet these'll help."

"You're kidding, right? I need real food, man!"

"Well, Lenny, what would you say if I could get us some food and a hot chick?"

"I'd say you're lying. Dude, just go in the kitchen and pop some popcorn or something!" Lenny was starting to get impatient. "We can talk about hot chicks later, but let's try to focus on food for right now, okay?"

"Very well then," Tommy responded while getting up to go to the kitchen with the candies in hand. When he was certain he was all alone, he took out candy and popped it in his mouth. "I wish Trevor Wilson was here."

Suddenly, Nate's younger brother was in front of the teenager with a confused look on his face. "Tommy, what's going on here? Do you know where my parents or Nate is? I haven't find them all day!"

The older boy laughed at the younger's statement. Not only was he too young for proper grammar, he also had no ideas of what was going on with his family. Should he make their position known to the boy? Nah. He was too young to comprehend it enough to get a fun reaction.

"Trevor," Tommy started to talk. "You've always wanted to play with me and your brother, correct?"

"Yeah..." he answered confused. His expression lightened up a couple seconds later. "Wait, you mean I finally get to play with y'all?!"

"Nope. You get to watch as your mother and I play and you serve us."

"Wait, what about my mom?"

"I wish you were my family's foreign maid."
15132112112212211.title: Tommy continues changing Nate's family...

choices: 'Lenny' wonders what just happened? Where'd the maid come from?
151321121122122111.content:
"Wait! Tommy-san! You must tell me what you've done of my mother!" Trevor pleaded to Tommy, his speech pattern changing without his knowing, and, his already poor English becoming more so.

7 year-old Trevor didn't quite understand Nate and Tommy sometimes. Trevor looked up to both of them! He thought they were so cool! Yet, most of the time, they were only jerks to him. Not inviting him to play with them, and, if Nate or Tommy did invite, it was only for the shortest of times. And, even then, he was only invited to retrieve them drinks when their 'lazy-butts,' as Trevor described it, couldn't, or wouldn't, do it themselves. But, even though he was only invited for service, Trevor enjoyed it no less. It was a little time with some boys he looked up to, and, hey, he always loved to lend a helping hand.

"Well, since you won't remember in a few seconds anyway, I'll tell you of your mother, father and brother. Your mother is, or was the boy sitting next to me. You will refer to him as 'Lenny-san.' Your father i've turned from your father into a young adult woman with a bright future ahead of her. So, don't be too sad on his loss. Finally, your brother, well, he's becoming the girl of my dreams, Ellen Page." Tommy explained, in a manner almost condescending.

"WHAT?!?!?!" Trevor freaked out. How could all those things have happened? Had he really just heard that? That his mom is now a teenage boy, like Nate and Tommy. That his father was now a big girl, a lady teacher, like the nice ones he has at school. And that his brother was turning into a girl whose name he's heard on TV and movies before. Could all these things really have happened?

"You serious, Tommy-san?" Trevor asked, his speech altering further.

"Every word." Tommy answered.

Just then, whether or not the things Tommy described were true, Trevor began to feel... Weird. It began. A most peculiar chill ran up Trevor's spine, this chill caused Trevor to stand completely straight as his body twisted and contorted. As his body spasmed, his eyes were forced shut and his height transitioned from 3'8" to about 5'3" in seconds time. As his height grew, his body became evenly proportioned. His legs grew taller, his arms longer, his hands and feet just the slightest bit bigger. Whilst this happened, his arms and legs lost the little muscle he had and left his arms and legs long and slender, especially his legs. His muscle was instead replaced with a womanly fat that mainly went to his chest, hips and legs, particularly the thighs. His face contorted and particular features changed: His eyes became almond-shaped and slightly slanted. His adam's apple vanished, leaving him a high-pitched feminine voice.

Speaking of eyes, they changed from his blue to that of a caramel color. His white skin became significantly more pale in color and appearance. His short, dark-brown hair lightened up in color, becoming light-brown and grew notably longer, to where his hair went slightly past the shoulders. Finally, his 'male members,' were replaced with a fully functional reproduction system of a healthy 22-year old woman. As a final touch, his, or rather, her jeans, t-shirt and tennis shoes became a french-maid outfit. Her shirt became a black and white blouse, and, her jeans, they fashioned them self into a matching, mid-thigh length skirt. Her ankle length socks became socks of the knee length, and looked more like leggings than socks. Finally, her tennis-shoes fashioned themselves into a white pair of ballet flats that fit her dainty, feminine feet like a charm.

It was done.

Just then, the 22-year-old Yoko Sato slowly opened her eyes. When her eyes were finally opened, she batted them, as if just awoken from a rather long slumber. She looked around confusedly and kept on doing that until her name was called by a familiar voice.

"Yoko!" Tommy called to his family's Japanese maid.

"Yes, Tommy-san? What you need?" Yoko asked, anxious to help, her English flawed. She was still attempting to become accustomed to the language. After all, she had just moved to the U.S.A from Japan less than a year ago.

"Can you make Lenny and I here a couple of sandwiches?" Tommy asked.

"Yes, Tommy-san! I get that right away!" Yoko said, tending to the son of her master's needs.

Just then, Yoko heard another call, a woman's voice, erupting from downstairs, to be specific, the kitchen.

"Yoko! Can you help me with the dishes?" Joan, Tommy's mom called to their maid.

"Yes, Master! I help!"

"Yoko! You can just call me Joan!" Joan replied.

"Ok, Joan-san!"

And, with that, Yoko rushed to her aid, and, after which, to retrieve her young master some food. She just loved lending a helping hand where needed. Especially the Iverson's. After all, they did pay for Yoko's transportation from Japan to the U.S. So, why wouldn't she help?

Yoko was busy, swamped, even. And she loved it.
151321121122122111.title: Trevor

choices: Kate comes over to the Wilson house
1513211211221221111.content:
(Yoko Sato: http://farm7.static.flickr.com/6215/6308... )

"Here you go, Tommy-san, Lenny-san. I make sandwiches!" Yoko announced to the two lounging teenagers.

"Cool!" Lenny shouted while accepting the grilled cheese and observing the foreign maid with delight. Man, Tommy was lucky.

"Don't get too excited, man," Tommy teased to his best friend. "She's a little out of you range."

"You mean you think she's out of my league?"

"I meant she's out of everything of yours. Your league, your age, your price range. Everything, basically."

"Shut up, man!" Lenny said while punching his friend's shoulder. "What do you have to compare anyway? The only person who even seems to have an interest in you is that little girl, Erin Wilson."

"Say what?" This was genuinely new to Tommy. Did Nate's thirteen years old sister really have a crush on him? He didn't know whether he should be appalled or delighted. Imagine the fun he could have with this information! "What makes you say that?"

"Dude, are you freakin' blind? Whenever she's anywhere around us, she turns pink and stammers. Man, you are blind!"

'Huh, Erin was always like that around me, wasn't she?' Tommy thought to himself. 'Well, I suppose she does have good taste, I'll give her that. Perhaps she deserves something nice. Well, her brother is about to become my celebrity girlfriend, so I suppose I have no need for lower girls. Sure, I like that cheerleader, Janet Day, but she's no Ellen Paige. Though, she really could use a boyfriend...'

"Lenny, I'll be in the bathroom. Don't look at Yoko for too long while I'm away."

"How much time is inappropriate?" the teenager joked, but to a nonexistant audience. Apparently, Tommy really needed to use the bathroom. "Oh well, at least I can help myself to hi-DAMMIT! Who takes candies with them in the bathroom?!"

Meanwhile, Tommy was busy in the bathroom formulating his wish. He had to word this perfectly. Nate turning into Ellen Paige was just a pleasant accident. The next time couldn't be as satisfying. He could just wish Erin here and wish on her then like he's been doing, but there was no reason for her to be here. Besides, it's not like him and Lenny need a third wheel right now.

Maybe she could change by herself and he could just watch. But then he couldn't break the news about her family to her. That was the best part! Well, maybe she could just find out for herself. Okay, Tommy was sure he was ready now.

"I wish Erin Wilson would learn of her family's transformations before turning into Janet Day's ideal boyfriend while I can mentally watch." There, done. Nothing more to do than enjoy the show.
1513211211221221111.title: Tommy continues changing Nate's family...

151321122.content:
Poor Nate still unaware about the wishes of his friend Tommy suddenly walked to his friends house and rings the bell.
Tommy opens and knows the very same moment that Nate will be his girlfriend, Ellen Page in some moments…
151321122.title: go over to Tommy

15133.content:
Nate had walked out into his living room to see who might've taken the candies. He had a few friends there but he wasn't sure which one of them might know something about where they are.

He looked around the room to see who might know something when he decided to start with a female friend, but which one would it be?
15133.title: female friend

151331.content:
The first one he decided on was of course his personal crush Kate. "Hey Kate I was wondering if you had seen a bag of candies about this big." he said as he demonstrated the size of the bag with his hands.

Kate thought about it for a moment but then shook her head. "Sorry Nate but I don't think I have. If I do see them I'll be sure to let you know." she replies.

Nate just nods his head. "Ok cool thanks." he says as he continues going on his search for them.

Once he was out of sight, Kate grinned evily to herself as she popped one of candies from the bag that was hidden in her pocket into her mouth. "I wish that Nate would slowly become my mother." she says quietly before swallowing the candy.

After it went down her through, she began thinking to herself. 'And here's my gift to you Nate, the gift of motherhood.'
151331.title: Kate

1513311.content:
Nate continued asking some of the other people in the house if they had seen them but just like Kate, or so he thought, no one had seen any sign of them either. 'Maybe they're up in my room.' he thinks to himself.

On his way up the stairs, he feels like the room is getting smaller. 'That's certainly weird.' he thinks to himself as he reaches the top of the steps and starts walking down the hall towards his room.

If Nate had a chance to really get a look at what had happened, he would've seen that he shot up just a few small inches in height, making him about 5'8" and it would stop there.
1513311.title: With Nate

15133111.content:
Now that he was out of sight from everyone else, he was able to be more frantic in his desperate search for the candies which could cause trouble if fallen into the wrong hands and little did he know that he had already fallen into that trap.

He pulled open all of his dresser drawers, checked under every object that was covering something, even dug through every nook and cranny in his closet but still came up empty. "They didn't just get up and walk out." he says to himself.

While he was searching his room, he didn't realize how his arms had become much much slimmer as well as feminine and dainty.

"Damn, looks like I'm going to have to look for them tomorrow since it's almost bed time." he says to himself.
15133111.title: Searching His Room

151331111.content:
Deciding to continue the search in the morning, Nate heads into the bathroom to get himself cleaned up and ready for bed. He brushes his teeth and due to them being covered by the toothpaste, he is unable to see how they are now much brighter and straighter, giving him a perfect smile.

He proceeds to then wash his face, getting it nice and clean so that without having any dirt on it, he knows he won't get any blemishes or zits which are common for a boy who's going through puberty.

At last he runs a comb through his hair and as he does so, he seems to notice that it's a little bit longer. "Looks like I need a haircut sooner than I thought." he says to himself. In reality, his brown hair had gotten longer, just down to his ears.

Now that he's all ready, he heads back into his room and climbs into bed, getting ready for a good night's sleep. Or does he?
151331111.title: Bedtime

1513311111.content:
That night though, his sleep was not all that easy to obtain as he was having strange dreams. The most notable of one, involved him hanging around a grown man that looked eerily like Kate's father. In it, he was a grown woman and this man seemed to be really interested in him.

And it was during this dream that he suddenly felt himself kissing this man which quickly made him wake up in a cold sweat. "That was weird, I know it's not real, yet it felt real." he says to himself as he looks around his room.

He takes a few minutes to catch his breath before laying back down and going to sleep, hoping that he won't have another strange dream like that again that would interrupt his rest. Does he?
1513311111.title: Dream

15133111112.content:
Much to his relief, Nate doesn't have anymore of those weird dreams which makes his evening sleep much easier and less fitful.

The next morning Nate wakes up and yawns, not noticing the slight rise in pitch of his voice as he does so. He steps out of bed and heads to the bathroom for his morning relief when, without realizing it due to feeling groggy and a little out of it, sits down on the toilet to do his business. 'Must be more tired than I thought.' he thinks to himself.

When he's done relieving himself, he does something he doesn't even realize he's doing as he wipes himself off in a feminine manner. "Well, I don't like anything leftover." he says to himself.

He then heads back into his room to get his clothes so he can get a shower and start his day.
15133111112.title: No

151331111121.content:
With his clothes in hand, Nate returns to the bathroom with the intent of taking a shower and getting himself cleaned up. He sets his white t-shirt, blue jeans, white socks, and white tennis shoes on the counter for him to get dressed into when he's done.

He then removes his pajamas and tosses them into the hamper, leaving him naked and ready to get cleaned up as he heads towards the tub. However he starts to have ideas of taking a bath rather than a shower.

'It's been years since I took a bath since showers are more practical.' he thinks to himself but then starts to remember how much he enjoys relaxing in the warm water of the bath.

What does he decide to do?
151331111121.title: Shower

1513311111212.content:
After he debates his options with himself in his head, he decides that he'll take a bath and savor the relaxation. He runs the water and plugs the hole up so the water will fill the tub.

While he waits for the tub to fill up, his entire body frame becomes much more slender and delicate, befitting of the woman he's about to become. And then finally the tub fills up and he lays down in it.

"Oh wow, I can't believe I don't do this more often." he says to himself as he savors just how nice the warm water feels against his skin. He doesn't realize the cause of it being so nice is because his skin is now silky smooth as well as being devoid of any hair.

What's the first thing he does to get himself cleaned up.
1513311111212.title: Bath

15133111112121.content:
Nate thinks about it for a moment and decides to go with his hair first. He reaches over towards the rack where all the shampoo is at but for some reason can't find his. "Where did it go?" he asks aloud.

Unfortunatly, the only shampoo he can find is his mom's which is a pink gel-like liquid which he squirts into his hand and is dismayed at it's floral scent. "Better than nothing." he mutters to himself.

As he rubs the shampoo into his hair, he notices that his hair feels much softer as well as thicker and more volumnous which he immediately chalks up to the shampoo. "That's what I get for using such girly products." he says to himself.

After letting the shampoo sit in his hair for a few minutes, he dunks his head under the water to rinse it out and then returns to the surface completely rinsed off.
15133111112121.title: Hair

151331111121211.content:
Now that his hair is washed, Nate moves on to getting the rest of his body cleaned up. He grabs the washcloth he brought in with him and reaches over towards where the bars of soap are at when he gets his second surprise of the day.

"Oh come on not here too." he says to himself in annoyment as he sees that the bar of soap that he normally uses is gone as well with only the one that his mom and sister share.

"This is getting ridiculous." he mutters as he reluctantly grabs the bar of soap and starts lathering up the rag so that he can use it to scrub his body. And he can't help but grimace as he notices that this too has a floral scent to it.

When he finishes scrubbing up, he submerges his entire body from the neck down into the water to wash off all of the soap and when he brings it back up, he can't help but notice the shine on his new silky skin.
151331111121211.title: Washing the Body

1513311111212111.content:
Now that his body was completely cleaned up from head to toe, he was ready to get out and get dried off. Of course he made sure to pull the plug to drain all of the water out before stepping onto the towel he had laid out in front of the tub so he wouldn't slip when he exited.

Grabbing the towel he had set aside to dry himself off with, he proceeds to do just that but when he completes that task, he then wraps the towel around his entire torso, much like he'd seen his mom and sister do. "Why would I do something like that?" he wonders.

Then in an even more mind-boggling event, he heads towards the closet and pulls out another towel and wraps it around his hair in a feminine style. "It's gotta be some of these girly products getting to me. It just has to." he reasons to himself.

Opting not to get dressed in the bathroom, he takes his clothes over back to his bedroom and sets them down on the bed before closing the door and locking it behind him.
1513311111212111.title: Getting and Drying Off

15133111112121111.content:
The first thing Nate does before getting dressed is remove the towel that's covering his torso and throwing that off to the side to put into the hamper later.

He moves on to the clothes, staring with his underwear which he easily slides up his legs where they come to a rest on his hips. His socks however, are a completely different story as they seem to stretch as he slides them on, going halfway to his knees and they seem to be lighter. "I must've grabbed a pair of mom's by mistake." he says to himself without bothering to correct the mistake.

He then goes on to put on the rest of his outfit, having some trouble getting the shirt over the towel wrapped around his hair but manages to get it done. He then takes the old towel and puts it into the bathroom hamper before taking the towel around his hair out and dropping it in there as well.
15133111112121111.title: Getting Dressed

151331111121211111.content:
As Nate headed downstairs, he noticed himself falling into a strange walking pattern which he immediately recognized as the way his mom and sister usually walked. "Why am I walking like this?" he asks himself.

The pattern in question was putting one foot in front of the other, causing his hips to sway back and forth even thought they were still small and boyish.

Try as he might though, his legs just wouldn't listen to his commands and he found himself unable to walk any other way but with that feminine stride. "Maybe I'll just pop out of it." he reasons.

He goes downstairs to see that there is something going on.
151331111121211111.title: Going Downstairs

1513311111212111112.content:
Once Nate hit the bottom step, he could easily smell the aroma of his mother's delicious breakfast. "And I can't wait to eat it." he says to himself.

However though, before he gets much further, he notices that Kate seems to be in his living room. "Oh hey Kate, I didn't know you came over. When did you get here?" he asks.

"Oh just a little bit ago." she says as she grins at him. Nate doesn't know why but for some reason, her smile unnerves him a little bit.

"So are you interested in coming over to hang out for a bit?" she asks as that was the reason she had come over in the first place.

Before Nate has a chance to answer, he's too lost in thought to realize how his arms have become much more slim and feminine which is something not lost on Kate. 'He's coming along nicely, soon I'll have my mom back.' she thinks to herself.
1513311111212111112.title: He Has a Visitor

15133111112121111121.content:
Nate's head leans back towards the kitchen where the delicious aroma of his mom's breakfast is wafting through his nostrils, enticing him to stay home and make no mistake, he'd love to chow down on it's yummyness.

But he finds himself unable to deny her request as he can't seem to figure out why. "I guess I can go over. Hopefully you have some good food there." he replies.

Kate just giggles to herself. "Oh you don't have to worry about that, my mom's a great cook." she says as she heads towards his front door.

Nate guesses she just spoke wrong since her mom had passed on a few years ago and figured that maybe before that had happened, she taught Kate how to be a good cook. "Well then I'm certainly looking forward to it." he replies.

As they go towards his front door, it's his clothes that start to go through changes next as his shoes begin turning black and the tongue and shoelaces vanish.
15133111112121111121.title: Sure

151331111121211111211.content:
Before they leave, Nate turns his head towards the kitchen. "Mom, I'm heading over to Kate's, I'll be back in a little bit." he yells to her, not even knowing that the only time he'll ever be back is for a neighborly visit.

"Ok just don't be too long." his mom yells back.

During the small conversation, more thoughts were racing through Kate's head. 'Nate's always had a crush on me but it was just never meant to be as I don't like him any more than a friend. But if he wants to be this close to me that badly, well, I guess I can make him family.' she thinks to herself, justifying her wish.

Now that they're finally outside, the start the short walk over to Kate's house, chit-chatting about this and that when Nate suddenly loses his balance. "That was weird." he says to himself as he's able to straighten himself up.

What he didn't realize was that on the back part of his shoes, a small heel had begun to push out of them only they were just at an inch for now.
151331111121211111211.title: Leaving

1513311111212111112111.content:
Kate happened to notice him stumble and went back to help him. "You ok Nate?" she asks as she looks down at him, and inwardly smiles as she catches the heels that are growing out of his shoes. 'This is going to be fun to watch.' she thinks to herself.

Nate just looks up at her. "Yea I'm fine no worries." he says as he looks himself over. He does happen to notice that his center of balance seems to be off. 'Guess I need new shoes.' he thinks to himself.

They continue walking towards her house, talking about things like school and what not as his changes continue. This time it's on his shirt as the sleeves start to retract all the way to his shoulders, vanishing completely.

And then finally they reach Kate's house but is there someone there already?
1513311111212111112111.title: Kate's House

15133111112121111121112.content:
Once they got there, they saw that no one was home which meant they had the house all to themselves. It was currently 9:30 in the morning which meant there was plenty of time left to start some breakfast.

For some reason though, Nate thought it would be a good idea if he made breakfast for the two of them. "Why would I think that?" he mutters as he heads towards the kitchen. On his way there he starts to get a little older, going up to twenty years old.

1523.content:
The candies could be the biggest birthday practical joke ever... or, they could be some really powerful magic. Thousands of possibilities for their use whirl through your mind as you think of all the things you can wish for. You could wish to be rich, or to be famous... you could wish to have any girl you wanted become your girl friend.

The more you think about it however, the more you start to worry about consequences. If you wished to be rich... would people wonder where the money came from? Would you wind up in jail because people thought you stole it? Or, if you wished for someone to like you... would they really like you, or would it be like they were always pretending because the magic made them?

I need someone I can talk to about this, you thought at last. Briefly you considered talking to your parents, but dismissed that right off the bat. All they would do is tell you what you should be doing with them, instead of helping you figure it out. Or worse, your dad would probably take them from you because 'you weren't responsible enough to use them wisely', and then use them himself. No, what you needed was an adult you could trust to just give you some good advice. And there was only one person you could think of who fit that description.

Hopping on your bike, you set off across town for the hour long ride it would take to get to Aunt Bethany's. Fortunately, most of the way there was down hill, and you were hoping that you could convince her to drive you home with your bike in the back of her SUV. She'd done it before when you and Erin had pedaled over and stayed too late to ride home after dark, and it would be way better than pedaling up hill all the way home.

Finally arriving at Aunt Beth's down town apartment, you racked your bike and rode the elevator to her 14th story apartment, nervously fidgeting with the candies the whole way up. Knocking on the door, you smiled at last when aunt Beth opened the door, her brown hair up in a pony tail and holding a towel that she was using to mop a faint sheen of perspiration from her brow. She looked really good in her short black athletic shorts and pink sports bra, and you figured you'd probably gotten here in the middle of one of her treadmill sessions. She might be 33, but she looked younger and whenever she came over your friends were always drooling over her. Not that you noticed too much... after all, she was Aunt Beth!

"Nate," she said, waving you to come in. "I wasn't expecting to see you until your party on Friday. Happy birthday."

"Thanks Aunt Beth," you said, taking a seat on one of the living room sofas and looking out the window at the awesome view. "Where are Max and Sam?" you asked, referring to her two kids. Samantha was only six, and she was an annoying tag along most of the time, but Max was almost twelve and he liked a lot of the same video games you liked to play.

"They're at their father's house this week. They'll be coming back here for the weekend. But this year, Max is old enough to go to the Science and Engineering magnet school and it's closer to their dad's place, so we're going to try them with him for a school year and see how it goes," she said with just a touch of bitterness. She'd been divorced for nearly three years now and she still hadn't forgiven her ex-husband Dan for running off with his busty blonde secretary. She'd always known he was a boob guy, but she'd stubbornly refused to get the implants he wanted her to have, saying her C-cups were big enough. Well, obviously they weren't big enough for him, and he'd found what he wanted in a 22 year old para-legal who'd been more than willing to do whatever her boss asked her to... right up to helping him fill out the divorce paperwork and moving into the home in the suburbs that Dan used to share with Bethany after Beth moved out. "Sorry," she said, bringing herself back to the moment. "My mind wandered off there for a bit. So what brings you all the way down here in this heat? It's a long way to ride just to come say hi, and I figured you'd be out with your friends celebrating your birthday tonight."

"Well, it's something I got for my birthday that brings me down here. I got these candies, and I think they're magic. They grant wishes. I tried one, I wished that I had thirty dollars, and then I found thirty bucks in my pocket. I swear the money wasn't there before I made my wish. Now, I counted and I have 29 of them left... but if I'm reading it right, these things are kind of like jaw breakers... until the candy is all gone you can keep wishing so you can make more than one wish per candy. I just... I don't know what I should do with them, and I don't want to get myself in trouble, so I thought I would come talk to you about it."

"Well, if those candies are real that's certainly some powerful magic. But why talk to me? Why not go to your parents?"

"Well, I don't think mom would believe me, and I think dad would just take them from me. Or they'd tell me what I should do with them and it wouldn't be something I would like. But I really trust you and I figured if I could talk to anyone it would be you."

"Nate," she said, truly touched by his statement. "I'm really touched that you feel that way, here..."

29 Candies remaining, what does Aunt Bethany say?
